Job Description: • Develops and executes marketing and communication strategy for the company branding and image, and for new and existing projects;• Identify short-term and long-term scheduling, budget, and resource needs, including the development and management of an annual marketing budget, profit/loss projections, expenditure spending, and other financial considerations;• Manage conception, development, and implementation of marketing plan and strategies, product concepts, and promotional programs both digital and non-digital to drive the interest of each project and increase sale volume;• Attend and/or participate at conventions, conferences, and tradeshows, preparing engaging displays and collateral as needed, and providing post-event reports and analysis;• Works closely and corporately with our sales department to develop a pricing strategy that will help us maximize profits and market share with balancing high level of customer’s satisfaction. • Continually review changes to the market, consumer trends and the activities of competitors, adjusting the marketing plan if necessary• Understand key marketing performance metrics and tracking tools to provide market research, forecasts, competitive analyses, campaign results, and consumer trends in order to translate results into actionable insights for marketing team• Conduct regular meetings with manager - marketing to review pipeline, resolve challenges, and present possible solutions, and provide ongoing training to ensure team consistently performs above standard
Job Requirement: • Master’s degree or bachelor’s degree in marketing, business management or administration or other relevant fields; • Minimum 08 year of working experience in sales or marketing from real estate, construction industry or related industry; • Experience with digital and print marketing, content marketing, and social media marketing and communication, and establish portfolio of media and PR contact; • Possessing a deep and thorough understanding of the real estate and construction industry and its market updates;• Capability to manage various projects and tight to deadline;• Excellent negotiation and leadership skills; • Proven ability to plan and manage budget effectively and efficiently;• Proven good verbal and written communication in both English and Khmer. • Strong Leadership and business management skills • Good mathematical skills, and can make accurate calculations quickly and easily • Excellent verbal and written communication skills • Being able to use a high degree of initiative • Being thorough and pay attention to detail • Good analytical and problem-solving skills• Ability to share knowledge and work in a strong team-oriented environment

Job Description: * Strategy and Planning- Initiate, define, plan, communicate and follow up company's   business strategy regarding Private Banking business in order   to ensure company’s long-term viability and market share.- Develop an appropriate marketing plan with marketing team to   efficiently and effectively achieve goals and objectives   through design and implement workable and innovative   solutions for client’s needs.- Keep abreast of latest market trend, analyze customers'   behavior, key financial drivers and competitors'' strategy to   sustain a continuous service growth.* Customer Acquisition & Revenue Target- Present and provide highly professional consultations to   target corporate clients and HNWI to address their demands   and match with the Bank’s products and services.- Discuss credit-related issues and loan packaging to provide   sound financial advice and tailored solutions for the clients   as well as to take the opportunity to cross-sell other   banking products.- Prepare and execute loan contracts and arrange loan   disbursement timely and accurately to fulfill clients’ needs   and satisfactions.- Closely monitor on recommended/processed loan for timely   repayment and to ensure Portfolio at Risk remains within   acceptable level.- Solicit, build and maintain new and existing local   corporate/HNW individual clients in accordance with the   guidelines stated in the Commercial Banking policies and   procedures to ensure sustainable and secure deposit and loan   portfolios and expending scope to investment and other   products/services as cross-selling.* Customer Relationship Management- Make regular site visits to existing clients to determine the   actual conditions of the business and loan collateral whether   it should remain the same or be downgraded as well as to   develop relationship with clients as part of retention   strategies.- Act as liaison between clients and internal operations team   to timely and effectively understand and provide all types of   banking products including but not limited to deposits,   loans, trade finances and remittance for the clients.- Handle complex clients’ issues or complaints to find an   amicable solution for all and process to higher authority if   needed.* Project Management & Process Improvement- Lead projects on developing and launching new   initiatives/services and creating new service features and   process regarding Private Banking as needed to improve/gain   market penetration/share- Coordinate with different departments, including Operations,   Finance & IT in streamlining processes, Marketing to drive   business growth and Risk and Compliance in ensuring adherence   of relevant policies and guidelines.* Staff Management- Supervise staff in daily tasks, operations and quality   control.- Coordinate available resources for maximum outcomes.- Act as a role model within the team to question, listen and   give actionable feedback carefully in order to create a   productive work atmosphere towards “speak up culture”.- Oversee Deposit Initiatives such as new product development,   feature enhancements, client experience improvement, pricing   management, campaign/promotion to support deposit raising   etc. in their entire lifecycle from client value proposition   conception, tech budgetary negotiation & planning, product   approval/approval, project management and risk/control   governance etc- Oversee day-to-day deposits product management across all   markets including review/approval of deposit campaigns   (tactical, bundles, solus, thematic, digital focused, etc.),   monthly deposit reviews with markets, weekly deposit balance   monitoring and flash process, month-end revenue analysis, and   annual Plan and mid-year forecast exercise.
Job Requirement: - BA in Business, Economics, Accounting, Banking or Finance- Minimum 3 years' experience in Sales & Customers or Partners   Relationship Management / Business Analysis / Project   Management / Transformation / Digital , preferably gained in   Banking or Financial Services industry or consultancy and in   particular in Corporate, Retail Banking, Banking and Cash   Management, Lending / Investment is a plus- Good in spoken / written English and in another foreign   language is a plus- Strong customer/partner relationship, customer services and   deal/project structuring/implementation- Good analytical, communication and interpersonal skills- Having high level of confidentiality, integrity and business   ethic

Wing Bank (Cambodia) Plc – the bank for every Cambodian – is driven by the vision to provide every Cambodian with convenient access to financial services relevant to, and for the improvement of their daily lives.

Wing Bank has revolutionized the way Cambodians access financial services by introducing instant, secure, and convenient Mobile Financial Services since 18 August 2008.

Today, Wing Bank serves the entire Cambodian population with 100% coverage of the districts in Cambodia thanks to the innovative Wing Bank App, over 10,000 Wing Cash Xpress agents, over 55,000 merchants, and partnerships with industry giants such as Mastercard, MoneyGram, AliPay, WeChat Pay, Western Union, Visa, and Ria.

Wing Bank provides an array of advanced financial products both for individual and corporate customers. These include loans, deposits, micro savings, credit referral services, money transfers, utility and insurance payments, supply chain payments, payroll services and even phone top-ups. In addition, Wing offers retail payments via “WingPay”, and has also introduced the “WingMall” e-commerce platform.

Both small and large companies alike are now using Wing’s payroll and disbursement services, speeding up their payments. Over 80% of Wing’s agents and 50% of customers are women, making Wing a shining example of gender inclusion in the region.

Wing Bank is committed to providing financial, gender and digital inclusion to the unbanked and the under-banked, allowing every Cambodian to enjoy convenience and security when it comes to financial services

Job Description:
•	Works with Users, Business Project Managers, IT Support Team, IT PMO, Finance, Commercial and other stakeholders to understand their needs and requirements and tailor appropriate solutions.
•	Perform data updates, indexing, and maintenance in application Data warehouse and ETL tools. 
•	Work with Business Owners/Data Analyst to develop key business questions and to build datasets that answer those questions.
•	Help to implement new data management projects and re-structure of the current data architecture.
•	Assist team in data management projects when needed.
•	Process and load third party data sources.
•	Work with Business Customers in understanding the business requirements and implementing solutions.
•	Identify and solve issues concerning data management to improve data quality.
•	Develop best practices for data management, maintenance, reporting and security.
•	Improve data foundational procedures, guidelines and standards.
•	Review dataset implementations performed by other data engineers.
•	Perform additional data and database related tasks.
•	Learn new technology if require
•	Resolve tickets on Web Helpdesk
Job Requirement:
•	(The minimum education, experience, knowledge, skills & attitude required to perform the position)
•	Education: Bachelor Degree in Information Technology
•	Experience: at least 2 year experiences in Data warehouse, ETL tools, Data processing, Hive, Spark, Kafka, …. 
•	Skills: Data structure, coding, Machine learning, Data warehouse, ETL, Data integration
•	Knowledge: data structure, programming, big data, database (Oracle, Postgres), business concept
•	Attitude: active, hard-working, honest, responsibility, friendly

Job Description: +       Job summary: Check & find document for process claim to supplier and check Account Payable for process payment to ensure governance over the Suppliers Receivable and Account Payable function.+       Job description:	Support manager in managing day-to-day operating expenditures against operating budgets to ensure efficient usage of resources	Prepare payment to client on time base on payment term contractual	Find documents activity for issue Debit Note to client	Check the source of discount, promotion scheme by clients	Check and accrual A&P Fund & Market Hygiene for suppliers by suppliers	Check Price Structure and provide LTP to Invoices team to create price list and set on systems	Check Rebate whether it absorbs by clients	Check with supplier contract for clarifications	Check other documents that provide service to supplier	Prepare DN/Invoice (Signed by BUC) for reimbursement or confirming to deduct from A&P funds	Send hard copy of Debit Note and supporting document to suppliers	Confirm to suppliers even email after sending all the documents	Check and follow up with clients for payment overdue through email or phone call	Discuss with BUC or DCF for the disputing of Debit Note	Prepare supplier account report and send to DCF for checking and making approval	Other's task assigned by manager
Job Requirement: •	Diploma or professional qualification in Accounting/Finance or a related discipline	Demonstrate basic knowledge and understanding of the business and industry	Demonstrate basic knowledge in managing Account Payable & Supplier receivable and application of local/international accounting standards, principles and practices	Proven hands-on experience in SAP accounting applications is an advantage	Demonstrate strong attention to detail and basic analytical skills	Demonstrate proficiencies in office productivity tools (e.g. Excel, Word and PowerPoint)	Demonstrate fluency in local language and ideally in English, both written and spoken
Company Profile:
At DKSH, our purpose is to enrich people’s lives by providing access to goods, services and insights. United by our vision to be the trusted partner, we help companies grow in Asia and beyond across our Business Units Healthcare, Consumer Goods, Performance Materials and Technology.

Delivering life-saving drugs to hospitals, bringing high-quality products to remote villages, installing technology that raises living standards and providing new formulations for healthcare products that make life easier. These are just a few examples of how DKSH touches people’s lives around the clock. We do this while helping our clients and customers grow by providing services including sourcing, market insights, marketing and sales, eCommerce, distribution and logistics as well as after-sales services.

Listed on the SIX Swiss Exchange, DKSH operates in 36 markets with 32,450 specialists, generating net sales of CHF 10.7 billion in 2020. Founded by Swiss entrepreneurs in 1865, we have been deeply root
Contact Info: Contact Information Koch Sirana HR Manager 017880348 jobs.kh@dksh.com No. 797, Corner Preah Monivong Boulevard and Street 484, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 017880348

Job Description:
Must have had at least 5 years of working experience in a frontend development
● Proficient knowledge about building web applications
● Proficient knowledge with modern frameworks such as VueJs/ReactJS
● Proficient knowledge with Vuetify, Tailwind
● Proficient knowledge with HTML, CSS, JavaScript
● Proficient knowledge of build tools such as Webpack, Babel, Parcel
What we’d love you to have:
● Experience with building in-house libraries and tools to improve the development processes
● Experience with CSS pre-processing platforms of SASS or SCSS
● Experience with reactive programming such as RxJS
● Experience with state machine such as XState
● Experience with VueJS ecosystem (Vue Router, Vuex and Vue CLI)
● Experience with WebWorker, ServiceWorker
● Experience with building real-time application with ○ WebSocket
○ gRPC (not needed)
○ Server-sent events (not needed)
○ Web Push/Apple Push (not needed)
● Good understanding of building Progressive Web App (PWA)
● Good understanding of Credential Management API and WebAuthn
● Good understanding of Backend development
● The ability to naturally follow good development practices like test automation,
Job Requirement:
- ReactJS (must know)
- API (must know)
- Database (optional)

*Salary between $800 to $1400 based on experience and knowledge.

Job Description: - Conducting market research to find answers about customer requirements, habits and trends- Brainstorming and developing ideas for creative marketing campaigns- Assisting in outbound or inbound marketing activities by demonstrating expertise in   various areas (content development and optimization, advertising, events planning etc.)- Conduct market research to find answers about customer requirements, habits and trends- Brainstorm and develop ideas for creative marketing campaigns- Liaise with external vendors to execute promotional events and campaigns- Collaborate with marketing and other professionals to coordinate brand awareness and   marketing efforts- Plan and execute initiatives to reach the target audience through appropriate channels   (social media, e-mail, TV etc.)- Assist in analyzing marketing data (campaign results, conversion rates, traffic etc.) to   help shape future marketing strategies- Undertake individual tasks of a marketing plan as assigned- Have a good PR for internal and external customers.- Content Writer and Transcriber- Drum Up and aggressive marketing plans to promote Aii Language Center, ICES Cambodia,   TESL House, West Coast International School and other languages.- All tasks related to PR and Marketing are assigned by Mr. President Mike and school   committee.Daily task:To develop ideas for creative marketing campaigns, plan and execute initiatives to audience and analyze the results for future development of:• Events- Graduation- Christmas Celebration- Halloween- Khmer New Year- Pchum Ben- Water Festival- Etc.• Contests- Spelling Bee- Pronunciation Contest- Debate & Public Speaking Contest- WordSpeed Contest• New Term Starts- School Profile

Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh Building #223 & 227, Mao Tse Tong Blvd., Sangkat Toul Svay Prey I, Khan Boeng Keng Kang, Phnom Penh 012 797 939

Company Profile:
Amret (https://www.amret.com.kh) is a leading microfinance institution established in 1991 that contributes to the economic and social development of Cambodia by providing a wide range of financial services to meet the needs of the large targeted customers. Amret has strong commitment and long-term business strategies to be a leading financial institution in the market by deploying ambitious digital strategies. 

Amret belongs to the Advans international group (www.advansgroup.com) a major shareholder and international shareholder (FMO and IFC). The Advans group serves over 750,000 clients, and has expanded its operations in nine countries such as Cambodia, Cameroon, Ivory Coast, Democratic Republic of Congo, Ghana, Myanmar, Nigeria, Pakistan, and Tunisia. 

Amret has more than 150 branches, located in 25 cities and provinces in Cambodia, and successfully serves 450,000 customers with around 4,000 highly dedicated employees.
Contact Info: Contact Information Recruitment and Job Management  092333020 jobs@amret.com.kh #80, Street 315, Sangkat Boeung Kak2, Khan Toul Kok, Phnom Penh, Cambodia. 092333020

Job Description: This position will be handle for Phnom Penh Media, Wywaza Investment and Personal Finance of Chairman.- Set up accounting and finance procedure and manual- Prepared monthly, annual financial statement preparation to ensure timely, completeness and accurately reporting.- Monitoring and follow up to be appropriate to the procedure and manual, and also to be compliance with the regulate and law.- Check and verify all transaction from subordinate such as voucher, Invoice and accounting transaction in manual and System.- Analysis and verify daily cash balance in case of variance and bank reconcile transaction in accounting book with bank statement and variance analysis if any circumstance.- Check and verify monthly accounting account, AR, AP aging, and accrued expenses- Assist Prepare and organize P&L budget plan Vs Actual- Check payment schedule for local and oversee vendor or supplies- Check monthly and annual tax declaration and tax audit. - Check and set up fixed asset code system.- Check Payroll and verifies Payment Voucher. - Prepare and manage budget plan for group and personal finance for Chairman- Job performance appraisal of subordinate staffs- Review financial statement and submit to Accounting and Auditing Regulator.- Others task which assigned by Chairman.

Job Description: Job Summary:The Training Manager will identify and monitor training needs in the organization, and design, plan, and implement training programs, policies, and procedures to fulfill those needs.Supervisory Responsibilities:•	Oversees the daily activities of training associates and consultants.•	Conducts performance evaluations that are timely and constructive.Duties/Responsibilities:•	Reviews existing training programs; suggests enhancements and modifications to improve engagement, learning, and retention and/or to meet the changing needs of clientele, the organization, or the industry.•	Ensures that training materials and programs are current, accurate, and effective.•	Maintains knowledge of new methods and techniques for training, and training requirements applicable to the organization and/or industry.•	Identifies problems and opportunities such as operational changes or industry developments that training could improve.•	Conducts or facilitates required and recommended training sessions.•	Collaborates with vendors and third-party training providers to arrange employee registration for and participation in outside training programs.•	Ensures that training milestones and goals are met while adhering to approved training budget.•	Prepares and implements training budget.•	Performs other related duties as assigned.
Job Requirement: Required Skills/Abilities:•	Excellent verbal and written communication skills with strong graphic design ability (Chinese is a plus)•	Thorough understanding of training processes.•	Ability to moderate large groups.•	Extremely organized and detail-oriented.•	Proficient with Microsoft Office Suite or related software.Education and Experience:•	Bachelors degree/Master's degree in Communications or related area required.•	At least four years of experience in training with one year of supervisory experience required.

Job Description:
Overall Purpose Of The Job
Working closely with Hospital Marketing (HM), Raffles Hospital Singapore, the Manager of Representative Office, Cambodia, shall be responsible for leading, developing and managing the marketing of the Hospital to Cambodia. He/she shall develop the marketing strategies and plans to grow the business of the Hospital.
He/she shall be responsible for identifying and establishing networks and channels that will help grow the market share of the Hospital. The Manager shall supervise and manage the patient support services, including language assistance, to
assure local patients and corporate clients of excellent service experience in Raffles Hospital Singapore.

Key Responsibilities
(A) SPECIFIC (80%)
1. Lead and manage all the operations of Representative Office, Cambodia including marketing & sales support, administration, finance, customer services and legal issues.
2. Direct, develop and implement marketing strategies, plans and programmed in cooperation with HM to promote the business and utilization of services offered by the Hospital.
3. Conduct research on markets, competitors, and competitive trends to identify business opportunities to grow the business.
4. Working closely with HM to identify, develop, and manage associates to promote patient referrals to the Hospital.
5. Lead and develop the team in building and maintaining effective relationship with the associates and corporate clients, and developing their capacity to grow patient referrals to the Hospital.
6. In cooperation with HM to establish, develop and implement service support services (such as marketing, administrative fees, and information) for associates and patient liaison offices that will help them promote and grow the patient referrals to the Hospital.
7. Direct and develop an effective corporate communications and advertising programme in support of the marketing to local markets in Cambodia.
8. In cooperation with HM to establish, implement and review policies, procedures and protocols to ensure smooth and effective execution and performance of all marketing and advertising programmes.
9. Establish and develop joint marketing programmes and co-funding with local partners (if any).
10. Oversee the analysis and track the outcome of all marketing and advertising programmes.
11. Establish and implement a transparent system of reporting which includes regular reports and ad hoc reports as needed.
12. Establish and maintain an effective system for receipt and response to customer feedback.
13. Recruit, retain, and develop talent, skills and key competencies within the unit to provide and support the Hospital’s local marketing programmes and initiatives.
14. Plan and manage budgets and resources to achieve efficiency and department goals.

(B) GENERAL (20%)
1. Foster a climate of teamwork and co-operation, passion for service excellence, and openness for sharing of ideas and training.
2. Be a service ambassador and a role model for empathetic listening and going the extra mile to be of service to patients.
3. Perform any other duties as assigned by the Head of HM/ Senior Manager.
Job Requirement:
Required Skills and Knowledge
- Excellent communication skills
- Ability to maintain relationships with internal and client contacts
- Energetic and enthusiastic
- A team player both within the department and with the other divisions within the organisation.
- Attention to detail

Required Competencies
- Integrity and trust
- Hard working with a positive attitude
- Peer relationships
- Able to work under tight deadlines

Required Work Experience
- preferably with relevant experience of at least 5 years

Required Qualifications
- Degree in any discipline

Required Languages
- Good knowledge of English and Khmer

Travel / Rotation Requirements
- Requires occasional traveling.
Company Profile:
Raffles Medical Cambodia was opened in 1992 and is renowned for the delivery of comprehensive international standards of medical services. The staff consists of well qualified doctors and nurses who are familiar with the health dynamics in Cambodia, and are able to provide full support for expatriates, residents and tourists for day to day health management, vaccinations, medical stabilization and treatment in the event of a medical emergency.

Patients will receive the same high level of service and renowned quality of care, with continued access to our panel of international and local doctors. Patients and onshore panel of doctors can also expect to benefit from access to the clinical expertise and support from the Raffles specialists in Singapore.

company_name: One Fraternity Co., Ltd. (Vital Premium Water, Mee Chiet)
Job Description:
1. Execute recruitment and consolidate staff requisitions from all functions and incorporated into recruitment plan to ensure the vacancies are timely fulfilled.
2. Build applicant sources (talent pool) and perform sourcing through offline or online channels to fill open positions and anticipate future needs
3. Prepare job announcements through various recruitment platforms both virtual and off-line channels to acquire potential candidates. 
4. Shortlist candidates following job requirements and implement recruitment process to ensure potential talents are selected
5. Acquire and maintain all necessary documents from employees (CV, academic and employment records, national ID, family book, guarantee letter, medical health checkup, employee book etc…)
6. Record and update employee’s information in HRIS system to ensure that employee data are up-to-date and ready to use
7. Implement onboarding program to ensure that inductions are effectively conducted   
8. Propose sourcing and employer branding techniques to promote employer branding and support recruitment
9. Other talks assigned by superiors
Job Requirement:
1. Education: 
o Bachelor Degree of Business Administrative or equivalent
2. Experiences: 
o 2-year experiences in recruitment or overall HR practices
3. Skills and knowledge: 
o Knowledge in Cambodia Labor Law
o Have strong talent networks
o Be digitalized oriented
o Good communication and report presentation
o Computer literacy (Microsoft office and other useful software) 
o Language: Strong command both Khmer and English
Company Profile: One Fraternity is a Cambodian-owned company specializing in sales, distribution, and marketing of a wide range of consumer products. Since the establishment in 2010, we have extensive experiences and affiliations with diverse stakeholders, including government institutions, businesses, wholesalers, retailers, agents, and customers across Cambodia. With broad distribution channels and industry expertise, from market research and analysis, assessing customer needs, sales, marketing, or distribution, we help build the strategy that works for our business partners who want to grow their businesses in new and existing markets in Cambodia.

The company has been profoundly engaged with the Cambodian real estate market for 15 years. The team members have got years of experience in large-scale land development and real estate projects in both China and Southeast Asia.

Job Description:
•	Supervise and control all leasing executives in Chip Mong Retail
•	Recommend retail concepts and develop Stacking Plans for all shopping malls
•	Attract suitable tenants to match the mall positioning
•	Responsible for all specialty leases under negotiation including renewals, incentive budgets, vacancy budgets; market rent reviews, and development feasibilities and is also involved in major lease negotiations for retail and Office Space
•	Establish work parameters (plans, budgets, targets and resource allocations) for reporting teams by managing the skill set of these teams and to ensure that they can achieve set objectives
•	Communicate values, behaviors and practices expected of the team
•	Disseminate information in a clear and concise manner by using communication tools to foster communication within the business
•	Ensure all policies, procedures and methodologies are adhered to.
Job Requirement:
•	Bachelor’s degree in marketing, Operations, Finance, or related areas and/or recognized qualifications in business studies
•	5 year experience relevant Leasing / mall management applications, in writing procedures and preparing reports, in retail operations and managing tenants, and in shopping mall retail is a necessity
•	Understanding of consumer marketing, Accounts, and contract laws
•	General technical knowledge of Fit out requirements and Landlord Provisions
•	Strong verbal and written communication, and negotiation skills
•	Competent in formal report writing and Presentation skills
•	Demonstrated supervisory and mentoring skills and good people skills
•	A team player with the ability to work independently and unsupervised
•	Be self-motivated and performance focused
•	Tenant Mix planning and Space Planning and Basic IT skills
•	Ability to work under pressure and proven ability to influence people (internally and externally)
Company Profile: Since its founding in 1982, Chip Mong has focused extensively on the changing needs of the society and the strengthening of its relationships with business communities, both domestically and internationally. In recent years, Chip Mong has experienced tremendous growth and evolved into one of the largest groups of companies in the country, comprising seven wholly-owned subsidies, three joint-ventures, and two hotel projects. Chip Mong’s businesses include construction and materials, consumers goods, property development, beverages, general industrials, hospitality, retail and feed. The Company also offers a vast array of consumer products from well-known manufacturers throughout the region.

Job Description:
គោលបំណង: ធានាអោយបាននូវការអនុវត្តន៍ការងារក្នុងផ្នែក SMC នៅក្នុងក្រុមហ៊ុនប្រកបដោយប្រសិទ្ធិភាព ដោយប្រកាន់ភ្ជាប់នូវគោលការណ៍អព្យាក្រឹត្យ តម្លាភាព និងលើកកម្ពស់ស្មារតីអប់រំបណ្តុះបណ្តាលលើកទឹកចិត្តបុគ្គលិកក្នុងឥរិយាបថសមរម្យ និងការរក្សាអោយបាននូវទំនាក់ទំនងល្អរវាងនិយោជកនិងនិយោជិត។

ភារកិច្ច និង ការទទួលខុសត្រូវ

1. គ្រប់គ្រង និងចាត់ចែងរៀបចំការងារក្រុមសុវត្ថិភាពម្ហូបអាហារដើម្បីអនុវត្តន៍តម្រូវការរបស់ប្រព័ន្ធសុវត្ថិភាពម្ហូប អាហារ (ISO22000)
2. រៀបចំឯកសារតាមតម្រូវការរបស់ប្រព័ន្ធសុវត្ថិភាពម្ហូបអាហារ (ISO22000)
3. សិក្សា HACCP
4. រៀបចំការធ្វើសវនកម្ម (Internal and External audit)
5. ចេញនូវវិធានការកែតម្រូវទៅលើការអនុវត្តន៍ផលិតកម្មស្អាត់(GMP)និងប្រព័ន្ធសុវត្ថិភាពម្ហូបអាហារ (ISO22000) ហើយតានដានសកម្មភាពកែប្រែ (Follow up CAP)
6. អប់រំនិងការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលសមាជិកក្រុមការងារសុវត្ថិភាពម្ហូបអាហារនិងបុគ្គលិកទៅលើផលិតកម្មស្អាត់ (GMP) និងសុវត្ថិភាពម្ហូបអាហារ FSMS
7. រៀបចំទទួលនិងបញ្ចូលសកម្មភាពសំខាន់ផ្សេងៗ និងអនុវត្តតាមលំដាប់លំដោយក្នុងការបង្កើត និងការអនុ វត្តន៍ ថែទាំ និងធ្វើបច្ចុប្បន្នភាពអំពី សុវត្ថិភាពម្ហូបអាហារ FSMS
8. ធ្វើការទំនាក់ទំនងជាមួយដៃគូរខាងក្រៅលើរូបធាតុពាក់ព័ន្ធទៅនឹងសុវត្ថិភាពម្ហូបអាហារ FSMSដើម្បីធានា ជំរុញ ការ យល់ដឹងនៃតំរូវការសុវត្ថិភាពម្ហូបអាហារនៅទូទាំងក្រុមហ៊ុន
9. ការងារផ្សេងទៀតត្រូវបានកំណត់ដោយប្រធានក្រុមហ៊ុន
Job Requirement:
កំរិតអប់រំ   : ថ្នាក់បរិញ្ញាបត្រ អនុបណ្ឌិត គីមីម្ហូបអាហារ ឡើងទៅ

Job Description:
•	Execute retail concepts and develop Stacking Plans for all shopping malls.
•	Provide support in planning and implementing the tendency mix for the pre-open/development malls.
•	Provide support to leasing manager to ensure division deadlines and objectives are met and collaborate with mall management team to achieve optimum occupancy and desire tenant mix.
•	Identify, attract, interact with potential and prospective tenants to match the mall’s positioning.
•	Maintain relationship and work closely with other teams as well as tenants or team members to settle leasing and other related issues. 
•	Conduct satisfaction survey on provided services to identify stakeholder’s satisfaction and points to be improved. 
•	Monitor tenants’ turnover rates and take actions to ensure overall turnover objective of the Mall is met.
•	Establishing work parameters - plans, budgets and targets and allocate resources for the team.   
•	Ensure all policies, procedures and methodologies comply to Chip Mong Retail’s policy, rules and regulations. 
•	Perform other duties as assigned.
Job Requirement:
•	Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Sales, Business Administration, or related fields
•	At least 2 years proven work experience in the areas of Leasing / Marketing, Operations or related areas.
•	At least 1 year of experience in a supervisory position
•	Experience in using relevant leasing / mall management applications 
•	Knowledge and understanding of the commercial leasing process
•	Understanding of consumer marketing, Accounts, and contract laws
•	Knowledge of space planning and tenant improvement process
•	General technical knowledge of Fit out requirements and Landlord Provisions 
•	Strong verbal and written communication, and negotiation skills
•	Strong customer service and marketing skills
•	Competence in formal report writing and Presentation skills
•	Demonstrated supervisory skills 
•	A team player with the ability to work independently 
•	Be self-motivated and performance focused 
•	Good people skills
•	Tenant Mix planning and space planning skills 
•	Proven ability to influence people (internally and externally)
•	Ability to work under pressure
Company Profile: Since its founding in 1982, Chip Mong has focused extensively on the changing needs of the society and the strengthening of its relationships with business communities, both domestically and internationally. In recent years, Chip Mong has experienced tremendous growth and evolved into one of the largest groups of companies in the country, comprising seven wholly-owned subsidies, three joint-ventures, and two hotel projects. Chip Mong’s businesses include construction and materials, consumers goods, property development, beverages, general industrials, hospitality, retail and feed. The Company also offers a vast array of consumer products from well-known manufacturers throughout the region.

Company Profile:
Andart Rorm Seafood Restaurant was first opened in Phnom Penh in 2007. We have been serving fresh, delicious seafood for over a decade. 

Andart Rorm has expanded from its humble beginnings and now has three prime locations in Phnom Penh: on the main thoroughfare of Monivong Boulevard, in Olympia Mall, and Borey Peng Huoth (Beoung Snor). 

Our concept remains the same: to serve fresh Cambodian-sourced seafood Khmer style. Our dishes are loved by our guests and appreciated for expertly cooked healthy dishes using less oil and no MSG. We follow Cambodian traditions and flavors using fresh aromatic Cambodian herbs and spices that tease the senses but still allow the fresh seafood tastes to flow. Our customers’ well-regarded and favorite dishes are kept on the menu whilst new ones are added. This way, the great seafood flavors of Cambodia are captured and remembered. 

We are also proud to have opened Grillostone Pub, located at the Monivong Branch. Steaks are cooked on heated lava stone, which has very high heat retention and keeps extreme heat for up to 35 minutes. It helps to release and maximize the steak flavor, allowing us to always serve you the perfect steak at the right temperature and the way you like your steak. We import our prime cuts from USA and Australia for their quality, flavor and texture. We provide you different side dishes of your choice and sauces to accompany your steak! There are also several other western dishes on the menu. WHAT WE BELIEVE . 

We believe in fresh, delicious and fully satisfying seafood dishes with that unique seato- plate taste. We believe in subtle Khmer flavors using Cambodian grown herbs, spices and vegetables. We do not use MSG. Instead, we let the flavors talk for themselves. We believe in International standards of hygiene and cleanliness. We believe your complete satisfaction and enjoyment is our goal and mission.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department  085 582 285 / 086 582 285 bunnytech77@gmail.com No.28, National Road 6A, Kean Khlang Village, Sangkat Chroy Changvar, Khan Chroy Changvar, Phnom Penh, Cambodia. 085 582 285 / 086 582 285

Company Profile:
At DKSH, our purpose is to enrich people’s lives by providing access to goods, services and insights. United by our vision to be the trusted partner, we help companies grow in Asia and beyond across our Business Units Healthcare, Consumer Goods, Performance Materials and Technology.

Delivering life-saving drugs to hospitals, bringing high-quality products to remote villages, installing technology that raises living standards and providing new formulations for healthcare products that make life easier. These are just a few examples of how DKSH touches people’s lives around the clock. We do this while helping our clients and customers grow by providing services including sourcing, market insights, marketing and sales, eCommerce, distribution and logistics as well as after-sales services.

Listed on the SIX Swiss Exchange, DKSH operates in 36 markets with 32,450 specialists, generating net sales of CHF 10.7 billion in 2020. Founded by Swiss entrepreneurs in 1865, we have been deeply root

Job Description:
We are looking for Software Tester to test and report software errors and bugs built from a web-based application.

If coding in software testing is your passion, then this announcement is made for you.

• Test codes of software in various programming languages
• Analyzing the bug and submitting a bug ticket to the developer
• Finding and reporting regression/impact
• Maintain active communication with other co-workers during the process of testing.
• Working as a team headed by a team leader
• Accounting for software security considerations
• Bringing security considerations and requirements to software implementation
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science with or without experience
- Passion to work in software testing.
- Good writing and speaking in English
- Good communication and teamwork
- Having knowledge of programming languages: HTML/CSS
- Having knowledge of databases
- Be able to use IE, Firefox, Google Chrome, Safari, and Selenium IDE Plugins is a plus.
- Quick learning and adaptability to various environments
- Tools:
- VPN, Jira, Squash, FTP client (Filezilla), Notepad etc.

** Platform:
- Windows, VMware

** Benefits:

•	Other bonuses

Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

Company Profile: Urban Hub Cambodia is a multi-award-winner and one of Cambodia’s biggest fully licensed real estate developers. We are committed to developing projects that provide the new generations of Cambodia with exceptional modern living and experience of the first world that focuses on “LIVE, WORK, PLAY” yet preserving the Cambodian tradition and identity of community living.Registered in 2017, Urban Hub Cambodia is a joint venture between a Hong Kong-based conglomerate, Goldfame Group, the largest Hong Kong investor in Cambodia since 1992, and a Cambodian-American real estate company, Urban Living Solutions. Urban Hub Cambodia has quickly become a leading mixed-use property developer and the first developer ever from Cambodia to win the most awards including two major regional awards, “Best Condo Development in Asia 2019” and “Best Co-working Space in Asia 2020” at Asia’s longest-running and most respected property awards organized by PropertyGuru. Urban Hub Cambodia is behind the four most award-winning Cambodian projects both locally and regionally, including Urban Loft, Factory Phnom Penh, Urban Village Phase 1, and Urban Village Phase 2. More projects are expected in the near future.

- checking Price and process Purchase Order of construction materials.

Job Description: #NAME?
Job Requirement: - Must have at least 3 years inventory control management and supervisory experience- Strong Microsoft Office skills includes: Excel, Word, PowerPoint and Database concepts- Shows the ability to work well under pressure and very tight schedule- Solid knowledge in inventory management related areas and should be familiar with the inventory management system.- Excellent leadership skills, communication and interpersonal skills along with the ability to develop and maintain effective relations with the staff members by extending the necessary help and support will prove to be advantageous.- Project management skills, investigative nature, advanced math and technical skills would beneficial-The ability to effectively manage the subordinates, supervise them, plan, organise and control the work flow in a team environment- Good organization and business administration skills, attention to detail, willingness to improve, learn and adapt in accordance with the modern practice methods
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities

Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.

Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.

Job Description:
• Oversee daily operations.
• Enforce all workplace policies and procedures.
• Monitor patient’s condition and assess their needs to provide the best possible care and advice.
• Observe and interpret patient’s symptoms and communicate them to physicians.
• Recording patient’s vital signs and medication information and fill in patient’s charts.
• Adjust and administer patient’s medication and provide treatments according to physician’s order.
• Inspect the facilities and act to maintain excellent hygiene and safety (decontaminating equipment, sanitizing surfaces, preparing beds etc…).
• Provide instant medical care in emergencies.
• Check and maintain nursing supplies.
Job Requirement:
• Diploma/Bachelor’s degree in nursing required.
• 1-3 years nursing experiences.
• Basic computer skills.
• Experiences in home health care.
• Experiences in emergency room or intensive care.
• Ability to effectively communicate with patients, families, physician and staff.

• ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកបុណ្យជាតិដោយមានប្រាក់ឈ្នួល យោងតាមសេចក្តីប្រកាសរបស់ក្រសួងការងារ និងបណ្តុះបណ្តាលវិជ្ជាជីវៈ

•  វគ្គបណ្ដុះបណ្ដាលល្អៗសម្រាប់ការអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងារ

Job Description: ១. សេវាកម្មសុវត្ថិភាព- គ្រប់គ្រង​ ប្រព័ន្ធសុវត្ថិភាពបរិវេណសាលា និងសាធារណៈ- ចោរកម្មគ្រប់រូបភាព- ការសេព និងជួញដូរគ្រឿងញៀន- ការនាំចូលអាវុធជាតិផ្ទុះគ្រប់ប្រភេទ- ជនមិនស្គាល់មុខ ឬជនដែលគួរឲ្យសង្ស័យ- ការបៀតបៀនកេរ្តិ៍ខ្មាស់- សំណង់អគារចាស់ ឬសម្ភារដែលងាយនឹងបាក់ធ្លាក់គ្រប់រូបភាព- កន្លែងដែលមិនមានសុវត្ថិភាពដូចជា៖ កន្លែងរអិល កន្លែងអាចប៉ះក្បាល កន្លែងមានហ្គាសកន្លែងមានចរន្តអគ្គិសនី និងកន្លែងដែលមានចរាចរណ៍ឆ្លងកាត់- សម្ភារះ និងឧបករណ៌ដែលអាចបង្កគ្រោះថ្នាក់ដល់សិស្ស និងបុគ្គលិក- ប្រព័ន្ធសង្រ្គោះ និងពន្លត់អគ្គិភ័យ- ប្រព័ន្ធប្រកាសអាសន្នពេលមានផ្សែង ឬអគ្គិភ័យ- ប្រព័ន្ទប្រកាសអាសន្នពេលជណ្តើរយន្តមានបញ្ហា- ប្រព័ន្ធសុវត្ថិភាពពេលជណ្តើរយន្តមានបញ្ហា- ប្រព័ន្ធសុវត្ថិភាពពេលដាច់អគ្គិសនី- ប៉ារ៉ែតភ្លើង និងកុងតាក់ភ្លើងតាមជាន់- សម្ភារះដែលផុតកំណត់កាលប្រើប្រាស់ (ហួសដឺឡេ)- អាហារ និងភេសជ្ជៈនំាចូលពីមជ្ឈដ្ឋានខាងក្រៅ២. សេវាកម្មសម្អាត- គ្រប់គ្រងបរិស្ថាន និងអនាម័យតាមអគារ (សេវាកម្មសម្អាត)- គ្រប់គ្រង និងចាត់ចែងបុគ្គលិកអ្នកសម្អាត- បែងចែក និងគ្រប់គ្រងផែនការសម្អាតប្រចាំថ្ងៃ- វាយតម្លៃគុណភាពសម្អាតប្រចាំថ្ងៃ- ឆ្លើយតប និងដោះស្រាយការផ្តល់យោបល់ពាក់ព័ន្ធនឹងអនាម័យពីផ្នែកផ្សេងៗ- ត្រួតពិនិត្យដើម្បីឱ្យប្រាកដថា គ្រប់ទីតាំងនៃអគារត្រូវបានសម្អាត- គ្រប់គ្រងសម្ភារ និងឧបករណ៍សម្អាតក្នុងអគារ- ត្រួតពិនិត្យគុណភាព និងផលប៉ះពាល់នៃទឹកថ្នាំសម្អាត- ផ្តល់ ឬស្នើសុំការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលជំនាញបច្ចេកទេសក្នុងករណីចាំបាច់៣. សេវាកម្មបុគ្គលិកស្នាក់នៅសាលា- ត្រួតពិនិត្យប្រព័ន្ធសុវត្ថិភាព និងបរិស្ថាននៅពេលយប់ថ្ងៃអាទិត្យ និងថ្ងៃឈប់សម្រាក- រៀបចំឈ្មោះអ្នកប្រចាំការ និងអ្នកសម្រាកនៅថ្ងៃអាទិត្យ ថ្ងៃឈប់សម្រាកប្រចាំខែ​ និងពេលបុណ្យធំៗ- ឆ្មក់ត្រួតពិនិត្យការប្រចាំការរបស់បុគ្គលិកនៅថ្ងៃអាទិត្យ និងថ្ងៃឈប់សម្រាក- តម្រង់ទិស ណែនាំ និងពន្យល់គោលការណ៍ការិយាល័យអ្នកស្នាក់នៅសាលាទៅដល់បុគ្គលិកថ្មី- ធ្វើយ៉ាងណាឱ្យបរិវេណអគារសិក្សាមានដំណើរការល្អ មានសោភ័ណភាពស្រស់​បំព្រងជានិច្ចទាំងថ្ងៃធ្វើការ និងថ្ងៃឈប់សម្រាក- រៀបចំបុគ្គលិកឱ្យគេងប្រចាំការនៅទីតាំងដែលមានហានិភ័យដែលចោរអាចចូលក្នុងអគារបាន- ដោះដូរ និងបើកសម្ភារគេងរបស់បុគ្គលិកចាស់ និងថ្មី- ផ្សព្វផ្សាយ កំណត់ចំណាំ ឬសេចក្តីរម្លឹកផ្ទៃក្នុង- ទទួល និងដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាទូទៅបុគ្គលិកស្នាក់នៅសាលា- ចាត់ចែងបុគ្គិលប្រចាំការពេលមានអ្នកអវត្តមាន និងបុគ្គលិកចូលថ្មី- រាយការណ៍ជូននាយកសាខា និងនាយកចាងងហ្វាងរាល់ដំណើរការការងារ ឬបញ្ហាផ្សេងៗដែលកើតឡើងនៅក្នុងសាខា- ត្រួតពិនិត្យភ្លើងប្រចាំការពេលយប់ និងភ្លើងឡូហ្កូ និងរបាយការជូនគណៈកម្មការក្នុងក្រុម Telegram- ត្រួតពិនិត្យសណ្តាប់ធ្នាប់ និងបរិស្ថានទាំងក្នុង និងក្រៅបរិវេណអគារពេលព្រឹកព្រលឹម និងរាយការណ៍ជូនគណៈកម្មការក្នុងក្រុម Telegram- មានការទំនាក់ទំនង និងសហការល្អជាមួយផ្នែកផ្សេងៗដើម្បីដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាដែលកើតមានឡើង៤. សេវាកម្មថែទាំអគារ- មើលខុសត្រូវលើការថែទាំ ជួសជុល លាងសម្អាត និងដំឡើងថ្មីនៅក្នុងអគារទាំងមូលរួមមាន ម៉ាស៊ីនត្រជាក់ ម៉ាស៊ីនភ្លើង ប្រព័ន្ធអគ្គិសនី ប្រព័ន្ធទឹក ប្រព័ន្ធលូបង្គន់ បន្ទប់ទឹក ស៊ីទែនទឹក អាងស្តុកទឹក ម៉ូទ័រទឹក គ្រឿងបរិក្ខារអគ្គិសនី អំពូលភ្លើង ទូភ្លើង ជាដើម ។ល។- ទទួលមើលការខុសត្រូវលើការជួសជុលទូទៅដូចជា ទ្វារ ចាប់ក្ដារខៀន ចាប់រូបភាព របងដែក រនាំងរុញ ការលាបថ្នាំជញ្ជាំង ពិដាន ជួសជុលដំបូល ឬធ្វើពិដានថ្មី រៀបឥដ្ឋ គម្របលូ ធ្វើការ៉ូ ការ៉ូឡា ។ល។- ទទួលបណ្ណស្នើសុំពីផ្នែកផ្សេងៗ ដើម្បីសិក្សា និងដោះស្រាយគម្រោងការងារនីមួយជាមួយក្រុមការងារឱ្យបានទាន់ពេលវេលា- ចាត់ចែងផែនការឱ្យក្រុមការងារធ្វើតាមជំនាញ (ការងារបន្ទាន់ និងការងារមិនបន្ទាន់)- សហការជាមួយអ្នកស្នើសុំតាំងពីចាប់ផ្ដើមរហូតដល់បញ្ចប់ការងារ- ធ្វើបច្ចុប្បន្នភាពការងារលើបណ្ណស្នើសុំ និងរៀបចំរបាយការណ៍ពេលបញ្ចប់គម្រោង​- សហការជាមួយក្រុមការងារជាងជំនាញខាងក្រៅ ករណីក្រុមការងារជំនាញខាងក្នុងមិនអាចធ្វើបាន ឬ ជាប់រវល់ការងារច្រើន៖- ចូលរួមសិក្សាគម្រោង- ចូលរួមសិក្សាលើការចុះកិច្ចសន្យាលើគម្រោងការងារ- សម្របសម្រួលការងារ- ពិនិត្យ និងចុះហត្ថលេខាលើឯកសាររដ្ឋបាលនានាដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ- ចូលរួមប្រជុំជាមួយផ្នែកនានា ដើម្បីដោះស្រាយបញ្ហា និងចែករំលែកព័ត៌មានទៅឱ្យក្រុមការងារ- តាមដាន ជំរុញ និងលើកទឹកចិត្តដល់កូនក្រុម- ទទួលខុសត្រូវណែនាំដល់បុគ្គលិកថ្មី មុនពេលចូលមកបំពេញការងារ- ទទួលខុសត្រូវដោះស្រាយបញ្ហានានានៅក្នុងផ្នែក- ទទួលខុសត្រូវគ្រប់គ្រងលើបញ្ជីឧបករណ៍របស់ជាងជំនាញ៥. សេវាកម្មគេហកិច្ច- គ្រប់គ្រងមើលខុសត្រូវលើការថែទាំសួន ស្រោចទឹកផ្កា និងរុក្ខជាតិ នៅក្នុង- បរិស្ថានជុំវិញខាងក្នុង និងខាងក្រៅបរិវេណអគារ- ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើការសម្អាតលម្អិត ខាត់ការ៉ូ សម្អាតកញ្ចក់ និងស្លែតាមជញ្ជាំងអគារ- រៀបចំសួន និងបណ្ដុះកូនរុក្ខជាតិ ដើម្បីបន្ថែមនៅលើថ្នាលបណ្ដុះ
Job Requirement: - បញ្ចប់បរិញ្ញាបត្រ សញ្ញាបត្រឯកទេស គ្រប់គ្រង ស្ថាបត្យកម្ម សំណង់ ជួសជុល អគ្គិសនី ឬសញ្ញាបត្រដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធនានា។- បញ្ចប់បរិញ្ញាបត្រ សញ្ញាបត្រឯកទេស គ្រប់គ្រង ស្ថាបត្យកម្ម សំណង់ ជួសជុល អគ្គិសនី ឬសញ្ញាបត្រដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធនានា។- អាចប្រើប្រាស់កម្មវិធី Word, Excel, PowerPoint និង Email បានល្អ។ចេះភាសាអង់គ្លេស អាចសរសេរ អាន​ ស្ដាប់ និងនិយាយទំនាក់ទំនងគ្នាបាន។ធ្លាប់ទទួលបានការបណ្ដុះបណ្ដាលទាក់ទងនឹងជំនាញបច្ចេកទេស និងមានឯកសារដែលទទួលស្គាល់- អាចបត់បែនតាមស្ថានភាព និងពេលវេលាធ្វើការរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន ដោយគ្មានដែនកំណត់។- មានការព្យាយាម អត់ធ្មត់ រួសរាយរាក់ទាក់ និងមានទំនាក់ទំនងល្អក្នុងការងារ។- មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ និងទទួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់ក្នុងការងារ។- មានជំនាញដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាឱ្យទាន់ពេលវេលា។- ចេះរៀបចំផែនការបែងចែកការងារ និងចេះត្រួតពិនិត្យគុណភាពការងារតាំងពីដើមដល់ចប់។- មើលឃើញបញ្ហាជាបញ្ហា និងមានដំណោះស្រាយលើបញ្ហាដែលបានរកឃើញ។- យល់ដឹងច្បាស់ពីដំណើរការ នីតិវិធី និងគោលការណ៍ក្នុងការអនុវត្ដលើការងារ។- មានជំនាញក្នុងការគ្រប់គ្រងពេលវេលា ចរចា និងវាយតម្លៃ។
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh Phnom Penh Building #223 & 227, Mao Tse Tong Blvd., Sangkat Toul Svay Prey I, Khan Boeng Keng Kang, Phnom Penh 012 797 939

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
position: សន្តិសុខ​ (ព្រះសីហនុ)
Job Description: •​ ម្ចាស់ការលើខ្លួនឯង ទំនួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់នឹងមានវិន័យល្អ។• ទទួលស្វាគមន៍អតិថិជនចេញ-ចូលក្នុងបរិវេណក្រុមហ៊ុន។• មើលការខុសត្រូវ ត្រួតពិនិត្យភ្ញៀវចេញ-ចូលក្នុងបរិវេណក្រុមហ៊ុន។• ត្រួតពិនិត្យការចេញ-ចូល សម្រាប់បុគ្គលិក ភ្ងៀវមកក្រុមហ៊ុន។• រៀបចំសណ្តាប់ធ្នាប់ នឹងរបៀបរៀបរយៈតាមបរិវេណដែលខ្លូនយាមល្បាត។• រាយការណ៍ជូនអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងជាបន្ទាន់ អំពីសភាពការណ៍មិនប្រក្រតី ដែលអាចមានហានិភ័យចំពោះក្រុមហ៊ុន។• ថែរក្សាសុវត្ថិភាពជូនបុគ្គលិក, អតិថិជនដែលកំពុងស្ថិតនៅក្នុងក្រុមហ៊ុន។• រក្សាសុវត្ថិភាព និងមើលការខុសត្រូវលើទ្រព្យសម្បត្តិមួយចំនួនរបស់អតិថិជន។• ថែទាំទ្រព្យសម្បត្តិផ្សេងៗ និងកេរ្ត៍ឈ្មោះរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន។• ការពារការបាត់បង់ ឬខូចខាតតាមរយះការធ្វើរបាយណ៌ពីអំពើខុសពីច្បាប់មកកាន់ផ្នែករដ្ឋបាល នឹងធនធាន   មនុស្ស។• យល់ពីស្ថានការនឹងបទបែនតាមកាល:ទេស:។ណៈ• ធ្វើចរាចរណ៍អោយឡានក្រុង ចេញនឹងចូលកុំអោយកកស្ទះឬប៉ះពារគ្នា។• ការពារកុំអោយមានអំពើហឹង្សាកើតមានឡើងរវាងភ្ញៀវនឹងភ្ញៀវឬបុគ្គលិកក្រុមការងារ។• ចេះជួយលើក ដាក់កាតាប  វ៉ាលីសភ្ញៀវដោយមានការប្រុងប្រយ័ត្នខ្ពស់។• ការងារដទៃទៀត ដែលកំណត់ដោយប្រធានក្រុម/ប្រធានផ្នែក។
Job Requirement: • មានអាយុចាប់ពី 18 ដល់ 50 ឆ្នាំ។• ចេះអាននិងសរសេរអក្សរខ្មែរបានខ្លះ។• មានឬគ្មានបទពិសោធន៍អាចដាក់ពាក្យបាន។• មានភាពរួសរាយរាក់ទាក់ និងមានសុជីវធម៌ល្អ។• មានកាយសម្បទាសមរម្យ និងរឹងមាំ។• មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ អត់ធ្មត់ ឧស្សាហ៍ព្យាយាម និង យកចិត្តទុកដាក់លើការងារ។• មានអត្តចរិតស្លូតបូត និងរួសរាយរាក់ទាក់។
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh Phnom Penh Building #223 & 227, Mao Tse Tong Blvd., Sangkat Toul Svay Prey I, Khan Boeng Keng Kang, Phnom Penh 012 797 939

job title: Accountant Executive (កំពត ត្រពាំងរពៅ)
position: Accountant Executive (កំពត ត្រពាំងរពៅ)
Job Description: 1. Daily Finance Operation Supporting: Daily Finance Operation Supportingo Check supported all necessary documents, processed and certified for invoice or receipt of merchandises or services in quality, quantity and priceso Check invoices or receipt for daily, weekly and monthly that collected from relevant departmento Check invoices or receipt are completed supporting document PR, PO, quote, DO, MR, etco To ensure daily recording transactions properly and accuratelyo Fully understand and comply with company and finance P & Po To be responsible for all inter-company accounts o Supporting document has been filling for audit purposeo To be responsible for all financial supporting Fixed Assetso Ensure Fixed assets listing has been recording properly o Assets registration (Coding)o Manage Fixed Asset Movemento Handling Disposal Processo Prepare month-end journalo Conduct Physical Count2. Prepare Financial Monthly Report:o Assist for prepare Monthly Financial Report P&L, BS, CF with Financial Note to comply with Cambodia IFRSo Assist for reconciled Financial Reportso Produce monthly Aging AP / AR report 3. Other Financial Supporting Operation: o Support for other management reports
Job Requirement:
REQUIREMENTS

1) Bachelor’s Degree in Finance and Accounting or related field.
2) one-year experience in accounting role.
3) Knowledge of Cambodia tax and CIFRS for SME
4) Good English skills including writing, speaking, listening and reading.
5) Dynamic personality and strong creative outlook.
6) Be honest, flexible, hardworking, and willing to travel.

position: សន្តិសុខ_សាខាភ្នំពេញ
Job Description: 1.	ការពារប្រព័ន្ធសុវត្ថិភាពបរិវេនសាលា និងសាធារណៈ ជូនដល់សិស្សានុសិស្ស បុគ្គលិក លោកគ្រូ អ្នកគ្រូ និងអ្នកអាណាព្យាបាល- ចោរកម្មគ្រប់រូបភាព- ការសេព និងជូញដូរគ្រឿងញៀន- ការនាំចូលអាវុធជាតិផ្ទុះគ្រប់ប្រភេទ- ជនមិនស្គាល់មុខ ឬជនដែលគួរឲ្យសង្ស័យ- ការបៀតបៀនកេរ្តិ៍ខ្មាស់- សំណង់អគារចាស់ ឬសម្ភារដែលងាយនឹងបាក់ធ្លាក់គ្រប់រូបភាព- កន្លែងដែលមិនមានសុវត្ថិភាពដូចជា កន្លែងរអិល កន្លែងអាចប៉ះក្បាល កន្លែងមានហ្គាស- កន្លែងមានចរន្តអគ្គិសនី និងកន្លែងដែលមានចរាចរណឆ្លងកាត់- សម្ភារ និងឧបករណ៌ដែលអាចបង្កគ្រោះថ្នាក់ដល់សិស្ស និងបុគ្គលិក- ប្រព័ន្ធសង្រ្គោះ និងពន្លត់អគ្គិភ័យ- ប្រព័ន្ធប្រកាសអាសន្នពេលមានផ្សែង ឬអគ្គិភ័យ- ប្រព័ន្ទប្រកាសអាសន្នពេលជណ្តើរយន្តមានបញ្ហា- ប្រព័ន្ធសុវត្ថិភាពពេលជណ្តើរយន្តមានបញ្ហា- ប្រព័ន្ធសុវត្ថិភាពពេលដាច់អគ្គិសនី- ប៉ារ៉ែតភ្លើង និងកុងតាក់ភ្លើងតាមជាន់- សម្ភារដែលផុតកំណត់កាលប្រើប្រាស់ (ហួសដឺឡេ)- អាហារ និងភេសជ្ជៈនំាចូលពីមជ្ឍដ្ឋានខាងក្រៅ- ទទួលស្វាគមន៍ភ្ញៀវ អ្នកអាណាព្យាបាល សិស្សានុសិស្ស និងបុគ្គលិកគ្រប់ជាន់ថ្នាក់- ថែរក្សា និងការពារទ្រព្យសម្បត្តិក្រុមហ៊ុន- កត់ត្រាឱ្យបានជាក់លាក់នូវហេតុការណ៍ដែលខុសប្រក្រតី- របាយការណ៍ឲ្យបានលម្អិតនូវឧបទ្ទហេតុដែលគួរឲ្យសង្ស័យណាមួយ- ត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងគ្រប់គ្រងប្រព័ន្ធសុវត្ថិភាពតាមច្រកចេញ ចូលអគារ- ត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងគ្រប់គ្រងរាល់ប្រព័ន្ធសុវត្ថិភាពតាមជាន់- ត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងគ្រប់គ្រងប្រព័ន្ធសុវត្ថិភាពតាមចំណត និងជុំវិញបរិវេណអគារ- ចម្លងផ្លូវសិស្សានុសិស្ស បុគ្គលិក អ្នកអាណាព្យាបាល និងសាធារណជន- អន្តរាគមន៍រាល់ពេលមានជម្លោះ ឬការផ្តុំគ្នាដែលគួរឲ្យសង្ស័យ- ប្រត្តិកម្មរហ័យទៅនឹងកណ្តឹងប្រកាសអាសន្ន និងចាប់ផ្តើមធ្វើការស៊ើបអង្កេតភ្លាមៗ- ទាក់ទងទីភ្នាក់ងារមានសមត្ថកិច្ចឱ្យមកដោះស្រាយហេតុការណ៍បន្ទាន់ផ្សេងៗ- ផាកពិន័យ ឬណែនាំសិស្សានុសិស្ស បុគ្គលិក លោកគ្រូ អ្នកគ្រូ ដែលប្រព្រឹត្តខុសច្បាប់ដែល បានចែង- សម្របសម្រួលរាល់សកម្មភាព និងព្រឹត្តការណ៌របស់សាលា- ត្រួតពិនិត្យអាវុធ សត្វ និងសម្ភារហាមឃាត់ផ្សេងៗ- ជួយសង្រ្គោះបឋម- របាយការណ៌រាល់ដំណើរការ និងបញ្ហាផ្សេងៗទាក់ទងនឹងការងាររបស់ខ្លួនជូនប្រធានសន្តិសុខ។
Job Requirement: - កម្រិតវប្បធម៌ចាប់ពីចាប់ថ្នាក់ទី៦ ឡើងទៅ- ចេះអាន និងចេះសរសេរភាសាខ្មែរបានល្អ- មានកំពស់ចាប់ពី 1.65 ម៉ែត្រ ឡើងទៅ- មានកាយសម្បទារឹងមាំ- មានអាយុចាប់ពី 18ឆ្នាំ ដល់ 40ឆ្នាំ- បទពិសោធន៍បម្រើការងារផ្នែកសន្តិសុខយ៉ាងតិច ២ឆ្នាំ - អាចបត់បែនតាមពេលវេលា និងម៉ោងធ្វើការរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន - មានការព្យាយាម និងភាពអត់ធ្មត់ក្នុងការងារ - មានភាពរួសរាយរាក់ទាក់ និងទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ - មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ និងការទទួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់ក្នុងការងារ
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh #11A, St. 402 Sangkat Tomnup teuk, Khan ChomkaMorn. phnom penh 012 797 939

company_name: VUE ASTON (The Peninsula Capital Co., Ltd)
Job Description:
1.Forecast supply and demand to prevent overstocking and running out-of-stock (OOS)
2.Enter purchase details (vendors information, invoices and pricing) into internal databases
3.Place orders to replenish merchandise as needed
4.Track shipments and address any delays
5.Oversee storage of construction, particularly of fragile items
6.Record and report stock in and out timely and in appropriate
Other tasks as assign by manager
Job Requirement:
Fluent in Khmer and English, Chinese is a plus
Strongly professional skill
Friendly, soft, good looking, flexible and smart
Be patient
Company Profile:
The Peninsula Capital Co., Ltd. is Cambodia's leading real estate developer and wealth management service provider.

The company has been profoundly engaged with the Cambodian real estate market for 15 years. The team members have got years of experience in large-scale land development and real estate projects in both China and Southeast Asia.

With continuous accumulation, the company has obtained a business model that consists of asset management, hotel operation, education, trading, media and cultural transmission all together inside the form of real estate development.

The Peninsula Capital Co., Ltd. currently has six branches in Cambodia and over 20 offices in China (including associates and strategic partners).
Contact Info: Contact Information Human Resource Department  012871694 (Telegram) & 093871694 sambath.leng@vueaston.com No. 88 National Assembly Street,Sangkat Tonle Bassac,Khan Chamkarmon, Phnom Penh. 012871694 (Telegram) & 093871694

job title: បុគ្គលិកផ្នែកអនាម័យ
company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
position: បុគ្គលិកផ្នែកអនាម័យ
Job Description: - សម្អាត និងថែទាំអនាម័យក្នុងបន្ទប់ទឹក (ស្ងួត និងអនាម័យល្អ)- សម្អាត និងថែទាំអនាម័យក្នុងបន្ទប់រៀន (មុនពេលសិស្សចូលរៀន និងក្រោយពេលសិស្សចេញពីរៀន)- សម្អាតផ្លូវដើរ និងបរិវេណខាងក្រៅបន្ទប់រៀន- សម្អាត និងរក្សាអនាម័យក្នុងបន្ទប់ការិយាល័យ (សម្អាតការ៉ូ កញ្ចក់ និងប្រមូលសម្រាម)- ប្រចាំការតាមគោលដៅដែលបានកំណត់ដើម្បីត្រួតពិនិត្យមើលបញ្ហាអនាម័យ និងបញ្ហាផ្សេងៗ- ថែរក្សា និងសន្សំសំចៃសម្ភារដែលផ្តល់ជូន- ស្នើរសុំបើកសម្ភារបន្ថែម និងរៀបចំទុកដាក់សម្ភារសម្អាតឲ្យមានសណ្តាប់ធ្នាប់- សហការណ៌ជាមួយសន្តិសុខក្នុងការតាមដាន និងមើលការខុសត្រូវសុវត្ថិភាពតាមជាន់- ជំនួសបុគ្គលិកដែលអវត្តមាន ឬធ្វើការបន្ថែមនៅពេលដែលមានបុគ្គលិកអវត្តមាន- បោកគក់កម្រាលសាឡុង វាំងនន និងសម្ភារប្រើប្រាស់ផ្សេងៗ- សម្អាតអគារលម្អិតអំឡុងពេលវិស្សមកាល (Vacation or Term Break)- របាយការណ៌រាល់បញ្ហា និងដំណើរការណ៌ការងារជូនប្រធានសន្តិសុខ និងអនាម័យប្រចាំអគារ- សម្អាតលម្អិត (សម្អាតសើម) តាមគោលដៅរបស់ខ្លួន ១ ក្នុងមួយថ្ងៃ- ជូតសម្អាតបន្ទប់ទឹក និងបរិក្ខាក្នុងបន្ទប់ទឹក (សម្អាតលម្អិត២ដង)- ថែទាំអនាម័យក្នុង បន្ទប់ទឹកគ្រប់ពេលមានបញ្ហា- បោសសម្អាតតាមផ្លូវដើរ, កន្លែងទទួលភ្ញៀវ និងកន្លែងដែលប្រឡាក់ ឬមានធូលី- ដាក់ផ្លាកសញ្ញាប្រយ័ត្នរអិលជានិច្ចមុនពេលជូតសម្អាត- ដើរត្រួតពិនិត្យគោលដៅរបស់ខ្លួន និងធ្វើការសម្អាតភ្លាមពេលឃើញមានបញ្ហា- សម្អាតក្រណាត់ជូត និងធុងគាប់ ជាប្រចាំក្រោយពេលសម្អាតរួច- រៀបចំទុកដាក់សម្ភារៈអោយមានសណ្តាប់ធ្នាប់ តាមការណែនាំ- លាងសម្អាតធុងសម្រាមនៅតាមគោលដៅរបស់ខ្លួនមុនពេលចេញទៅផ្ទះ- បែងចែកសម្រាមតាមប្រភេទ (សម្រាមស្ងួត សម្រាមសើម និងកំប៉ុង)- ប្តូរថង់សម្រាមតាមបន្ទប់ទឹក- គូសសញ្ញា () លើតារាងសម្អាតបន្ទប់ទឹក ក្រោយពេលសម្អាតរួចហើយ- ត្រួតពិនិត្យមើលសម្ភារប្រើប្រាស់ ដើម្បីជៀសវាងការខ្វះខាតពេលត្រូវការយកមកប្រើ- ស្នើសុំបើកសម្ភារតាមតម្រូវការជាក់ស្តែង (មានការឯកភាពពីប្រធានផ្នែក)- របាយការណ៌រាល់បញ្ហាជួសជុលទៅប្រធានផ្នែក ឬបុគ្គលិកថែទាំអគារ- ប្តូរទឹក និងលាងសម្អាតធុងគាប់ក្រណាត់ ក្រោយពេលជូតសម្អាតរួចហើយ- ហាលសម្ងួតក្រណាត់ (ឱ្យមានរបៀប) ក្រោយពេលសម្អាត- បិទភ្លើងក្រោយពេលសម្អាត ឬបិទភ្លើងខ្លះមុនពេលសម្អាត (បើកវាំងននបង្អូច)- ត្រួតពិនិត្យកន្លែងរៀងៗខ្លួនមុនពេលចេញទៅផ្ទះ- សហការណ៌ជាមួយសន្តិសុខក្នុងការតាមដាន និងមើលការខុសត្រូវសុវត្ថិភាពតាមជាន់- របាយការណ៌រាល់បញ្ហា និងដំណើរការណ៌ការងារជូនប្រធានសន្តិសុខ និងអនាម័យប្រចាំអគារ- ត្រូវមានភាពរួសរាយរាក់ទាក់ស្វាគមន៍ចំពោះសិស្ស និងអ្នកអាណាព្យាបាល - ត្រូវសហការជាមួយសន្ដិសុខ បើឃើញសិស្សប្រព្រឹត្ដខុសពីច្បាប់ និងវិន័យសាលា ត្រូវរបាយការណ៍ ប្រាប់សន្ដិសុខអោយនាំទៅការិយាល័យកិច្ចការសិស្ស ដើម្បីអោយគ្រូដោះស្រាយ និងណែនាំ ។- ពេលសិស្សចេញលេងត្រូវជួយដើរមើលសកម្មភាពសិស្ស ជាពិសេសនៅតាមបន្ទប់ និងតាមគៀនកោះ - ត្រូវធ្វើការសម្អាតភ្លាម នៅពេលដែលសិស្សសំណូមពរអោយជួយ រឺក៏ឃើញមានទឹកកំពប់ ។- ត្រូវឧស្សាហ៍សង្កេតមើលសិស្សដែលចូលក្នុងបន្ទប់ទឹកយូពេកព្រោះអាចមានបញ្ហាអ្វីមួយ រឺក៏មានសិស្ស ប្រឡែងគ្នាក្នុងបន្ទប់ទឹក - ពេលដល់ម៉ោងចូលរៀន អ្នកអនាម័យត្រូវជួយប្រាប់អោយសិស្សចូលេរៀន លើកលែងតែសិស្សមជ្ឈមណ្ឌលភាសា អេ អាយ អាយ ដែលមានអាយុលើ១៦ឆ្នាំ
Job Requirement: - កម្រិតវប្បធម៌ចាប់ពីចាប់ថ្នាក់ទី៦ ឡើងទៅ- ចេះអាន និងចេះសរសេរភាសាខ្មែរបានល្អ- មានកាយសម្បទារឹងមាំ- មានអាយុចាប់ពី 20ឆ្នាំ ដល់ 40ឆ្នាំ- បទពិសោធន៍បម្រើការងារផ្នែកអនាម័យចាប់ពី១ឆ្នាំឡើងទៅ - អាចបត់បែនតាមពេលវេលា និងម៉ោងធ្វើការរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន - មានការព្យាយាម និងភាពអត់ធ្មត់ក្នុងការងារ - មានភាពរួសរាយរាក់ទាក់ និងទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ - មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ និងការទទួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់ក្នុងការងារ
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description:
• Sourcing from other sources, purchase goods and services and negotiate for best price and good term of payments
• Cooperate with Shops, Standard Company or wholesale for purchase
• Search for new suppliers, and competitors to compete with existing suppliers
• Issue stationery stock and dispatching the stock from MTT to CA if necessary
• Prepare Debit note and Credit note
• Cooperate and build good relationship with relevant departments to identify the specific needs
• Make sure the purchased items matches with the requirement
• Manage Petty Cash and prepare expense report and credit daily in computer for Procurement Supervisor
• Make sure to check with stock keeper before ordering
Job Requirement:
• A bachelor degree in Business Administration, Accounting or any other relevant fields
• At least 1-2 years of work experiences in Procurement and sourcing
• Familiar with Windows Live Mail and MS. Office is highly desired, not mandatory for SUN system
• Understanding logistics concepts
• Familiarity with sourcing, vendor management and warehouse stock report and control
• Solid judgement along with decision making skills;
• Good oral and written both English and Khmer communication skills;
• Be friendly, flexible, honest, hard-working, and be able to work under the pressure and workload.
• Good negotiation, Communication, and interpersonal skills and problem-solving skills;
• Ability to Prioritize tasks

• ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកបុណ្យជាតិដោយមានប្រាក់ឈ្នួល យោងតាមសេចក្តីប្រកាសរបស់ក្រសួងការងារ និងបណ្តុះបណ្តាលវិជ្ជាជីវៈ
•  ឱកាសអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងាររបស់ខ្លួន
•  វគ្គបណ្ដុះបណ្ដាលល្អៗសម្រាប់ការអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងារ
•  អាហារូបករណ៍ដល់បុគ្គលិក និងសមាជិកគ្រួសាររបស់បុគ្គលិក
•  ការដំឡើងប្រាក់បៀវត្សប្រចាំឆ្នាំ ដោយផ្អែកលើបទពិសោធន៍ការងារ និងតាមការវាយតម្លៃគុណភាពការងារ
•  ប្រាក់បំណាច់អតីតភាពការងារ

Company Profile:
Starting from 1951 in Texas, United States, Circle K is now one of  the most widely recognized convenience store brands, known worldwide for  quality products & great customer service with more than 15.000  associates worldwide including Hong Kong, China, Vietnam, Indonesia,  UAE, Macau, Mexico, Honduras, Guam, Malaysia, The Philippines, Egypt  & Costa Rica…

At Circle K Cambodia, our mission is to be the best and most convenient place for all of your daily shopping needs.

Vision
To be the leading No 1 Neighborhood Convenience Store in Cambodia providing 24 hours conveniences, exclusive merchandise and value added services to our customers.

Mission
To Make Our Customer Life’s a Little Easier Everyday

Core Value
1- Customer Focus: Customer are the reason for our success in Business and we are committed to listen and respond positively to their need.
2- Integrity: Honest, Trustworthy, Adhere to Strong Moral and Ethical Principle and Value.
3- Teamwork: one team, one goal and one direction – with collaboration, share and support each other.
4- Accountability: taking ownership for a task or role and committed to execute and deliver result.
5- Courtesy & Respect: treating other people the way you want to be treated.
6- Continuous Growth: Proactive to Adapt to Instance change.
7- Excellent: Aim for higher quality and accuracy, usually above performance standard.

Currently Circle K Cambodia is having more than 35 Store locate in the following:
- Phnnom Penh
- Siem Reap
