Company Profile: Since its founding in 1982, Chip Mong has focused extensively on the changing needs of the society and the strengthening of its relationships with business communities, both domestically and internationally. In recent years, Chip Mong has experienced tremendous growth and evolved into one of the largest groups of companies in the country, comprising seven wholly-owned subsidies, three joint-ventures, and two hotel projects. Chip Mong’s businesses include construction and materials, consumers goods, property development, beverages, general industrials, hospitality, retail and feed. The Company also offers a vast array of consumer products from well-known manufacturers throughout the region.
Contact Info: Contact Information Sou Sophalla  096 852 98 99 sophalla.sou@chipmongbank.com Phnom Penh #137, Mao Tse Tung Blvd, Sangkat Boeung Keng Kang III, Khan Chamkarmorn, Phnom Penh Cambodia 096 852 98 99

Job Description:
- Knows all the features and benefits of the payroll’s products and services in order to efficiently train and cross sell
- Assist the branch manager/Business banking to manage the relationship with business clients
- Anticipate clients' needs and provide client solutions for both liability and asset business proactively
- Ensure close asset monitoring in compliance with bank's policies and systems
- Build and maintain strong relationship with new and existing customer
- Anticipate and resolve internal hurdles with a sense of urgency and consistency
- Promote the use of technology in line with the bank's digital-centric first strategy
- Ensure compliance to regulations and bank's policies and system
- Maximize the products and services bundling
- Maximize customer profitability through the CRM platform
- Ensure to deliver the service to the client with a respectful timeline
- Able to monitor daily customer activities and produce report to line manager
- Ensure smooth service to customer in term of Internet Banking
Job Requirement:
- At least Bachelor’s degree in Banking and other related fields
- At least 2 years experiences in banking service of payroll and trade finance
- Strong problem solving, analytical and decision-making ability
- Have experiences and/or understanding of customer centricity, agile delivery, etc
- Be innovative and think out of the box
- Have an internal drive to achieve goals/excellence/efficiencies
- Intrapreneurship with good networking
- Provide effective strategies and action plans
- Develop subordinates and share best practices with peer
- Have team leadership skills

Job Description: #NAME?
Job Requirement: - Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science or equivalent- 3 Year experience with Java and Spring framework- Backend Application Development, Team Work, Agile, DevOps,   Solution Architecture
Company Profile:
Wing Bank (Cambodia) Plc – the bank for every Cambodian – is driven by the vision to provide every Cambodian with convenient access to financial services relevant to, and for the improvement of their daily lives.

Wing Bank has revolutionized the way Cambodians access financial services by introducing instant, secure, and convenient Mobile Financial Services since 18 August 2008.

Today, Wing Bank serves the entire Cambodian population with 100% coverage of the districts in Cambodia thanks to the innovative Wing Bank App, over 10,000 Wing Cash Xpress agents, over 55,000 merchants, and partnerships with industry giants such as Mastercard, MoneyGram, AliPay, WeChat Pay, Western Union, Visa, and Ria.

Wing Bank provides an array of advanced financial products both for individual and corporate customers. These include loans, deposits, micro savings, credit referral services, money transfers, utility and insurance payments, supply chain payments, payroll services and even phone top-ups. In addition, Wing offers retail payments via “WingPay”, and has also introduced the “WingMall” e-commerce platform.

Both small and large companies alike are now using Wing’s payroll and disbursement services, speeding up their payments. Over 80% of Wing’s agents and 50% of customers are women, making Wing a shining example of gender inclusion in the region.

Wing Bank is committed to providing financial, gender and digital inclusion to the unbanked and the under-banked, allowing every Cambodian to enjoy convenience and security when it comes to financial services
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114 jobs@wingbank.com.kh Phnom Penh No. 721, Preah Monivong Blvd., Sangkat Beung Keng Kang 3, Khan Chamkar Mon, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114

Prospect   and acquire new customers with assigned segments- Work with the account executive team to design industry   specific outbound effort. Work with Client Service Team to   ensure a fit to company KYC and quality standards – customer   centricity- Utilize tool to ensure standard processes during all sales   stages- Conduct month-end and year end close process - Build long term trusting relationship with client - Present our company  to potential client - Other task has been assign by manager

6.  Ensure to understand Cambodia labor laws and companies/ department policies/ regulations are followed.
Job Requirement:
- Preferred MANDARIN Language.
- At least 3 Years of working experience in the related field is required for this position.
- Good at English (Reading & Writing), basic in communication.
- Good at Internet, MS Office (Excel, Word, Power Point).
- Good skill of Interpersonal communication and Customer Service.
- Ability to work under pressure and have good team work and regular job rotation spirit.
- Good with figures, responsible, careful, detail-oriented, dynamic and hard-working Own transportation.
Company Profile:
Evergreen Logistics Corp is a member of the Evergreen Group established by Dr. Yung-Fa Chang on 1 September 1968 in Taiwan. We provide freight forwarding, logistics operations, customs brokerage, warehousing and distribution, project shipment, advanced IT platforms and customized total solutions － all with value-added services.

ELC have 42 own branches offices and have a very intensive network around the world. The experienced and professional team of our own offices in Taiwan, Mainland China, Southeast Asia , India & United States as well as agents in North East Asia, the Europe, the Mediterranean, Australia, and Africa provides our valuable business partner with the most cost-effective and time-critical solutions. Via a single platform, our worldwide IT solutions provide real-time data to customers wherever they are in the world.

position: លោកគ្រូ-អ្នកគ្រូផ្នែកមធ្យមសិក្សាបឋមភូមិ (មុខវិជ្ជាប្រវតិ្តវិទ្យា(០២នាក់) និងមុខវិជ្ជារូបវិទ្យា(០២នាក់)
Job Description:
- ពិនិត្យ និងវាយតម្លៃចំណាត់ថ្នាក់សិស្ស។
- តាមដានសិស្សខ្សោយ និងលើកទឹកចិត្តសិស្ស។
- ចុះពិន្ទុសៀវភៅតាមដានការសិក្សាសិស្ស។
- រៀបចំកិច្ចតែងការបង្រៀន។
- ចូលរួមប្រជុំប្រចាំខែជាមួយគណៈគ្រប់គ្រងសាលា។
- ចូលរួមដំណើរទស្សនកិច្ចសិក្សារបស់សិស្ស។
- ចូលរួមផលិតសម្ភារឧបទេសបង្រៀន និងរៀនជាមួយក្រុមបច្ចេកទេស។
- ចូលរួមវគ្គសិក្ខាសាលាផ្សេងៗ។
- បំពេញការងាររដ្ឋបាលគ្រូ។
Job Requirement:
- ត្រូវមានបទពិសោធបង្រៀនយ៉ាងតិច១ឆ្នាំឡើងទៅ។
- ត្រូវមានសញ្ញាបត្រកម្រិតបរិញ្ញាបត្រ ឬសញ្ញាបត្រដែលមានតម្លៃស្មើ។

- ត្រូវមានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ក្នុងការងារ។
- ត្រូវមានឆន្ទៈ និងលះបង់ខ្ពស់ក្នុងការងារ។

Job Description:
The Senior Sales Associate is responsible for providing warm welcome, effective presentation and demonstration of products and with a high level of service to customers in order to satisfy their shopping needs and enhance their shopping experience.

RESPONSIBILITIES
• Achieve sales target as assigned by the Company
• Follow the company guideline and operational standard
• Replenish products on shelf and participate in stock count
• Maintain good housekeeping conditions in the store
• Maintain well-presented visual merchandise and displays
• Provide excellent customer service and product knowledge to customers
• Assist in opening and closing of the store
• Assist in cashiering duties when required
• Assist and support in-store marketing events
Job Requirement:
REQUIREMENT
• Min. high school degree or higher in any field
• At least 1 year experience in fashion retail or service industry
• Pleasant, neat, warm and friendly personality
• Service-oriented with strong selling and customer service skills
• Strong interpersonal, communication and presentation skills
• Confident, honest, enthusiastic and a good team player
• Responsible, patient and motivated with positive work attitude
• Computer literate is an added advantage
• Good in spoken English to liaise with the superiors and serve international customers
• Commit to work on shift, long hours, weekends, and Public Holidays as needed
• Able to work at CHIP MONG 271 MEGA MALL
Company Profile:
Since starting out in 1947, Jaspal Group has substantially diversified from import home linen distribution to a highly diversified textile driven conglomerate with interests in manufacturing, trading, retailing and real estate. The Group is known for a range of products from sophisticated to chic
ranging from men & ladies fashion, bags, fashion accessories to lifestyle home fashion and bedding
products for better living.

One of the most successful companies under Jaspal Group is Jaspal Company Limited, the top leading fashion retail company in Thailand engaging in designing, manufacturing, and marketing of several clothing and accessories brands. With over 2,350 professional staff and a network of 350
shops and corners all over Thailand, the Company has also proclaimed its reputation across Asian markets, as well as other major cities in the world.

Jaspal Group has stepped forward to expand its business to Cambodia under the name of Jaspal Fashions (Cambodia) Co., Ltd. and introduced four stores namely Jelly Bunny, Lyn, Lyn Around and CC-OO to AEON Mall, Phnom Penh. We are now ready to take a new challenge to introduce more stores to AEON Mall 2.

In this occasion, we are pleased to invite the qualified candidates who are passionate about fashion to join us and become a part of the greater success.
Contact Info: Contact Information Mr. Chin Panha  N/A kh-hr@jpsfashions.com Chip Mong 271 Mega Mall (Phnom Penh) N/A

Job Description:
- Ensure the phases of project lighting design, starting from the original conception to final phases are completed on time.
- Develop lighting design solutions– lighting detailed calculations, research of fixture alternatives, review of fixture samples, construction of temporary design mockups.
- Ensure the work on Architectural 3D modeling, texturing, lighting, camera animations, rendering visuals or walk-through projects are completed as scheduled.
- Oversee the documentation of the lighting design via CAD layouts, lighting details, light fixture schedules, lighting control specifications.
- Ensure the presentation documents are well prepared and otherwise assist in presentations both internally and externally.
Job Requirement:
- Experience minimum 3 Year
- Education: BA of Art, architecture, graphic design

- Have a logical, analytical and creative approach to problem solving

- Good organizational skills, Leadership and attention to detail
- Oral and written English and Khmer communication skills

- Understanding of vision, visual performance, glare, and comfort as it relates to lighting.
- Lamp technologies (fluorescent, halogen, LED, metal halide, high pressure sodium).

company_name: Cell-Vitalis Phnom Penh Clinic Co., Ltd(CVP)
Job Description:
- Promoting the company's existing brands and introducing our services to the market
- Achieve growth and hit sales targets by successfully managing the sales team
- Design and implement a strategic business plan that expands company’s customer base and ensure it’s strong presence
- Own recruiting, objectives setting, coaching and performance monitoring of sales representatives
- Build and promote strong, long-lasting customer relationships by partnering with them and understanding their needs
- Researching and developing marketing opportunities and plans, understanding consumer requirements, identifying market trends, and suggesting system improvements to achieve the company's marketing goals
- Present sales, revenue and expenses reports and realistic forecasts to the management team
- Identify emerging markets and market shifts while being fully aware of new services and competition status
Job Requirement:
- BS/MS degree in business administration or a related field
- English in speaking is a must.
- Successful previous experience as a sales representative of hospitality, clinic, consistently meeting or exceeding targets
- Committed to continuous education through workshops, seminars and conferences
- Demonstrated ability to communicate, present and influence credibly and effectively at all levels of the organization
- Proven ability to drive the sales process from plan to close
- Strong business sense and industry expertise

* Benefits:
- Well trained with our experts
- Other benefits

* Salary: Negotiable
Interested and qualified applicants should submit only your updated covering letter and CV with current photo (4x6) via e-mail: hr.cellvitalis@gmail.com or Contact number: 093 52 58 59 / 077 52 58 59.
- Address: #55, St. 313, Sangkat Beong kak II, Khan Toul Kork, Phnom Penh. Closing date: October 30, 2022.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR & Admin   077 / 093 52 58 59 hr@cellvitalis-kh.com #55, St. 313, Sangkat Beong kak II, Khan Toul Kork, Phnom Penh. 077 / 093 52 58 59

Job Description:
1. Develops a business plan and sales strategy to meet up company target
2. Responsible for the performance and development of the Sales Team.
3. Prepares action plans by individuals as well as by the team for an effective search of sales leads and prospects.
4. Initiates and coordinates development of action plans to penetrate new markets.
5. Assists in the development and implementation of marketing plans as needed. communications, to understand training and development needs, and to provide insight
for the improvement of Sales Team’s sales and activity performance.
6. Prepare Weekly & Monthly Sales Report
7. Adheres to all company policies, procedures and business ethics codes and ensures that they are communicated and implemented within the team.
8. Ensures that all Sales Team meet or exceed all activity standards for prospecting calls, appointments, presentations, proposals, and closes. organizational and selling skills, and work habits.
9. Maintains contact with all clients in the market to ensure high levels of client satisfaction.
10. Ability to interact and cooperate with all company employees.
11. Other Assignments from Manager
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor degree Business Administration /Sale & Marketing or other related fields.
- Experience 1-2 year in sale/market with related field
- Good in English: listening, speaking, reading, and writing (Chinese is plus).
- Computer literacy – MS office, internet, and e-mail.
- Be able work independently with less supervision, high commitment, and result-oriented;
- Have knowledge of principles in writing up reporting, policies, procedures, and guidelines.
- Be able to handle multiple tasks and complexities as per number of different projects might be implemented at the same time.
- Be able to work under pressure to meet deadlines.
- Have a good background, behavior, and attitude.

** Compensation & Benefits:
- Based Pay: Negotiable
- Insurance (Health & Accident)
- Health checking every year
- with Other benefits following to the company policy
- Sale bonus 10-25% base on performant

Job Description:
- Develop hiring strategies and plans to attract talents (Weekly/Monthly/ Yearly).
- Updating the current things and designing new recruiting procedures.
- Broadcasting Job Announcement and Networking.
- Prepare job posting online (Social Networks).
- Prepare Job posting on Job Web Pages.
- Cooperate with Job Agency Companies.
- Organize or attend career fairs or other events.
- Build the company’s professional network through relationships with HR professionals,
  colleagues and other parties.
- Recruit, interview, screen for vacant positions.
- Job on-boarding off-boarding and orientation.
- Implement new sourcing methods.
- Ensure positive candidate skills and experiences matches to the title.
- Update the Job Description of each department every six months.
- Perform sourcing to fill the open positions based on deadline.
- Identify the areas of improvement or weakness in recruitment plans, strategies and
  processes.
- Coordinate with department managers to forecast future hiring needs.
- Help organize and manage new employee orientation, on boarding
- Stay up-to-date on labor legislation about changes in regulations.
- Be involved in the identification, assessment, development planning and review of
  successors.
- Update succession recruitment plan annually.
- Assist and support work with other departments in term of seeking qualified applicants.
- Make weekly / monthly / yearly report and submit to Human Resources Manager.
- Other tasks as assigned by Human Resources Manager.
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor Degree in Human Resources Management, Business Management or Equivalent.
- At least 2 years in recruitment role.
- Strong communicate and negotiation skill.
- Flexible and trustworthy.
- Strong Oriented skill.
- Location: Phnom Penh (Near Aung Doung Hospital)
Company Profile: B.H.L ANGKOR IMPORT EXPORT CO., LTD. was established in April 2014. We are capable of manufacturing PVC pipes from 13 to 15 tons (in various sizes). In the future, we will expand our capacity from 20 to 25 tons. We manufacture PVC pipes with UK or Chinese quality standards. The specification is in 3 grades, 5.0, 13.0 and 15.0. We manufacture 16 sizes, including 21, 27, 34, 42, 49, 60, 75, 80, 114, 125, 165, 216, 217, 280, 320, and 400.The special quality of Angkor PVC is toughness, durability, strength, and high water-pressure resistance. After gaining the customers’ trust, BHL has started to manufacture two additional types of PVC pipes: Dragon PVC (No. 2) and Golden Swan PVC (No. 3). With the high quality recognized by all distribution depots, customers recognize our PVC pipes across Cambodia and neighboring countries (Thailand and Vietnam).

Job Description: The objective of digital marketing is to develop strong and innovative strategies to promote the business brand, products, and services. A digital marketing professional is expected to effectively use all marketing tools and techniques like PPC, SEO, SEM, email, social media, and display advertising. job title: Supply Chain Assistant Manager - (Phnom Penh Full Time)
position: Supply Chain Assistant Manager - (Phnom Penh Full Time)
Job Description:
•	Collaborates with other departments and stakeholders to identify and maintain resources needed to establish and provide an effective supply chain.
•	Establishes performance metrics for measurement, comparison, or evaluation of factors affecting the supply chain.
•	Develops and maintains detailed inventories of materials and supplies located in the company, at sites, and in the factory.
•	Maintains required quantity of supplies and materials to optimize production.
•	Analyzes current inventories and procedures; suggests improvements to increase efficiency of supply chain and profitability for the company.
•	Develops policies to increase efficiency throughout the supply chain while ensuring quality and safety; implements subsequent changes to processes.
•	Identifies optimal shipment and transportation routes with attention to consolidation of warehousing and distribution.
•	Assesses the need for material-handling equipment and staffing; makes recommendations to ensure efficient loading, unloading, movement, and storage of materials.
•	Negotiates prices for raw material and delivery with suppliers, vendors, and/or shipping companies.
•	Participates as an advisory member of the product development team, providing information and guidance on availability and cost of supplies and materials.
•	Acts as part of the team coordinating engineering changes, product line extension, or new product launches to ensure timely and orderly material and production flow transitions.
•	Monitors the performance of suppliers, assessing their ability to meet quality and delivery requirements; identifies and qualifies new suppliers in collaboration with other departments.
•	Performs other related duties as assigned.
Job Requirement:
** Required Skills/Abilities:
•	Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
•	Excellent interpersonal and negotiation skills with a proven ability to create and maintain positive working relationships with vendors, suppliers, shippers, and customers.
•	Strong supervisory and leadership skills.
•	Excellent organizational skills and attention to detail.
•	Thorough understanding of company products and logistics.
•	Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
•	Proficient with Microsoft Office Suite or related software.

** Education and Experience:
•	Diploma or Bachelors Degree in Business or related field required.
•	Minimum one year of experience or similar relevant position required.

Seize the opportunity to prove your potential by sending your CV, Cover letter, Certificates, a copy of ID card or family book together with a recent photo by stating clearly the position you apply for. Only short-listed candidates will be contacted for interview.
- TEL: (855) 23 224 593/ 012 211-773
- Email: han.tean@kfc.com.kh

Company Profile:
FTB is Cambodia's first and foremost bank. It is a private commercial bank and has been providing customers with safe and reliable banking services for 40 years. 

The Bank was created following Sub-decree No. 1213 dated 10 October 1979 under the former regime of the State of Cambodia. In 2000, the Bank was          separated from the direct management of the National Bank of Cambodia ("the Central Bank") in order to transform its permanent identity into a state-owned commercial bank in Cambodia with the features of a Public Economic Enterprise and with the intention of conducting autonomous business              operations. 

In January 2001, the Bank obtained its banking license from the Central Bank to operate as a commercial bank in the Kingdom of Cambodia for a period of      three years starting from 4 January 2001. This was the first license granted to enable the Bank to operate as a separate legal entity independent from the Central Bank's direct management. On 8 January 2004, the Bank obtained its 2nd banking license from the Central Bank for a period of three years starting    from that date. The Bank now holds a commercial banking license, which was renewed for an indefinite period, on 21 December 2006

On 31 December 2002, the Ministry of Economy and Finance ("MEF") announced, through a Statement of Intent, the privatisation of the Bank as part of the   reform of the financial sector of the Royal Government of Cambodia. On 28 October 2005 the shareholders of the Bank, represented by the Privatisation   Committee, entered into a sales agreement with Canadia Bank and ING Holding Company. The Central Bank sold its 20% shareholding in the Bank and MEF   reduced its 80% shareholding to 10%. In 2009, in accordance with the recommendation of the Central Bank, Canadia Bank reduced its shares from 48% to  15.22% and 2 new private shareholders having respectively a share of 15.39%, entered the capital of FTB. The Bank's Memorandum and Articles of

Company Profile:
FTB is Cambodia's first and foremost bank. It is a private commercial bank and has been providing customers with safe and reliable banking services for 40 years. 

The Bank was created following Sub-decree No. 1213 dated 10 October 1979 under the former regime of the State of Cambodia. In 2000, the Bank was          separated from the direct management of the National Bank of Cambodia ("the Central Bank") in order to transform its permanent identity into a state-owned commercial bank in Cambodia with the features of a Public Economic Enterprise and with the intention of conducting autonomous business              operations. 

In January 2001, the Bank obtained its banking license from the Central Bank to operate as a commercial bank in the Kingdom of Cambodia for a period of      three years starting from 4 January 2001. This was the first license granted to enable the Bank to operate as a separate legal entity independent from the Central Bank's direct management. On 8 January 2004, the Bank obtained its 2nd banking license from the Central Bank for a period of three years starting    from that date. The Bank now holds a commercial banking license, which was renewed for an indefinite period, on 21 December 2006

On 31 December 2002, the Ministry of Economy and Finance ("MEF") announced, through a Statement of Intent, the privatisation of the Bank as part of the   reform of the financial sector of the Royal Government of Cambodia. On 28 October 2005 the shareholders of the Bank, represented by the Privatisation   Committee, entered into a sales agreement with Canadia Bank and ING Holding Company. The Central Bank sold its 20% shareholding in the Bank and MEF   reduced its 80% shareholding to 10%. In 2009, in accordance with the recommendation of the Central Bank, Canadia Bank reduced its shares from 48% to  15.22% and 2 new private shareholders having respectively a share of 15.39%, entered the capital of FTB. Comparison, incremental and growth analysisc. And to generate insights, and drive strategies and/or initiatives to increase site traffic, improve engagement, maximize conversion, and achieve sales goals14. Job Description: Lead and motivate staff under the Operation Support Department in order to provide reliable and consistent support to all related functions within Foreign Trade Bank of Cambodia (FTB).Manage, supervise, and oversee all offices, units and functions within the Operation Support Department including clearing services, domestic remittances, network-wide cash management, reconciliation and settlement.Work closely with other functions such as IT and Branch Network to improve process by automating from manual where possible.Develop, update, and implement the department manual, guidelines and procedures to ensure accuracy, efficiency, and compliance.Manage, supervise, and monitor cash management of all branches and provide cash transit between branches.Work with related departments to ensure that cash management and movement across the network are in line with the approved process and guidelines.Manage to ensure cash level is sufficiently maintained across the network, branches, and ATM network, and cash report is reconciled and produced as per the required process.Immediately escalate and find solution to any issues or incidents regarding with the Operation Support Department.Ensure all cash withdrawal from NBC and provide to branches on time and properly, and supervise the strong room and the daily cash transfer within the network.Solve and follow-up all issues related to cash deposit/withdrawal in clearing house.Build a good relationship with NBC and other banks.Process outgoing fulfillment, retrieval request, chargeback and other dispute activity under CSS, Visa and other scheme dispute resolution process and rules for issuing and acquiring.Verify and process all related payment and expense under Card Centre and before payment is made by banking Finance Department.Perform transaction receipt debit and credit adjustment related cardholder, merchant and other upon approval.Perform other tasks assigned by senior management.
Job Requirement: Bachelor’s Degree or MBA in Management, Finance and Banking, or related field.At least 8-year banking experience with strong leadership and track record in banking operation.Sound knowledge on local regulatory requirements.A strong desire to work in a team and deal with challenge.High attention to details and accuracy.Practical knowledge and experience in operation, operational risk, and compliance.Solid skills in planning, organizing, and problem solving.Customer centric mindset in managing the operation function.
Company Profile:
FTB is Cambodia's first and foremost bank. It is a private commercial bank and has been providing customers with safe and reliable banking services for 40 years. 

The Bank was created following Sub-decree No. 1213 dated 10 October 1979 under the former regime of the State of Cambodia. In 2000, the Bank was          separated from the direct management of the National Bank of Cambodia ("the Central Bank") in order to transform its permanent identity into a state-owned commercial bank in Cambodia with the features of a Public Economic Enterprise and with the intention of conducting autonomous business              operations. 

In January 2001, the Bank obtained its banking license from the Central Bank to operate as a commercial bank in the Kingdom of Cambodia for a period of      three years starting from 4 January 2001. This was the first license granted to enable the Bank to operate as a separate legal entity independent from the Central Bank's direct management. On 8 January 2004, the Bank obtained its 2nd banking license from the Central Bank for a period of three years starting    from that date. The Bank now holds a commercial banking license, which was renewed for an indefinite period, on 21 December 2006

On 31 December 2002, the Ministry of Economy and Finance ("MEF") announced, through a Statement of Intent, the privatisation of the Bank as part of the   reform of the financial sector of the Royal Government of Cambodia. On 28 October 2005 the shareholders of the Bank, represented by the Privatisation   Committee, entered into a sales agreement with Canadia Bank and ING Holding Company. The Central Bank sold its 20% shareholding in the Bank and MEF   reduced its 80% shareholding to 10%. In 2009, in accordance with the recommendation of the Central Bank, Canadia Bank reduced its shares from 48% to  15.22% and 2 new private shareholders having respectively a share of 15.39%, entered the capital of FTB. Job Description:
- Conduct independent credit risk assessments on loan applications and submit to loan committee for approval.
- Examine financial transactions and credit history case by case.
- Evaluate the financial status of clients including financial ratios, trend, cash flow analysis, and financial projections.
- Evaluate clients’ credit data and financial statements in order to determine the degree of risk involved in lending money to them.
- Analyze the data and preparing reports about the degree of risk in lending money to clients.
- Analyze client records and using the data to recommend payment plans.
- Draft models of credit information that predicts trends and patterns.
- Other tasks assigned by management.
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor Degree in Banking, Finance, Management, Marketing or related fields.
- Minimum of 1 year of related experience in banking sales or leasing finance.
- Commit to the core value of the company.
- Knowledge of sales, finance lease, marketing, economic, banking.
- Ability to propose, plan and execute marketing strategies.
- Able to work under pressure.
- An interest in financial products and markets.

Salary and Benefits:
A competitive salary based on education, prior-experience and potential are provided. Camma offers annual salary increase plus other benefits such as annual incentive, pchum ben and khmer new year’s bonus, medical allowance, life and personal accident insurance, staff wedding, maternity, paternity and children allowance, scholarship, uniform, and good working condition with other human resource policies paralleling to Labor Law of Kingdom of Cambodia.

The successful candidates will be equipped with numerous training and development programs in order to enhance the competency to be high dedicated and talent employees by corporative colleagues and managements and be long term career with Camma.

All interested and merit candidates meeting the above requirements should submit cover letter and CV with current photo, family book, ID card, or certificate of birth, any diplomas or certificates or a copy of previous employment recommendation to Camma’s Head Office or the branches nearest to you or via email recruitment@camma.com.kh and with salary expectation.

job title: Head of Marketing and Product Development Department (1 position)
position: Head of Marketing and Product Development Department (1 position)
Job Description:
- Develop up-to-date policy, procedures, form templates, guidelines and protection of Camma Microfinance Limited in a sufficient and timely manner.
- Analyse the market research conducted by the Marketing and Product Development Department to be aware of market trends, market competition, and gaps between exiting microbusiness, personal consumption and staff loan products and market needs.
- Manage on oversee the feedback collection analysis and give recommendations for ensuring of smoothness the policies and procedures implementation and product modification.
- Obtains market share by developing marketing plans and programs for each product; directing promotional support.
- Managing all marketing activities such promotion, campaign, or other special event timely and effectively regarding to marketing plan.
- Monthly, quarterly and yearly review actions plan to achieve KPIs setting.
- Develop an up-to-date, sufficient and specific debt resolution strategy.
- Develop, maintain and update marketing materials such as brochures, posters, leaflets, website, Facebook, YouTube, etc.
- Give productive ideas and comments to be better for the design works.
- Ensure that all marketing materials and product development designs are addressed to the customers’ needs and market competition.
- Monitor medium-sized loan and staff loan quality and take a proper and timely action against arising issues.

Job Description:
Aside from the fact that we are number one, you should be motivated by success and the fantastically enhanced lifestyle by living in Cambodia and the earnings that come with the opportunity that we are offering, plus plenty of hard work!

A bit about Us, we are striving to make the process of buying or selling a property as simple as booking a holiday. As a full-service brokerage, we combine market-leading technology and boast over 200,000 monthly visitors directly to our multilingual websites in Cambodia and register 100’s of new clients each month with access to over 30,000 directly available property listings on one simple-to-use platform.

At Realestate.com.kh & FazWaz, you’ll have an experienced team to support you from start to finish for every deal, leveraging powerful marketing and agent tools that streamline your workflow and truly give you a competitive edge. If your passion is serving customers in a collaborative, tech-savvy environment PLUS making more money than any of your peers in Cambodia or outside, then come join us!

The Role

- Meet all your clients through Realestate.com.kh, FazWaz or by referral — no prospecting is required.
- Build relationships with buyers while sharing your expertise to help them navigate their home purchase.
- Receive hands-on training and mentoring in programs designed to support your success
- Benefit from a full team of support staff responsible for qualifying, scheduling, coordination, and the full closing process (we have a dedicated team transaction management team).
- Use our custom-built online and mobile tools to access the latest market data and manage your transactions, client information, and more.
Promote into a senior agent role based on performance

What we're looking for

- English and any other language are a bonus.
- Ideally, two years of experience in real estate but not essential
- Natural salespeople don’t always have sales experience
- Knowledge of Cambodia and specific regions is a bonus but NOT required
- Customer-advocate mindset and a commitment to delivering the best client experience possible
- Likeable personality - people buy from people they like and trust
- Enthusiasm for learning new innovative tech tools
- Any real estate sales experience in another country is a bonus but not required 

What We Offer

- Compensation Package: Base salary + High commission or Commission only
- Bespoke induction & ongoing training
- Existing database and guaranteed lead generation
- Incentives throughout the year
- Career progression
- Work permit & visa (for foreigners only).

Interviews happening now with flexible start dates
Job Requirement: Market leading trainingAnnual company tripOffice located in BKK1Base salary + bonusesCareer development
Company Profile:
Established in 2009, Realestate.com.kh is the largest digital real estate company in Cambodia. We combine market-leading technology and boast over 200,000 monthly visitors directly to our multilingual websites in Cambodia, registering 100’s of new clients each month with access to over 30,000 directly available property listings on one simple-to-use platform.

Realestate.com.kh co-broke with all the leading real estate agents in Cambodia and has direct access to every developer in the country. Giving our agents access to more stock (properties) than anyone else.

Company Profile: Hi-Tech Apparel are a world-class leader in garment manufacturing in South East Asia, with over 14,000 team members across our growing manufacturing facilities in Thailand, Cambodia, Vietnam, and Laos, who together produce over 60 million products each year.We are proud of the long-term relationships we have built with our partners, and we are trusted by some of the world’s most valuable brands to deliver exceptional levels of craftsmanship and service.Our long history of success has been built on our key differentiators of world-class manufacturing operations, long-term growth with our partners, excellence in sustainability throughout our business, and collaborating with stakeholders to lead our industry in terms of innovation, automation, digitalization, and responsiveness.

Job Description: ***JOB DESCRIPTION (Planner)1. To support customer’s requirements and needs.2. Production planning 2 weeks ahead.3. Monitor and follow up material status to the production line for achieving the plan.4. Support and control production line, monitor output to achieve revenue of the company.5. Coordinate all concerning departments to meet the planning.6. Take care and support subordinates.7. Adjustment the planning every time either material or quality problems.8. Make and monitor weekly shipment plan reports.9. Monitor and control overtime of production line.10. Doing reports for Manager and Director.11. Perform other tasks as assigned by the superior.**Job Description (Sr. Purchasing Officer) Follow up Shipment:  -Prepare material shortage report (ZRMM0010)  -Verify shortage, new delivery date (Pull in/Push back) send report to suppliers  -Discuss with supplier of new delivery date  -Verify price on PO with supplier (to reduce invoice discrepancy) when shipment reach SVI. Expect response by Tuesday evening.  -Supplier work on PO acknowledgement, confirm delivery.  -Expect all suppliers reply on Thursday evening.PurchasingRisk Material Management (Prevent material excess)Duplicate PO, Quality over requirement  -Negotiate with supplier to cancel PO.  -Avoid purchase from stockiest.PO cancellation  -Verify outstanding PO report  -Work with MC to close PO which vendor commitment beyond MDS/forecast.RTV  -Work with supplier to take rejected materials  -Return with 7-14 days.  -Supplier refuse to take non conformance materials will be documented in supplier quarterly performance evaluation.  -Daily-weekly practiceOutstanding PO closure (long ageing PO)  -Weekly review PO outstanding   -Work with MC ensure no requirement on that PO.  -Close PO  -Weekly practice.
Job Requirement: ***JOB REQUIREMENT (Planner)- Graduated high school, Vocational school, or Bachelor’s Degree- Good of English in speaking, reading, and writing (Thai speaker is advantages)- Male or Female- Computer skills Microsoft Word, PowerPoint, Excel, and SAP- Excellence health- Good attitude and strong commitment to follow the direction of superior- Ability to monitor the Operators and supervision*** JOB REQUIREMENT (Sr. Purchasing Officer)- Education: Bachelor’s Degree in any field - Foreign languages : - Need Chinese Speaker;- Good English (Read, Write and Speak); - Good Thai (not require but advantages)- Experience : 2-3 years - Special skills: Analytical skills, Able to work under pressure, Proactive approach
Company Profile:
SVI is a leading EMS service provider and a highly esteemed Public Limited Company founded in 1985. Our company has since been providing total Electronics and Manufacturing solutions in Thailand with additional regional and global operations across South East Asia, Europe and USA. Presently, SVI is recognized as a market leader in these global markets.

Our operations cover specialized EMS manufacturing and solution oriented services; including but not limited to, Industrial Electronics, Micro-Electronics for telecommunications components, specialized electronic assemblies and medical technologies industries.

Within these specialist EMS areas, SVI’s highly experienced EMS teams leave no stone unturned in our client’s EMS analysis so we can meet their every need. As a result, our EMS experts are able to continuously deliver the most competitive operational costs offering true value to all our client’ operations.

In order to adequately serve these EMS markets cost effectively and logistically, SVI’s primary operations are strategically located just 45 minutes from Bangkok’s main international airport and only 90 minutes from Thailand’s busiest and most advanced seaport.

At the heart of SVI’s solution based services and operational excellence is a professional company culture working to build amicable business relationships and partnerships.

Job Description:
- Department : Customer Service Export Department
- Location : Phnom Penh
- Schedule : Monday-Saturday (Morning Only): From 08am 12:00am and 1:30pm -05:30pm
- Reporting Line : Customer Service Export Manager
- Scope of Job : Handle export by Air and by Sea, filing and reporting job files to manager and other tasks assigned by manager.

Job Responsibilities:
• Receive reservations for export services from customers and apply for export permits to partner companies for confirmation.
• Create a Job File in the Data Management System (E-Cargo System)
• Reserve space (cargo space) and ensure successful booking from local carrier / ship / company-airline (co-loader / shipping line / airline) according to the destination of the goods.
• Request the draft Bill of Loading and VGM (Verify Gross Mass) after the goods have entered the container to prepare the goods (BL) to send to customers for review and approval in a timely manner.
• Send ISF (Import Security Filing) data to a partner for filing for export to the United States. 
• Incorporate AMS / ACI / AFR data in the data transmission system to the Customs Data Management System for all shipments exported to the United States / Canada / Japan. 
• Confirm the terms of delivery service (shipping term, freight term, profit share,…) on the shipping documents (Bill of Loading) and Quote and send to the accounting department to issue an invoice (Invoice) for the service fee or Local delivery fee to customers as well as Debit Note to partner company.
• Follow-up to get the invoice (Invoice / Debit Note) from the supplier to prepare for the accounting department.
• Verify the invoice (Invoice / Debit Note) from the shipping company or the shipping company or supplier and make a summary to the head of export services for approval and send to the accounting department to prepare the payment.
• Send Final Shipping Advice / Pre-alert notification with shipping documents and Debit Note to partner company.
• Check, verify and sign to receive the Customs Declaration Document, ensuring the accuracy and completeness.
• Compile and save all documents of each shipment correctly, both Soft and Hard Copy
• Submit the Job File to the Division Manager to check that it is correct and complete according to the company's policy.
• Summary of weekly and uplifting report to the section manager
• Ensure good customer service on the delivery of goods from start to finish and inform, as well as provide solutions to partners and customers when any changes occur during the service.
• Establish good relationships and cooperation with customers as well as suppliers and partner companies to ensure better performance in accordance with the company's service standards.
Job Requirement:
• Hold Undergraduate or Bachelor Degree in a related filed
• Experience in Forwarder company is a plus.
• Strong commitment and aggressively to achieve highest result
• Good command of English
• Computer literature (Ms. Word, Internet and Email)
• Able to use social network (Telegram, We-chart, What up…)
• Flexible and independent personality, good communication, honest and hard working

Job Description:
- កន្លែងធ្វើការ : ផ្ទះថៅកែ(ខ្មែរ) ផ្ទះវិឡាបុរីពិភពថ្មី វត្តសំរោងអណ្តែត សង្កាត់គោកឃ្លៀង ខណ្ឌសែនសុខ រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ 
- ម៉ោង និងកាលវិភាគការងារ : ព្រឹកម៉ោង៦រៀបចំអាហារពេលព្រឹក ម៉ោង១០ចំអិនអាហារថ្ងៃត្រង់ និងម៉ោង៥ចំអិនអាហារពេលល្ងាច ពីថ្ងៃចន្ទ-អាទិត្យ ឈប់សម្រាក់បាន២ថ្ងៃក្នុង១ខែ ដោយផ្តល់អោយតែថ្ងៃអាទិត្យប៉ុណ្ណោះ
- ផ្តល់ជូន : មានផ្តល់បន្ទប់ស្នាក់នៅ អាហារ៣ពេល និងអត្ថប្រយោជន៍ផ្សេងៗទៀត

ភារកិច្ច និងការងារដែលត្រូវទទួលខុសត្រូវ
1. ធានាឲ្យបានភាពស្អាត មានអនាម័យគ្រប់ពេល មានរបៀបរៀបរយក្នុងបរិវេណផ្ទះបាយ 
2. រៀបចំចំអិនម្ហូបអាហារបានគ្រប់គ្រាន់ សមស្របសម្រាប់សមាជិកក្នុងគ្រួសារ ទាំងអស់ និងទាន់ពេលកំណត់ទាំងពេលព្រឹក ថ្ងៃត្រង និងល្ងាច
3. យកចិត្តទុកដាក់ ធ្វើតាមការណែនាំរបស់ម្ចាស់ផ្ទះអំពីរបៀបចម្អិន ការផ្សំគ្រឿង រស់ជាតិ ការរៀបចំចាន ស្លាបព្រា សម តុអាហា កម្រាល និងអាហារ
4. ត្រួតពិនិត្យអំពីគុណភាព និងបរិមាណនៃម្ហូបអាហារដែលបានចំអិនរួច 
5. គោរពពេលវេលាការងារ និងបំពេញការងារឲ្យបានទៀងទាត់ជាប្រចាំ
6. បំពេញការងារផ្សេងៗដែលចាត់តាំងដោយថៅកែ
Job Requirement:
1. ភេទស្រី ត្រូវមានអាយុចាប់ពី ២០ឆ្នាំឡើងទៅ៤៥ឆ្នាំ
2. ចេះធ្វើម្ហូបខ្មែរ និងបែបចិន ជាដើម
3. មានសុខភាពល្អ រ៉ឹងមាំ មិនមានជំងឺឆ្លងផ្សេងៗ មានកាយសម្បទារគ្រប់គ្រាន់ មានអនាម័យខ្លួនល្អ មានកាតចាក់វ៉ាក់សាំងជំងឺកូវីត19 គ្រប់ដូស
4. មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ អត់ធ្មត់ខ្លាំង ស្តាប់និងធ្វើតាមការណែនាំ យល់កិច្ចការ មិនរឹងរួស រួសរាយរាក់ទាក់ កាយវិការអត្តចរិកល្អ សំដីសំដៅល្អដឹងខ្ពស់ទាប មិនប្រកាន់ខឹងច្រើន មិនចូលចិត្តបង្ករឿងឬនិយាយរឿងអុចអាលរបស់អ្នកដទៃ និង ចេះជួយគ្នាទៅវិញទៅមកដោយទឹកចិត្ត 
5. មានបទពិសោធន៏ការងារយ៉ាងតិច២-៣ឆ្នាំខាងផ្នែកចុងភៅ
6. មានជំនាញខាងគ្រប់គ្រងផ្ទះបាយ
7. មានសីលធម៌ក្នុងការប្រាស្រ័យទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ
8. ជាមនុស្សអត់ធ្មត់នឹងការងារ
9. ចេះគោរពពេលវេលា
10. សមត្ថភាពក្នុងការធ្វើការងារច្រើនក្នុងពេលតែមួយ និងចេះបត់បែនតាមកាលៈទេសៈការងារ

Job Description:
•	Launch and develop the finance and accounting department from scratch.
•	Manage daily bookkeeping, accounts payable and receivables, payroll, assistance with end-of-month close, grant reporting,
•	audit preparation, and other related duties as assigned
•	Analyze monthly financial statements (balance sheet, income statement, and statement of cash flows) and effectively convey
•	analysis to the top management as requested
•	Manage monthly and annual tax declaration related duties
•	Assist in preparing year-end books for audit
•	Manage other related duties requested by the top management.

Working Day/Hour
•	Working Day : Monday to Saturday (6days/week)
•	Working Hour : 8:00am to 5:00pm (8hours/day, 1hour lunch break)

Allowance & Benefits
•	Bonus: 1 month salary/year
•	Transport Allowance: To be confirmed
•	Food Allowance: To be confirmed
•	House Allowance: To be confirmed
•	Attendance Allowance: To be confirmed
•	OT pay: Yes (Refer to labor law)
•	Annual Leave: 1.5 days per a month of services(Refer to labor law)
•	NSSF: To be confirmed
•	Seniority Bonus: Refer to labor law
Job Requirement:
Skills and Ability
•	Language Competency in Khmer and English.
•	Bachelor or Master in Accounting or Finance.
•	ACCA qualification
•	Good at financial analysis and reporting.
•	Good team player and be able to lead a team.

Desired Qualification
•	Experience of starting a finance and accounting operation at a newly established company
•	Experience in automotive industry
•	Experience in foreign capital companies
•	Daily conversation in Japanese

Job Description:
- Handle for Workers/Employees' Insurance with Nation Social Security Fund.
- Control and Renew for Factory Licenses to comply with Cambodian Labor Law.

- Handling and work with inspection team from Ministry in charge, and make the report to superior management.
- Random check worker’s personal profiles to make sure all workers’ documents are completed submitted.
- Conduct the weekly meeting with shop steward and discussing general labor & wage...etc.

- Other tasks will be assigned by superior management or head of admin/regional manager.

- Bachelor/Master degree from Business Administration or Law
- At least 3-5years of work experience in human resource and compliance field
- Experience in  Garment factory or Handbag Factory is highly desirable
- Proficient in Microsoft Office, including Excel, Word & PowerPoint
- Fluent and conversational English skill is required
- Good knowledge of local labor law and local HR practices
- Highly experienced in employee relations/ solving problem
- Have Experience HIGG Audit, ILO Audit, BFC, etc

Job Description:
- Experience for do the Monthly and Annual Financial Statement and Monthly Bookkeeping
- To serve the Branch of Lexmin Pty Ltd Group of Companies and be in charge of overall Financial Related Matter.
- Responsible in the keeping and maintaining of company A/R and A/P
- Be responsible with company’s overall income and expenses activities.
- Manage and handle account logs and keeping to the Australian Migration Agents Pty Ltd  Group of Companies.
- To update our Group CEO with status on company accounts.
- To assist Group CEO and delegated staff with Khmer speaking clients and company vendors relation.
- Ensure correct and on time book-keepings in compliance with Global Accounting Routines and the Global Accounts Plan.
- Ensure full compliance with all relevant local and tax requirements in terms of payments and reporting.
- To coordinate, provide and liaise with local tax authorities on all taxation related matters for Lexmin and AMA Group of Companies
- To be responsible with the keeping of company income and expenses including invoices and tax dealings with the authorities.
- To be responsible on the inter-company transactions and invoices.
- Handle staff’s payroll, taxation and visa.
- To handle company expenses sheet and requisitions from other department within the Group of companies.
- To be responsible with office administration work.
- To assist in handling phone and/or other discussions with Khmer speaking enquiries.
- To assist in any Lexmin Pty Ltd retail outlet sales, purchasing and operational account keeping.
- Able to assist client following the client’s time and availability.
- Available for travel outside Phnom Penh
- Any other duties assigned as and when required and necessary to keep abreast with the expansion of the operation of the office.
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor in Finance, Accountant or related field
- Knowledge of Cambodian Accounting system is essential
- Good command of English
- General computer MS Word & Excel, internet, email & Outlook
- At least 3 years work experience in Accounting Skill
- Application must be experience of competent in the preparation of filing of monthly VAT and other compliant tax return.

Contact us or send in your application:
- Location: Borey Peng Huoth the Star Platinium Polaris (Boeung Snor), #29&31, Street P03, Sangkat Nirouth 12357, Khan Chhbar Ampov, Phnom Penh, Cambodia.

Company Profile:
** About Lexmin Pty Ltd:
- Lexmin is a new organic agriculture company based in Phnom Penh
- Over the years the company has evolved into a value-added producer to cultivate Moringa organically and combines ancient Indian Vedic agricultural methods with state-of-the-art, ultra-high-density cultivation techniques.
- Lexmin is also a food products manufacturer, mainly on Moringa and Moringa-based health supplements and products such as Moringa Powder, Moringa Tablets and Moringa Tea, followed by a variety of other Moringa-based products.
- Our dynamic and growing company is passion driven, continuously striving to achieve the highest world-class quality of products

Job Description: •	Accountable for all services to make sure the surrounding environment is in a suitable condition to work•	To ensure all facilities are maintain and safe environment, Risk accident management, prepares tools for protection of accident•	Assist in performing "move in, move out" inspections using the "Move in, Move out" Inspection Form•	Problem solving Maintaining a safe environment with proper lighting, signage, and disability access•	Report any tenant complaints to upper management and site safety by making safety inspections•	Handle supplies and refill of any used products, have a general knowledge of unit repairs•	Perform periodic light inspections of common areas to detect lighting or security hazards•	Staff orientation at each site to make sure they have cleared environment and safety•	Coordinate with upper management any and all operating problems and solutions•	Train to subordinate to protect and use all tools to reduce risk accident on site•	Maintaining quality control procedures and follow a work priority system•	Perform minor to mid-level repair jobs can be handled, with adjustments for •	Manage any building maintenance to maintain the working environment•	Ensure all risk accidents are created and all used properly on sites•	Upkeep of the landscape around the common areas of compound•	Follow the proper procedure of documenting all duties handled•	Maintain budgets and optimize expenses for maintenance team•	Set discipline of facility maintain and safe environment•	Other tasks will be assigned by direct manager.
Job Requirement: •	Master/Bachelor degree in electricity and mechanical or related field•	Strong technical knowledge of all building systems (electrical, plumbing, air conditioner etc.)•	Ability to meet and deal tactfully and courteously with fellow employees and vendors/contractors•	Good at English or Chinese (optional) communication and computer literacy •	Has a good team player, goal-orientated, good attitude and inter-personal skills•	Knowledge in all building repair trades, work safety requirements, and repair •	Knowledge of health & safety practices and regulations•	Understanding of budgeting and performance management•	Excellent planning and leadership abilities•	Strong creative, initiative and good at multitasking.How to Apply:Interested candidates, please submit their full CVs to email: jobs@villagephnompenh.com Phone Number: 010 222 019 (Telegram)Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted for face to face interview.
Company Profile: Urban Hub Cambodia is a multi-award-winner and one of Cambodia’s biggest fully licensed real estate developers. We are committed to developing projects that provide the new generations of Cambodia with exceptional modern living and experience of the first world that focuses on “LIVE, WORK, PLAY” yet preserving the Cambodian tradition and identity of community living.Registered in 2017, Urban Hub Cambodia is a joint venture between a Hong Kong-based conglomerate, Goldfame Group, the largest Hong Kong investor in Cambodia since 1992, and a Cambodian-American real estate company, Urban Living Solutions. Urban Hub Cambodia has quickly become a leading mixed-use property developer and the first developer ever from Cambodia to win the most awards including two major regional awards, “Best Condo Development in Asia 2019” and “Best Co-working Space in Asia 2020” at Asia’s longest-running and most respected property awards organized by PropertyGuru. Urban Hub Cambodia is behind the four most award-winning Cambodian projects both locally and regionally, including Urban Loft, Factory Phnom Penh, Urban Village Phase 1, and Urban Village Phase 2. More projects are expected in the near future.

Job Description:
** General Responsibilities:
Payable and Tax Executive is mainly in charge of handling payable and taxes. He /She ensure that monthly taxes are submitted on time within 25 th of next following month. He /She ensure that the company rules, regulations, and policies are strictly applied throughout the liaising and working closely with the suppliers, General Department of Taxation, other departments, and relevant ministries. He /She is responsible for keeping all private and confidential files both soft and hard of payable and taxes.

** Specific Responsibilities:
- Receive, check, follow up invoices and employee claim
- Record invoices to Sage by cost center
- Match Invoices with Purchase Order (if applicable)
- Paying suppliers by scheduling pay checks or transfer and ensuring payment is received by supplier.
- Check, verify employees claim with document support and prepare payment by and checks or i-Banking
- Verifies vendor accounts by reconciling monthly statements and aging
- Reconciliation and handle own suspend account (accrued sundry)
- Follow up all advances and prepayment.
- Support and facilitate the month& year end closing
- Filling payment voucher both soft and hard
- Keep both soft and hard copy of tax invoices, customs receipt, tax return and other compliance document.
- Join fixed asset counting
- Prepare tax returns, payments, necessary paperwork, E-Filling, and submit to authorities in time.
- Assess, research, and inform difficult tax issues, and propose solutions
- Manage and maintain the company’s tax database
- Ensure you comply with regulations, other ministry, and local authorities
- Offer support document and liaise with auditor (desk audit, limited audit, comprehensive audit, external audit, ISO audit, and MEF audit)
- Other tasks assign by supervisor

** Other Responsibilities:
- Perform other job-related duties as assigned by the superiors
Job Requirement:
- Cambodian legal working age
- Bachelor’s degree majoring in accounting and finance or other related filed
- Minimum 2 years of experiences in the related field
- Certificate or experience in accounting and taxes field
- Tax certificate or any equivalent is a plus
- Computer proficiency: Microsoft Office, Advance excel, Adobe sign, Access and familiar with airport accounting system or other accounting system is a plus
- Access and familiar with i-banking system or other e-payment is a plus
- A good command of spoken and written English and Khmer, and other languages a plus
- Ability to work under pressure to meet specific deadlines
- Good interpersonal and communication skills
- Loyal, Confident, and highly motivated person
- Can-do attitude
Company Profile:
Cambodia Airports develops and manages Cambodia’s network of international airports located in Phnom Penh, Siem Reap, and Sihanoukville. Its teams plan and design the development of airport infrastructure, build and maintain the facilities, handle commercial activities and provides services to stakeholders, including The Royal Government of Cambodia, passengers, airlines, and tenants.

Since its inception in 1995, Cambodia Airports has generated immense economic and social benefits for Cambodia by connecting the country to the world. Its leadership in airport development and operations translates in advanced working environment, staff benefit, and Corporate Social Responsibility policies.

Company Profile:
1. VISION:
“A leading Cambodian social microfinance institution working to achieve positive and lasting changes in the livelihoods of economically active poor families in a socially responsible manner”

2. MISSION:
“To improve the livelihoods, skills, and self-confidence of poor families in Cambodia by providing responsible microfinance and complementary socio-economic services”

3. CORE VALUES:
■ INTEGRITY: 
Chamroeun provides financial services and socio-economic services to its clients to enhance their well-being. It achieves this ethically and with transparent, fair, and cost effective methods. This manner is also applied to Chamroeun’s other stakeholders.

■ QUALITY OF SERVICES: 
At Chamroeun, we believe that our clients deserve tailored as well as efficient services. We provide these services in a convenient, proactive, and timely manner.

■ TRANSPARENCY: 
At Chamroeun, we provide our clients and other stakeholders with complete and accurate information about the terms and conditions of our products and services. Information is provided in a user-friendly manner to enable them to easily understand those terms and conditions.

■ FAIR PRACTICES: 
At Chamroeun, we ensure that the services we provide to our clients as well as the interactions we have with other stakeholders are not unethical or deceptive. We are committed to building relationships that are based on respect, fair treatments, and courtesy.

■ CONFIDENTIALITY: 
Privacy of our clients and other stakeholders is strictly safeguarded and stored, and such data is only used upon their consents, and they are well informed on specific purposes of data usage.

■ NON-DISCRIMINATION: 
Chamroeun considers its clients and other stakeholders as value assets and take all of efforts to make sure that the institution treats them in appropriate manner.

Company Profile:
Wing Bank (Cambodia) Plc – the bank for every Cambodian – is driven by the vision to provide every Cambodian with convenient access to financial services relevant to, and for the improvement of their daily lives.

Wing Bank has revolutionized the way Cambodians access financial services by introducing instant, secure, and convenient Mobile Financial Services since 18 August 2008.

Today, Wing Bank serves the entire Cambodian population with 100% coverage of the districts in Cambodia thanks to the innovative Wing Bank App, over 10,000 Wing Cash Xpress agents, over 55,000 merchants, and partnerships with industry giants such as Mastercard, MoneyGram, AliPay, WeChat Pay, Western Union, Visa, and Ria.

Wing Bank provides an array of advanced financial products both for individual and corporate customers. These include loans, deposits, micro savings, credit referral services, money transfers, utility and insurance payments, supply chain payments, payroll services and even phone top-ups. In addition, Wing offers retail payments via “WingPay”, and has also introduced the “WingMall” e-commerce platform.

Both small and large companies alike are now using Wing’s payroll and disbursement services, speeding up their payments. Over 80% of Wing’s agents and 50% of customers are women, making Wing a shining example of gender inclusion in the region.

Wing Bank is committed to providing financial, gender and digital inclusion to the unbanked and the under-banked, allowing every Cambodian to enjoy convenience and security when it comes to financial services
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114 jobs@wingbank.com.kh Phnom Penh No. 721, Preah Monivong Blvd., Sangkat Beung Keng Kang 3, Khan Chamkar Mon, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114

Job Description: - Partners with leadership to align HR strategy to business   strategy- Acts as change agent to business through process design and   approaches that support change and transformation – striving   to lead mutual processes to best practice status.- Analyzes trends and metrics in partnership with HR peers to   develop solutions; programs and policies.- Provides day-to-day coaching to leadership on a variety of   actions to include employee relations issues, policy   interpretation and application; talent management and   development; and organizational design consultation.- Conducts ongoing supply and demand analysis for business   partners on current and future state staffing and skill needs   and designs talent acquisition strategies to meet those   needs.- Actively participates in annual budget planning/labor   forecasting process with business partners- Leads and/or supports annual HR cycle deliverables to include   performance management; merit and bonus awards; benefits   enrollment; etc.- Evaluates issues, patterns, and trends to provide proactive   insights for HR solution and program designs i.e. training to   address certain needs.
Job Requirement: - Bachelors degree in Human Resources or Business related field- 3-5 of HR experience with at least 2 years of experience in   both talent acquisition and HR Business Partner experience- Proven strong foundation and knowledge of principles &   practice of HR including employment law & compliance   requirements- Proven client management and business literacy skills- Strong interpersonal and negotiation skills- Proven knowledge of full lifecycle recruiting components to   include sourcing; qualifying; networking; assessing; selling   and wage/salary trends- Excellent interpersonal skills and effective verbal and   written communication skills- Proven ability to effectively coach employees and management   through complex and difficult issues.- Ability to thrive in an ambiguous and rapidly changing   environment- Ability to set high personal goals and work independently- Ability to organize, multi-task and prioritize tasks-  Ability to make recommendation to effectively resolve   problems or issues- Demonstrated project management skills- Proven acuity in MS office suite, internet and data-base   management

Company Profile:
Wing Bank (Cambodia) Plc – the bank for every Cambodian – is driven by the vision to provide every Cambodian with convenient access to financial services relevant to, and for the improvement of their daily lives.

Wing Bank has revolutionized the way Cambodians access financial services by introducing instant, secure, and convenient Mobile Financial Services since 18 August 2008.

Today, Wing Bank serves the entire Cambodian population with 100% coverage of the districts in Cambodia thanks to the innovative Wing Bank App, over 10,000 Wing Cash Xpress agents, over 55,000 merchants, and partnerships with industry giants such as Mastercard, MoneyGram, AliPay, WeChat Pay, Western Union, Visa, and Ria.

Wing Bank provides an array of advanced financial products both for individual and corporate customers. These include loans, deposits, micro savings, credit referral services, money transfers, utility and insurance payments, supply chain payments, payroll services and even phone top-ups. In addition, Wing offers retail payments via “WingPay”, and has also introduced the “WingMall” e-commerce platform.

Both small and large companies alike are now using Wing’s payroll and disbursement services, speeding up their payments. Over 80% of Wing’s agents and 50% of customers are women, making Wing a shining example of gender inclusion in the region.

Wing Bank is committed to providing financial, gender and digital inclusion to the unbanked and the under-banked, allowing every Cambodian to enjoy convenience and security when it comes to financial services

Job Description:
•	Works with Users, Business Project Managers, IT Support Team, IT PMO, Finance, Commercial and other stakeholders to understand their needs and requirements and tailor appropriate solutions.
•	Perform data updates, indexing, and maintenance in application Data warehouse and ETL tools. 
•	Work with Business Owners/Data Analyst to develop key business questions and to build datasets that answer those questions.
•	Help to implement new data management projects and re-structure of the current data architecture.
•	Assist team in data management projects when needed.
•	Process and load third party data sources.
•	Work with Business Customers in understanding the business requirements and implementing solutions.
•	Identify and solve issues concerning data management to improve data quality.
•	Develop best practices for data management, maintenance, reporting and security.
•	Improve data foundational procedures, guidelines and standards.
•	Review dataset implementations performed by other data engineers.
•	Perform additional data and database related tasks.
•	Learn new technology if require
•	Resolve tickets on Web Helpdesk
Job Requirement: •	(The minimum education, experience, knowledge, skills & attitude required to perform the position)•	Education: Bachelor Degree in Information Technology•	Experience: Have experience or non-experience can apply •	Skills: Data structure, coding, Machine learning, Data warehouse, ETL, Data integration•	Knowledge: data structure, programming, big data, database (Oracle, Postgres), business concept•	Attitude: active, hard-working, honest, responsibility, friendly

Job Description:
Aside from the fact that we are number one, you should be motivated by success and the fantastically enhanced lifestyle of living in Cambodia and the earnings that come with the opportunity that we are offering, plus plenty of hard work!

About Us

We are striving to make the process of buying or selling a property as simple as booking a holiday. As a full-service brokerage, we combine market-leading technology and boast over 200,000 monthly visitors directly to our multilingual websites in Cambodia and register 100’s of new clients each month with access to over 30,000 directly available property listings on one simple-to-use platform.

At Realestate.com.kh & FazWaz, you’ll have an experienced team to support you from start to finish for every deal, leveraging powerful marketing and agent tools that streamline your workflow and truly give you a competitive edge. If your passion is managing and motivating sales teams, serving customers in a collaborative, tech-savvy environment PLUS making more money than any of your peers in Cambodia or outside, then come join us!

Roles and Responsibilities

- Manage the sales team and achieve/exceed company revenue targets
- Enforcing compliance with company procedures with sales staff (Pipedrive, Telegram, Slack etc)
- Implementation and monitoring of quarterly KPI targets with sales team
- Recording and reporting sales transactions weekly to the senior management
- Overseeing the collection and distribution of any payments, commissions or deposits to the company to ensure funds are correctly secured, reported and deposited into the company account.
- Liaise with the Finance Department to ensure compliance to invoicing/payment procedures.
Recruitment and hiring of sales staff 
- Liaising with CEO, COO & GM to communicate properties and developments while identify key areas for improvement
- Liaising with Leads Team to ensure smooth handover process and servicing of leads accordingly
- Assist in developing training material for new & existing agents
- Host regular training sessions to upskill the sales team

What we're looking for

- English fluency and any other language is a bonus
- A passion for sales and results-driven 
- Ideally, 3 years experience in real estate 
- A knowledge of Cambodia and specific regions 
- Customer-advocate mindset and a commitment to delivering the best client experience possible
- Enthusiasm innovative tech focused sales tools (CRM)
- Any real estate sales experience in another country is a bonus but not required. 


What We Offer

- Compensation Package: Base salary + commission
- Team override commission 
- Attractive quarterly bonuses
- Incentives throughout the year
- Existing database and guaranteed lead generation
- Bespoke induction & ongoing training
- Career progression
- Work permit & visa (for foreigners only).

Interviews happening now with flexible start dates
Job Requirement: Market leading trainingAnnual company tripOffice located in BKK1Base salary + bonusesCareer development

Established in 2009, Realestate.com.kh is the largest digital real estate company in Cambodia. We combine market-leading technology and boast over 200,000 monthly visitors directly to our multilingual websites in Cambodia, registering 100’s of new clients each month with access to over 30,000 directly available property listings on one simple-to-use platform.

Realestate.com.kh co-broke with all the leading real estate agents in Cambodia and has direct access to every developer in the country. Giving our agents access to more stock (properties) than anyone else.

Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.

-	Perform spare part machining as the standard and specification to support maintenance activities and equipment availability 
-	Maintain the machining equipment / device / tools in the safety and good condition
-	Perform necessary tasks to ensure good housekeeping and plant cleanliness
-	Perform safety condition inspection of tools and equipment in the workshop
-	Recognize during the performing his duty all Safety risk situations and Near Misses . Make Safety report about it ,share with his team and resolve all safety issues in the working place  as soon as possible.
-	Perform relate duties as assigned
Job Requirement:
-	Diploma in Machinery or related field 
-	Knowledge and skill in machining 
-	Knowledge of drawing interpretation 
-	Knowledge and skill in precise measurement by measurement tools  
-	Knowledge about using the standard for thread and for quality of machining
-	Having good written and spoken in English
Remunerations:
CMIC provide very attractive competitive remuneration and fringe benefits including, accommodation or housing allowance (for job base in Kampot), meal allowance, 13th month salary, performance bonus, insurance (GPA, H&S and Life Insurance), Outpatient medical claim, pension fund, and a lot of other benefits. We provide opportunities to get training both local & overseas and as well as have a long term career and good career development opportunities within the company.

Company Profile: The Sauber Group is in its core a Cambodian company and proud of its roots. As it is also a joint venture between Cambodia, Thailand and Germany, it will stress the strengths of each culture to create a unique company culture.The company credo is to turn standard processes and services into outstanding experiences for our customers. It clearly targets to disrupt markets and to grow aggressively and profitable.Sauber aims to become a conglomerate of businesses which can be aggressively multiplied all over Cambodia. Ultimately, the target is to go public with a strong and recognized brand.At the core of the business is the idea to connect traditional trade with E Commerce in a multi-channel system. Classical market approaches such as the development of Sauber Mini Malls are combined with alternative sales channels like E commerce, direct sales for B2B and telesales. With Cambodia as its home base, it is the target to expand into other countries in the region as well when the conditions are right.
Contact Info: Contact Information Borith Trakoll HR Manager 85510880053 recruitment@sauber.com.kh Phnom Penh Lot:284, St:1966, Phnom Penh Thmei, Sen Sok, Phnom Penh 85510880053

Company Profile: Panda Commercial Bank is an innovative financial enterprise aiming to bring leading financial technology services to the world. The team of Panda Bank is composed of top bankers, security experts and software and hardware technology elites. By analyzing the path from the first coin to the Internet Financial Group, it provides a forward-looking basic service platform and widely accepted ideal financial lifestyle. We are committed to providing high-quality financial services that are easy to operate, safe and reliable, convenient and efficient, to benefit sharing to customers around the world through technological innovation capabilities, and become the world's leading digital bank.Panda Commercial Bank是一家旨在为世界带来领先金融科技服务的创新金融企业，公司团队由顶尖的银行家、安全领域专家和软硬件科技精英组成，通过分析从第一枚硬币到互联网金融的路径，提供前瞻性的基础服务平台和广泛接受的理想金融生活方式。Panda Bank致力于通过科技创新能力，向全球客户提供操作简单、安全可靠、方便快捷、利益共享的优质金融服务，成为全球领先的数字银行。
