Job Description:
Key Responsibilities:

1.	Capex: 
•	Provide accuracy analyst on capex projects for management to make decision whether to invest or not
•	Do the post analyst capex projects to ensure the projection Vs actual are on tracking and give the narrative on gap
•	Prepare company Capex Cash spend for RE, BP and LRP
•	Tracking Capex project through RFA system, PO and IM to ensure there is no over budget and compliance with LCOA and Capex policy
•	Monthly prepare and present the update capex spend to CMT
•	Ensure BIG Reporting are on time and accuracy
2.	Effective Business Partners:
•	Provide advanced analysis, insight, influence, and challenge, from a finance perspective, to enhance the quality of business decision-making and drive improved performance –
•	Delivering accurate, reliable, and timely financial reports to support decision making as per agreed time 
•	Conduct “budgeting concept” to non-CO finance staffs (One time per year) 
•	Ensure teams deliver/meet stakeholder’s expectation as well as group reporting 
•	Set and manage KPI’s in accordance with the company’s policy
•	Develop Team plans for projects as required and manage team resources to ensure deliver to committed tasks
3.	System and process Management 
•	Ensure business process, system and operating routines are full compliance with governance standard
•	Standardize data, information management, policy, and procedures standards.
•	Ensure that delivered costs spend is accordance with S.P.P 
•	Maximize system capabilities and leverage SAP.
Job Requirement:
Requirements:

•	Bachelor’s Degree in Finance and Accounting.
•	At least 2 years planning and analysis relevant experience 
•	Knowledge in SAP system is preferable
•	Excellent communication skills
•	Advanced knowledge of Microsoft office (emphasis on Excel & Access)
•	Strong initiative and ability to manage multiple tasks
Company Profile:
Cambodia Beverage Company Ltd (CBC) referred too locally as Coca-Cola Cambodia is a leading manufacturer & distributor of non-alcoholic ready to drink (NARTD) beverages throughout Cambodia. With our state-of-the-art bottling plant (commissioned in 2016) situated within PPSEZ, one of the leading Economic Zones in Phnom Penh.

The company produces 16 different beverages, under 8 brands, and within 5 different NARTD categories (Sparkling, Tea, Energy, Water, and Isotonic) which is supplied to our customers throughout the Kingdom.
CBC directly employs more than 850 staff while creating indirect employment opportunities for another 8,000+ staff across the Kingdom.

We are proud that >99.7% of our workforce are Cambodian nationals and that >31% of our staff are female, with women making up 37% of the senior management team. We are committed to increasing our female diversity and are targeting to have 50% female staff by 2030.
We are committed to integrating sustainability into everything we do.

By 2030 we aim to collect and recycle a bottle or can for each one we sell by 2030 and use at least 50% recycled material in our packaging.
We are committed to return to nature and communities 100%+ of the water we use in our drinks and their production. We are working to increase water security where we operate, source ingredients, and touch people's lives.
Contact Info: Contact Information TALENT ACQUISITION TEAM  010 325 777 / 096 48 99 677 / 096 355 6214 / 012 916 444 hrd@coca-cola.com.kh No.287, National Road 5, Mittapheap Village, Russey Keo District, Phnom Penh,  Kingdom of Cambodia. 010 325 777 / 096 48 99 677 / 096 355 6214 / 012 916 444

Job Description:
	Establish positioning, identify target audiences, and develop marketing plans with specific objectives across different channels and segments
	Create, maintain, and conduct analytics reporting across multiple platforms and extract key insights for future campaign development and go-to-market strategies, complete with formal proposals and recommendations on tactics
	Working in partnership with the creative team, develop creative briefs and guide creative direction to meet objectives for all advertising and public-facing communications, including print, digital, and video assets
	Check Contract relevant with marketing department space rental contract, atm rental, cooperate contract 
	Manage content and updates for customer and internal touch points, establishing budget guidelines, participating in events, documenting business processes, and providing additional sales support
	Manage Event, Digital platforms such as Facebook, Website, Instagram
	Analyze customer insights, consumer trends, market analysis, and marketing best practices to build successful strategies
	Gather customer and market insights to inform outreach strategies, increase customer conversions, and generate more qualified leads
	Manage Offline Marketing such as distribution brochure, Catalog, etc. 
	Write Public Relation or Press Conference
Job Requirement:
• Bachelor’s Degree in Sales and Marketing or related fields.
• At least 5 years experiences working in Sale and Marketing Department.
• Be able to travel.
• Good command of English.
• Be positive and result oriented.
Company Profile:
Starting from 1951 in Texas, United States, Circle K is now one of  the most widely recognized convenience store brands, known worldwide for  quality products & great customer service with more than 15.000  associates worldwide including Hong Kong, China, Vietnam, Indonesia,  UAE, Macau, Mexico, Honduras, Guam, Malaysia, The Philippines, Egypt  & Costa Rica…

At Circle K Cambodia, our mission is to be the best and most convenient place for all of your daily shopping needs.

Vision
To be the leading No 1 Neighborhood Convenience Store in Cambodia providing 24 hours conveniences, exclusive merchandise and value added services to our customers.

Mission
To Make Our Customer Life’s a Little Easier Everyday

Core Value
1- Customer Focus: Customer are the reason for our success in Business and we are committed to listen and respond positively to their need.
2- Integrity: Honest, Trustworthy, Adhere to Strong Moral and Ethical Principle and Value.
3- Teamwork: one team, one goal and one direction – with collaboration, share and support each other.
4- Accountability: taking ownership for a task or role and committed to execute and deliver result.
5- Courtesy & Respect: treating other people the way you want to be treated.
6- Continuous Growth: Proactive to Adapt to Instance change.
7- Excellent: Aim for higher quality and accuracy, usually above performance standard.

Currently Circle K Cambodia is having more than 35 Store locate in the following:
- Phnnom Penh
- Siem Reap

Job Description: Support manager in managing day-to-day operating expenditures against operating budgets to ensure efficient usage of resourcesCoordinate and provide administration support on daily facilities administration and maintenance activitiesProvide administration support to the implementation of building/premises services (e.g. maintenance records, security/safety checks, office administration, cleaning, catering, waste management, etc.)Assist in monitoring and tracking of safety, health and environment compliance and compile information for periodical reporting purposesTrack and maintain updated records on space allocation and utilisation plans in existing/new business premisesTrack progress of cost controls and process improvement initiatives/activities related to facility management in business premisesMaintain updated database/contacts on external vendor appointments and safe-keep service agreements (e.g. electrical, air conditioning, plumbing, waste management, etc.)Track and record scheduled facility inspection/assessment for business premises and assets (e.g. furniture, utilities, transport services, equipment, etc.)Distribute communication materials on updates relating to facility management activities

Company Profile:
At DKSH, our purpose is to enrich people’s lives by providing access to goods, services and insights. United by our vision to be the trusted partner, we help companies grow in Asia and beyond across our Business Units Healthcare, Consumer Goods, Performance Materials and Technology.

Delivering life-saving drugs to hospitals, bringing high-quality products to remote villages, installing technology that raises living standards and providing new formulations for healthcare products that make life easier. These are just a few examples of how DKSH touches people’s lives around the clock. We do this while helping our clients and customers grow by providing services including sourcing, market insights, marketing and sales, eCommerce, distribution and logistics as well as after-sales services.

Listed on the SIX Swiss Exchange, DKSH operates in 36 markets with 32,450 specialists, generating net sales of CHF 10.7 billion in 2020. Founded by Swiss entrepreneurs in 1865, we have been deeply root

Job Description: The Institut Pasteur du Cambodge (IPC) is a Cambodian non-for-profit research institution established in 1953, Institut Pasteur du Cambodge (IPC) is today a scientific research establishment declared of public utility placed under the high patronage of the Ministry of Health of the Kingdom of Cambodia and under the responsibility of the Institute Pasteur on the scientific and technical levels. The IPC is a member of the Pasteur Network, which brings together 33 institutes present on five continents. It shares the Pasteurian values and the ethical charter to which the Pasteur Institutes are bound. Th e IPC has more than 250 employees, including about 30 expatriates of 10 nationalities and includes 5 research units. It carries out research activities in health biology, public health and service activities (Medical Biology Laboratory, vaccinations and water and food analyses) and training.Institut Pasteur du Cambodge is seeking for a suitable and qualified candidate to fill a position of one Account Receivable officer.* Main responsibilities:- Preparation of quotations and contracts for new IPC clients- Customers in account monthly billing and posting in to Accounting System- Daily sale control with Cash/ bank transfer/ABA- Preparation of mission oversees expenditure- Communication between Laboratory and clients- Log in user of NSSF​​​ and communication related to monthly billing to NSSF.- Follow up payment/ Reconcile aging report- Preparation of monthly rental invoices for campus residents.- Understanding of CIFRS standards (For SME).Secondary Tasks:- Manage daily cash (replace team work if she/he is absence)- Perform the other duties, as assigned by the department to the need of the working purpose.- Other tasks assigned by management
Job Requirement: * Candidate Profile:- Bachelor Degree in Accounting or related business field- Language required: English & Khmer, knowledge of French will be a plus- Excellent ability to adapt- Rigor and professional awareness- Qualities related to the function (Pleasant personality, positive attitude, hardworking, reliable Confidentiality, Honesty)- Be able to work under pressure, tight timeline and flexibility- Good knowledge of software (Excel, Word, Outlook)* Recruitment conditions:- At least 2-3 years’ experience in finance accounting- Full time with one-year fixed duration contract, renewable- Available to start from November 21st, 2022

Job Description: វិទ្យាស្ថានប៉ាស្ទ័រកម្ពុជា (IPC) គឺជាវិទ្យាស្ថានស្រាវជ្រាវមិនស្វែងរកប្រាក់ចំណូលនៅកម្ពុជា ដែលត្រូវបានបង្កើតឡើងក្នុងឆ្នាំ១៩៥៣។ IPC សព្វថ្ងៃជាគ្រឹះស្ថានស្រាវជ្រាវវិទ្យាសាស្ត្រដែលបង្កើតឡើងដើម្បីបម្រើដល់សេវាសាធារណៈ ដោយមានការគាំទ្រខ្ពស់ពីក្រសួងសុខាភិបាលនៃព្រះរាជាណាចក្រកម្ពុជា និងស្ថិតក្រោមទំនួលខុសត្រូវរបស់វិទ្យាស្ថានប៉ាស្ទ័រ (ក្រុងប៉ារីស) ទៅលើផ្នែកវិទ្យាសាស្ត្រ និងបច្ចេកទេស។ វិទ្យាស្ថានប៉ាស្ទ័រកម្ពុជា(IPC) គឺជាសមាជិករបស់បណ្តាញវិទ្យាស្ថានប៉ាស្ទ័រអន្តរជាតិ ដែលមានវិទ្យាស្ថានជាសមាជិកសរុបចំនួន ៣៣ នឹងមានវត្តមាននៅលើទ្វីបចំនួនប្រាំ។ នេះជាការបង្ហាញអោយឃើញពីគុណតម្លៃ ក្រមសីលធម៌ និងភាពលូតលាស់ឥតឈប់ឈរ របស់វិទ្យាស្ថាន។ IPC មានបុគ្គលិកដែលកំពុងបម្រើការងារសរុបក្នុងអង្គភាពច្រើនជាង ២៥០នាក់ ក្នុងនោះរួមមានជនជាតិបរទេសដែលមាន១0 សញ្ជាតិផេ្សងគ្នា ចំនួន ៣0 នាក់ រូមទាំងបុគ្គលិកដែលកំពុងបំរើការក្នុងផ្នែកស្រាវជ្រាវទាំង៥ផ្នែកផងដែរ។ IPC បាននឹងកំពុងអនុវត្តសកម្មភាពស្រាវជ្រាវលើ ផ្នែកជីវវិទ្យាសុខភាព សុខភាពសាធារណៈ ផ្តល់សេវាកម្ម(មន្ទីរពិសោធន៍ជីវៈវេជ្ជសាស្ត្រ ការចាក់វ៉ាក់សាំង ការវិភាគទឹក និងអាហារ) និងចូលរួមសកម្មភាពបណ្តុះបណ្តាលផ្សេងៗ។ The Institut Pasteur du Cambodge (IPC) is a Cambodian non-for-profit research institution established in 1953, Institut Pasteur du Cambodge (IPC) is today a scientific research establishment declared of public utility placed under the high patronage of the Ministry of Health of the Kingdom of Cambodia and under the responsibility of the Institute Pasteur on the scientific and technical levels. The IPC is a member of the Pasteur Network, which brings together 33 institutes present on five continents. It shares the Pasteurian values and the ethical charter to which the Pasteur Institutes are bound. The IPC has more than 250 employees, including about 30 expatriates of 10 nationalities and includes 5 research units. It carries out research activities in health biology, public health and service activities (Medical Biology Laboratory, vaccinations and water and food analyses) and training.វិទ្យាស្ថានប៉ាស្ទ័រកម្ពុជាត្រូវការជ្រើសរើសអ្នកសម្អាតសម្រាប់ការងារពេញម៉ោងទាំងពីរភេទចំនួនពីររូប ដែលមានកិច្ចសន្យាការងាររយៈពេលមួយឆ្នាំ(អាចបន្តបាន)។Institut Pasteur du Cambodge (IPC) is looking for two full time cleaners to work in the Institut Pasteur du Cambodge with one-year renewable contract.* ទំនួលខុសត្រួវក្នុងការងារ៖- សម្អាតការិយាល័យ មន្ទីរពិសោធន៍ ឃ្លាំងស្តុកសម្ភារៈ បន្ទប់ទឹក និងកន្លែងការងារផ្សេងៗទៀត- Clean the offices, laboratories, warehouses, WC and other work areas- គ្រប់គ្រងសម្ភារៈបន្ទប់ទឹក និងធ្វើរបាយការណ៍អំពីសម្ភារៈ- Perform toilet amenity supplies and make the supplies report- រៀបចំបន្ទប់ស្នាក់នៅ- Perform rooms preparation- បំពេញតួនាទីផ្សេងៗទៀតដែលចាត់ចែងដោយប្រធាន- Other tasks assigned by manager
Job Requirement: - មានបទពិសោធន៍ក្នុងការសម្អាត- Experiences of cleaning- ត្រូវមានរាងកាយមាំមួន- Excellent physical condition- មានជំនាញក្នុងការរៀបចំបានល្អ- Good at organizing- ធ្វើការងារជាក្រុមបានល្អ- Good team work- ធ្វើការប្រកបដោយប្រសិទ្ធភាព និងភាពជឿជាក់- Be able to work efficiently and dependably- មានភាពអត់ធ្មត់ និងយកចិត្តទុកដាក់លើសុខុមាលភាពរបស់បុគ្គលិក និងភ្ញៀវ- Be patient and interested in the welfare of the staff and guests- មានភាពរីករាយចំពោះការបំពេញការងារ- Feel satisfied in performing the job- មានភាពរួសរាយរាក់ទាក់- Pleasant appearance- ត្រូវមានសមត្ថភាពក្នុងការរក្សាវិជ្ជាជីវៈការងារប្រកបដោយក្រមសីលធម៌ទោះបីជាស្ថិតក្រោមសម្ពាធការងារក៏ដោយ។-Ability to maintain a professional appearance with a positive attitude even under high pressureលក្ខខ័ណ្ឌសម្រាប់ការដាក់ពាក្យស្នើរសុំត្រូវមានលិខិតអមជាមួយនឹងការបញ្ជាក់ពីប្រាក់ខែដែលរំពឹងទុក​ និងច្បាប់ថតចម្លងសញ្ញាប័ត្រ(ប្រសិនបើមាន) លិខិតបញ្ជាក់ការងារ ប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេបជាមួយរូបថតថ្មី​ អត្តសញ្ញាណប័ណ្ណថតចម្លង(ឯកសារបញ្ជាក់ច្បាប់ដើមទាំងអស់) សូមបញ្ជូនទៅផ្នែកធនធានមនុស្សនៃវិទ្យាស្ថានប៉ាស្ទ័រកម្ពុជា តាមរយៈ​អាស័យដ្ឋាន ៖ អគារលេខ៥ មហាវិថីព្រះមុនីវង្ស សង្កាត់ស្រះចក ខ័ណ្ឌដូនពេញ រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ ឬ តាមរយៈអ៊ីម៉ែល៖ recrutement@pasteur-kh.org ឫ ទំនាក់ទំនងទូរស័ព្ទ៖ ០៩២ ៧៧៧ ៦៦៥ ។The complete application includes a cover letter – with salary expectations, copies of diplomas if any, work certificates, curriculum vitae with a recent photo, Identity Card photocopy - all certified documents to the originals – are to be sent to the Human Resources department of Institut Pasteur du Cambodge #5, Monivong Blvd, Phnom Penh or by email to: recrutement@pasteur-kh.org, phone number: 092 777 665.ផុតកំណត់ថ្ងៃទី៖ ៣០ វិច្ឆិកា ២០២២Deadline: November 30th, 2022

Job Description:
-	Assists on architect design.
-	Assists in research, design, construction, operation and maintenance of project such as Road, Bridge, Building and Drainage System.
-	Help to estimate costs, prepare specifications for materials and carry out surveying and drafting.
-	Prepare drawings work, plans and designs for construction work.
-	Use computer to produce designs, detailed drawings and documentation.
Job Requirement:
-	Bachelor/Master degree in Civil engineering or architecture.
-	At least (1) year experience as Civil Engineer with Construction Company.
-	Computer literacy especially MS Office, MS Project, AutoCAD and 2D & 3D.
-	Be able to identify, analyze and solve technical problems.

job title: ជំនួយការការិយាល័យកម្មវិធីសិក្សាជាតិ
position: ជំនួយការការិយាល័យកម្មវិធីសិក្សាជាតិ
Job Description: តួនាទីសំខាន់ៗ៖- ទទួលបន្ទុកពង្រឹងបទដ្ឋានអប់រំ និងលើកកម្ពស់កម្មវិធីសិក្សាក្រោមកិច្ចសហការជាមួយអនុប្រធាន និងប្រធានការិយាល័យសិក្សាជាតិ និងគណៈនាយក- ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើ របាយការណ៍សិក្សា និងទិន្នន័យថ្នាក់បឋម និងមធ្យមសិក្សាទាំងអស់ និងត្រួតពិនិត្យរបាយការណ៍ពិន្ទុប្រចាំវគ្គសិក្សា និងឯកសារបណ្ណសាររដ្ឋបាលជាដើម- ចូលរួមការងារអធិការកិច្ចថ្នាក់រៀន ត្រួតពិនិត្យវិន័យសិស្ស សហការណ៍ជាមួយក្រុមការងារការិយាល័យរដ្ឋបាលសាលា - ចូលរួមពិនិត្យតាមថ្នាក់ដើម្បីប្រាកដថាថ្នាក់និមួយៗមានគ្រូ  និងរាយការណ៍ជូននាយករងក្នុងករណីគ្រូណាមិនមក ឬមកយឺតបើមានគ្រូសុំច្បាប់មិនបានមកបង្រៀន ហើយត្រូវជូនដំណឹងដល់អនុប្រធាន និងប្រធានការិយាល័យសិក្សាជាតិ រៀបចំចាត់ចែងរកគ្រូជំនួស- សម្របសម្រួលសកម្មភាពសិក្សា និងសកម្មភាពផ្សេងៗទៀតគ្រប់ថ្នាក់បឋម និងមធ្យមសិក្សា និងធានាឱ្យបាននូវ ដំណើរការដោយរលូននៃថ្នាក់សិក្សានីមួយៗ
Job Requirement: តម្រូវការ៖       	- បរិញ្ញាប័ត្រផ្នែកអប់រំ ឫបរិញ្ញប័ត្រពាក់ព័ន្ធ- មានបទពិសោធន៍ក្នុងវិស័យអប់រំ ឫវិស័យពាក់ព័ន្ធ យ៉ាងតិច 1 ឆ្នាំ- មានសមត្ថភាពខ្ពស់ក្នុងការដោះស្រាយបញ្ហា និងមានគំនិតផ្តួចផ្តើម- មានជំនាញរដ្ឋបាល និងសមត្ថភាពខ្ពស់ក្នុងការរៀបចំ- អាចប្រើប្រាស់កុំព្យូទ័របាន និងចេះប្រើ Microsoft Officeអត្ថប្រយោជន៍៖ - ធ្វើការពីថ្ងៃចន្ទដល់សុក្រ និងពាក់កណ្តាលថ្ងៃសៅរ៍ - សេវាធានារ៉ាប់រ៉ងលើគ្រោះថ្នាក់ការងារ និងថែទាំសុខភាព - ការដំឡើងប្រាក់ខែប្រចាំឆ្នាំ និងឳកាសដំឡើងតំណែង ឬផ្លាស់ប្តូរមុខតំណែងការងារ - ថ្ងៃឈប់សម្រាកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ - ពិធីជប់លៀងប្រចាំឆ្នាំ - ប្រាក់លើកទឹកចិត្ត និងប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភផ្សេងៗ

Job Description: Senior legal officer has the main role in the preparation, negotiation and review of documents, letters and contracts required by the company, monitor compliance with laws and regulations related to all business activities in order to mitigate risks, as well as liaise with the competent authorities, lawyers, registration service providers to apply for the relevant license.1.	 A strong knowledge in legal translation as well as to be able to review the draft or draft contracts, legal documents, and company’s policy -	Be able to translate well of legal documents from Khmer to English and Vice Versa as the key work performance as required by top management.-	Review the draft or draft the contracts, legal agreements, template documents, company’s policies necessary for the company’s business and update those documents to make it compliant with the updated laws or actual situations.-	Assist in negotiating the terms and conditions in the contracts with other parties and revise based on the mutual agreement of the parties.-	Assist in analyzing the legal issues occurred in the contracts and other legal documents and propose revision or furnish advice to get a correct modification or adjustment. -	Review the arrangement of contracts/documents for the execution by the company's director and relevant persons.-	Ensure the good keeping of all contracts and legal documents and be the point of contact for contractual interpretation. 2.	Monitor legal compliance of company’s business objectives and activities -	Participate in requesting permits and other licenses directly or cooperate with lawyers or other service providers.-	Prepare application forms and supporting documents for license and other relevant permit registration. -	Follow up and contact with related persons regarding the registration process from commencement until completion.-	Check, follow up and renew the validity and ensure the update of those permits and licenses.-	Ensure good keeping of licenses and permits as soft copies and handover the original documents.3. Verify the research about the legal issues and provide legal consultations to line manager-	Study and research about laws, regulations, good practices, and legal issues related to the company’s business.-	Participate in seminars related to legal updates for capacity building and share to teamwork.-	Provide legal consultations to line manager.-	Notify the newly promulgated regulations to line manager.-	Compile the relevant laws and regulations related to company’s activities for the ease of research.4.	Coordinate in solving litigation cases and disputes occurring in the company.-	Participate in the consultation with lawyers and advisors about strategic approaches to the issues.-	Collaborate with lawyers for the handover of evidence and supporting documents.-	Participate in the process of collecting and reviewing statements, documents, and evidence.-	Participate in the process of negotiating, hearing, and other legal procedure.-	Keep in good order of all documents regarding the cases.-	Follow up all procedures of the cases and make a report from the commencement until completion.5.	Assist in the performance of general administrative works in the department.6.	Perform other tasks assigned by management.
Job Requirement: -	Education: Bachelor’s degree or Master of Laws Degree-	Experience: at least 4 years-	Knowledge: civil, criminal laws, administration, leadership and interpersonal skills-	Language: Khmer and English (other languages are an advantage)-	Computer literacy: Microsoft Word, Microsoft PowerPoint, Microsoft Excel

Job Requirement: តួរនាទីសំខាន់៖	- រៀបចំរបាយការណ៍សិក្សា និងទិន្នន័យពិន្ទុកសិស្ស- ​កម្រិត​វប្បធម៌​ថ្នាក់​បរិញ្ញាបត្រ- មាន​បទ​ពិសោធ​ន៌បង្រៀន​យ៉ាងតិច 3 ឆ្នាំ​- មានការ​តស៊ូ​ ភាព​អំណត់​ នឹង​ការងារ​- មាន​អាយុ​ចាប់ពី​25ឆ្នាំ​ ដល់​45ឆ្នាំ​- មាន​បុគ្គលិកលក្ខណៈ​រួសរាយ​រាក់ទាក់​ ស្មោះត្រង់​ និង​ក្រម​សិល​ធម៌​ល្អ​។អត្ថប្រយោជន៍៖ - ធ្វើការពីថ្ងៃចន្ទដល់សុក្រ- សេវាធានារ៉ាប់រ៉ងលើគ្រោះថ្នាក់ការងារ និងថែទាំសុខភាព - ការដំឡើងប្រាក់ខែប្រចាំឆ្នាំ និងឳកាសដំឡើងតំណែង ឬផ្លាស់ប្តូរមុខតំណែងការងារ - ថ្ងៃឈប់សម្រាកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ - ឈប់សម្រាកបុណ្យជាតិ- ពិធីជប់លៀងប្រចាំឆ្នាំ - ប្រាក់លើកទឹកចិត្ត និងប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភផ្សេងៗ

job title: HEAD OF FINANCE BUSINESS PARTNER – COMMERCIAL
position: HEAD OF FINANCE BUSINESS PARTNER – COMMERCIAL
Job Description:
Key Responsibilities:
•	Provide financial leadership and business support to Commercial Leaders (Commercial & Sales Head, RGM, RTM, General Trade, Modern Trade) including budget management and development of rolling estimate projections
•	Revenue Growth Management - drive margin management in the business through revenue growth management and support BPPC / pricing decisions.  
•	RTM & CTS – support commercial in evaluating RTM and CTS decisions leading to optimum RTM in markets enhancing availability at the optimum cost to serve
•	Key Accounts – partner with commercial team on evaluating key account proposals and drive implementation of commercial policy by channel in each of BIG markets
•	Support the optimum allocation of resources including cold drink equipment
Job Requirement:
Requirements: 
•	Bachelor’s Degree in finance and Commercial background is preferred
•	Completed CA/CPA
•	At least 10 Years experiences in Financial
•	Credible leader when resolving issues related to financial standards and processes; must apply business knowledge and communicate this effectively.  
•	Complex financial concepts to internal and external audiences must be articulated to non-financial business leaders in concise and understandable terms to influence and drive alignment and appropriate actions Data is used for decision-making, as well as internal and external reporting and communications.  This also includes the preparation, interpretation, and alignment of financial data included in the business plans.
Company Profile:
Cambodia Beverage Company Ltd (CBC) referred too locally as Coca-Cola Cambodia is a leading manufacturer & distributor of non-alcoholic ready to drink (NARTD) beverages throughout Cambodia. With our state-of-the-art bottling plant (commissioned in 2016) situated within PPSEZ, one of the leading Economic Zones in Phnom Penh.

The company produces 16 different beverages, under 8 brands, and within 5 different NARTD categories (Sparkling, Tea, Energy, Water, and Isotonic) which is supplied to our customers throughout the Kingdom.
CBC directly employs more than 850 staff while creating indirect employment opportunities for another 8,000+ staff across the Kingdom.

We are proud that >99.7% of our workforce are Cambodian nationals and that >31% of our staff are female, with women making up 37% of the senior management team. We are committed to increasing our female diversity and are targeting to have 50% female staff by 2030.
We are committed to integrating sustainability into everything we do.

By 2030 we aim to collect and recycle a bottle or can for each one we sell by 2030 and use at least 50% recycled material in our packaging.
We are committed to return to nature and communities 100%+ of the water we use in our drinks and their production. We are working to increase water security where we operate, source ingredients, and touch people's lives.
Contact Info: Contact Information TALENT ACQUISITION TEAM  010 325 777 / 096 48 99 677 / 096 355 6214 / 012 916 444 hrd@coca-cola.com.kh No.287, National Road 5, Mittapheap Village, Russey Keo District, Phnom Penh,  Kingdom of Cambodia. 010 325 777 / 096 48 99 677 / 096 355 6214 / 012 916 444

Job Description:
- Support HR Manager for HR and Admin tasks/project. 
- Control tidiness, safety and hygiene. 
- Control documents in and out and make sure the documents kept well. 
- Handle maintenance of assets. 
- Manage and update staffs’ profiles and documents. 
- Monitor and control staffs’ profile, clocking (in &out), lateness, over time (OT), mission, leaves, other function or technical tasks of the system.

Job Description:
Warehouse Management

• Effectively manage warehouse inspection, delivery functions and management plan by developing schedule, procedures, and policy in compliance with company’s policies and objectives.
• Work closely with relevant department to cope materials/resources and to ensure that they are avail timely supplied to construction site when needed.
• Conduct monthly inventory and report warehouse activities and stock movement line manager to avoid stock lose or variance.
• Entry data into SAP system and review other expenditure documents from related departments.
• Supervise, train, coach, and discipline staffs to strengthen warehouse management and ensure high productivity and staff morale.
• Categorize type of materials/resources.

Admin Management

• Supervise team members to enforce the office policies and procedures established by company.
• Monitor and support daily operational needs.
• Control staff attendance, stationery and office supply and machinery.
• Supervise, monitor, and maintain company’s properties.
• Manage, control, and safeguard the physical fixed asset items of Company as per company policies and procedures.
• Manage record and oversee all transactions tracked related to the company's fixed assets, materials and resources including movement, tagging, or labeling of the items.
• Maintain accuracy of all counts and ensure authenticity of all information.
•  Perform other tasks as per assigned by line manager.
Job Requirement:
Education/Experience: 
• Bachelor’s degree in Business Admin or related field.
• Proven at least 5 years’ working experience in warehouse and admin from real estate or construction company. 
• Knowledge of logistics and warehouse management system.
• Good communication (Khmer and English), diplomatic and organizational skills.
• Ability to work under pressure and with personnel from all levels.
• Tact and the ability to deal with difficult situations.
• Good knowledge of different business functions.
• Meticulous attention to detail.
• Good morale and integrity.

Company Profile:
Amret (https://www.amret.com.kh) is a leading microfinance institution established in 1991 that contributes to the economic and social development of Cambodia by providing a wide range of financial services to meet the needs of the large targeted customers. Amret has strong commitment and long-term business strategies to be a leading financial institution in the market by deploying ambitious digital strategies. 

Amret belongs to the Advans international group (www.advansgroup.com) a major shareholder and international shareholder (FMO and IFC). The Advans group serves over 750,000 clients, and has expanded its operations in nine countries such as Cambodia, Cameroon, Ivory Coast, Democratic Republic of Congo, Ghana, Myanmar, Nigeria, Pakistan, and Tunisia. 

Amret has more than 150 branches, located in 25 cities and provinces in Cambodia, and successfully serves 450,000 customers with around 4,000 highly dedicated employees.
Contact Info: Contact Information Recruitment and Job Management  092333020 jobs@amret.com.kh #80, Street 315, Sangkat Boeung Kak2, Khan Toul Kok, Phnom Penh, Cambodia. 092333020

Job Description:
●	Develop and lead the Business Development Plans, Strategy, Department SOP, Policy, and Guidelines.
●	Build a team management model in a multicultural start-up and small-team environment.
●	Develop and lead the business cooperation plans and strategies.
●	Build and maintain long-term relationships with good communication and cooperation with the customers, as well as all relevant stakeholders, suppliers, and prospective partners.
●	Be a representative of VP.Start and attend relevant local and international events or exhibitions while being 
●	a spokesperson to communicate and interview with the media or other advertising platforms.
●	Initiate and facilitate in VP.Start's Event Marketing, New Products & Solutions Launching, Training, and other relevant public exhibitions.
●	Initiate and design online/offline marketing strategy, planning, and activities to boost sales.
●	Lead the development and implementation of marketing strategies to promote VP.Start's Branding of our products and solutions.
●	Work closely with the management team and other Heads of Departments in a cohesive fashion to deliver marketing plans and strategies as well as to get and provide support.
●	Make evaluations on business, products, and solutions by analyzing the market opportunities, competitors and defining the product profit margin.
●	Undertake other relevant tasks assigned by the Executive Directors.
Job Requirement:
●	Bachelor’s or Master’s degree from local or foreign university in Economics, Business Commerce, Management, International Business, Engineering, or Science.
●	A minimum of 5 years of working experience in business development, investment, sales & marketing, or other relevant roles.
●	Effective time management skills and the ability to multitask.
●	Ability to work independently and lead/manage teams effectively.
●	Attention to detail and result-oriented progress.
●	Strong proficiency in English (spoken and written). Proficiency in a 2nd or 3rd language is a plus.
●	Adaptability, working as team, and flexibility in cross-cultural environments
●	Strong communication, presentation, and negotiation skills.
●	Proficient in Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and Outlook, and other IT tools. 

* COMPETENCIES

●   Genuine desire to help & bring change. ✅
●	Possesses a can-do attitude. ✅
●	Curiosity. ✅
●	Flexibility to juggle many different tasks. ✅
●	Responsibility. In return, we give you the freedom to manage how you achieve your goals. ✅
●	Time management. Being accountable for your own actions and setting your own deadlines. ✅
●	Being comfortable in a high-growth environment. ✅
●	Communicating effectively (spoken and written). ✅

Job Description:
1. Scope of Working:

Branding Supervisor is responsible in developing brand strategies, promoting brand growth and expansion, implementing brand plan, product design to maintain consistency in branding.

2. Duties and Responsibilities:

- Initiate brand awareness executions aligning with brand guidelines
- Recommend digital channels and campaigns to promote brand Image
- Create visual identities to ensure implementations are consistent
- Introduce innovative ideas for driving brand consistency and communications
- Develop brand communication plans and budgeting
Job Requirement:
3. Qualification & Requirement:

- Bachelor’s Degree in management, finance, or related major 
- 3 years experience (marketing, design or advertising)
- Must be fluent in brand, marketing and design principles and best practices.
- Hands on experience with logo design, typography, color, web layout design, print production, photography, and more. 
- Proficient use of InDesign, Photoshop, and Illustrator. 
- Strong communication and presentation skills.
- Fluent in written and spoken English

4. Working Days and Hours:

- Monday to Half-Saturday Morning: 8:00am to 12:00PM & 1:00pm to 5:00pm
- Lunch time: 12:00pm to 1:00pm

5. Working place:

- Head Office of Borey Peng Huoth, Branding department.

6. Relationship:

- Works under supervise & report directly to CEO.

7. Salary and Benefit:

- Salary (Negotiable)
- Annual Bonus
- Annual Salary increment
- Annual Staff Party
- Education Sponsorship
- Internal and External Training
- Special price for house loan
- Seniority Pay

Job Description:
Dufry is the world’s leading travel retailer with operations in 65 + countries ,2300 + shops ,33,000 + employees representing in 130+ nationalities . 

We are hiring
Country Commercial Manager

** Task List
- Manage commercial plan performance
- Create into pack and relevant information for pricing policies
- Review assortment in country to identify items to be delisted and propose of novelties 
- Coordinate novelties/promotion
- Review and report KPIS, spend per pax , Pax profile Vs Target agreed 
- Follow up sales margin by brand category
- Coordinate country marketing activities .
- Customer perception report

** Operations
- Monitor, analyze and report Country Logistics, Marketing and category management functions and KPI’s in accordance with Group guidelines.
- Periodically review commercial performance ( Sales, inventory level, margins, etc..)
- Coordinate preparation works concerning merchandising ,forecasting and sourcing.
- Supervise Supply & Demand processes to ensure effective forecasting and ordering for an optimal supply.
- Ensure correct & complete implementation of country’s commercial plan.
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor’s degree in business 
- 5-7 years of retail experiences with at least 3 years in management role.
- Knowledge of the luxury branded customer goods industry.
- Exceptional strategic thinker and change strategic 
- Excellent negotiation skills
- Familiar with Ms office
- Excellent excel skill , power point, PP
- Good team leader, supporting and encouraging 

** Send your CV or resume with recent picture to email below :
Yenni.Indarwati@id.dufry.com

Job Description:
Reporting to the Manager, this role will involve acting as the first point of contact for visitors and clients of LLFitness. You will be responsible for ensuring our members and guests receive a warm and friendly welcome and any enquiries are dealt with in an efficient and professional manner. The receptionist will also deal with membership and sales enquirers as well as carry out administrative duties. 

PRINCIPLE RESPONSIBILITY AREAS 
1. To provide excellent customer service to our members and guests 
2. To deal with membership and sales enquirers and carry out administrative duties 
3. To ensure the gym studio areas are maintained to a high standard during each shift 
4. Provide support to management where required.
5. Full Time 
6. Can work at night shift
Job Requirement:
MAIN DUTIES & RESPONSIBILITES 
- Build a good rapport and relationship with all of our members and guests 
- Deal with customer enquirers in a friendly and efficient manner 
- Ensure that all financial transactions are completed in accordance LLFitness finance procedures 
- Manage the door entry and exit system 
- To actively promote and sell the various memberships available at LLFitness 
- Maintain and update the membership database system 
- Promote member challenges and initiatives 
- Able to seek solutions and resolve problems, as and when they arise 
- General administrative duties 2 

PERSONAL SPECIFICATION 
- Have a friendly and professional approach 
- First Aid Qualification desirable or willing to obtain 
- IT Skills including PC applications 
- Outgoing and confident with people of all ages 
- Speak/read/write English and Khmer 
- Ability to work shifts (flexible ours considered) 
- A genuine interest in Health and Fitness 
- Honest and reliable

Job Description:
Trade Programs
• Plan and prepare trade promotion and communication sales kit 
• Support sales team with marketing activities to drive sales volume and distribution, and set guidelines for displays and merchandizing. 
• Monitor sales performance progress, inventory and competitor’s activities for in-depth market insights. 
• Responsible for the production, allocation and tracking of POSM (e.g. shelf displays, banners, posters, flyers, etc). 
• Prepare Mid-Month Business Report and Post-Program Review 
• Coordinate with Marketing Manager and Finance Team on reimbursement of all promotional and advertising expenses.  

Trade Relations & Communication
• Prepare and conduct monthly briefing to the sales team of marketing promotions and activities. 
• Weekly market visits to the trade with sales team. 
• Develop and maintain positive working relationship with internal (TSNR departments) and external (principal, retailers) stakeholders
• Lead merchandiser and/or PG team to drive in-store visibility and/or sales. 
• Manage brand’s in-field activation and/or sampling events.
Job Requirement:
Education:
• Bachelor degree in Sales and Marketing or relevant field

Experience:
• 1-2 of experience in Trade Marketing in FMCG, in a familiar trade marketing role
• Experience of project management against set deliverables

Technical skills:
• Strong communication skills, both written and verbal and excellent stakeholder management skills
• Ability to prioritize and organize workloads independently when required. 
• Team player and the ability to work across different multi-media platforms and departments. 
• Ability to problem solve and “make things happen” 
• Willingness to learn and develop with the role.

Job Requirement:
- Minimum 02 years of working experience related to compliance or audit function within relevant industries is preferred.
- Bachelor Degree in business, finance or auditing is preferred
- Good understanding of an effective corporate compliance and ethics program
- Prior experience in assisting to internal reviews or investigations, will be additional value
- Substantial experience either in the healthcare or FMCG industry is preferred
- Demonstrate basic proficiency level in analytical skills
- Demonstrate proficiencies in office productivity tools (e.g. Excel, Word and PowerPoint)
- Demonstrate fluency in local language and ideally in English, both written and spoken

- Excellent organization and time management skills
- A medium level of independence, initiative, planning and fair judgment.
- Demonstrated ability to maintain confidentiality 

Drive Growth. Be the Difference. Join DKSH.

DKSH’s strength lies in our great diversity of services, industries, clients, products, regions and employees from various nationalities. We are proud of our people: they are the reason we are successful. Our people are the best in the industry. They are passionate about their career growth and about business success. They work as part of an energetic and committed team, positively impacting millions of lives through the products and services we provide. 
Join us today if you are ready to “Drive growth. Be the Difference.” With DKSH, you will experience a world of learning and development, own your career and take business responsibility and have a positive impact that touches people’s lives.
Company Profile:
At DKSH, our purpose is to enrich people’s lives by providing access to goods, services and insights. United by our vision to be the trusted partner, we help companies grow in Asia and beyond across our Business Units Healthcare, Consumer Goods, Performance Materials and Technology.

Delivering life-saving drugs to hospitals, bringing high-quality products to remote villages, installing technology that raises living standards and providing new formulations for healthcare products that make life easier. These are just a few examples of how DKSH touches people’s lives around the clock. We do this while helping our clients and customers grow by providing services including sourcing, market insights, marketing and sales, eCommerce, distribution and logistics as well as after-sales services.

Listed on the SIX Swiss Exchange, DKSH operates in 36 markets with 32,450 specialists, generating net sales of CHF 10.7 billion in 2020. Founded by Swiss entrepreneurs in 1865, we have been deeply root

Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.

Job Description:
Position Objective: The candidate will support to drive product awareness, engagement and create demand and will also be required to execute customer engagement campaigns to support distribution department. Other responsibilities include new product development & launch to market, data analytic and generate report, utilizing findings to inform
decision making on customer campaign and keep track on market
performance.

Roles and Responsibilities: 
1. Actively contribute to promoting product to drive awareness, engagement and create demand.
2. Lead and deliver campaign’s operational process and logistics with cross-functional teams and vendors
3. Support the line manager on new product development and
market launches.
4. Support the line manager to initiate, design and execute
customer campaigns to drive acquisition.
5. Engage and build a strong and efficient
relationship/cooperation between AIA and its strategic partners.
6. Closely engage with the Sales team to obtain feedback and
identify opportunities to promote products/services.
7. Develop performance tracking tools and ensure ongoing
monitoring both during and after campaign roll-outs/product
launches against pre-determined KPIs.
8. Perform data analysis to obtain insights to support decisions on customer campaigns.
9. Keep track of market trends in product/service availability.
Job Requirement:
Minimum Job Requirements: 
• Minimum two (2) years’ work experience in marketing/digital services
• Experience in insurance or relevant industry is a plus
• Experience in the following areas is preferred: product
conceptualization, customer engagement, and/or analytic
reporting
• Data-driven/innovative/collaborative/agile
• Strong communication and negotiation skills
• Microsoft Excel at intermediate level
• Good analytic skills and able to create reports
• Ability to analyses data and gather insights to inform
strategy
• Skilled at leading and engaging diverse or cross-functional
teams to align and deliver towards a common goal
Company Profile:
AIA Cambodia is part of the AIA Group, which is currently the largest independent publicly listed pan-Asian life insurance group and the largest life insurance company in the world by market capitalisation. With our various campaigns and programs so far, we have positively impacted the lives of many thousands more. 

The scale and reach of our business provide a springboard for you to build the right skills and to grow professionally and personally. Join our bold team of young, passionate and talented individuals who thrive to invent positive impacts that uphold our brand promise – help Cambodians live healthier, longer and better lives.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   070 949 111 kh.careers@aia.com  12th Floor, Exchange Square, Street 106-61  ,Sangkat Wat Phnom, Khan Daun Penh, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 070 949 111

job title: General Manager for Retail, Food& Beverage
company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
position: General Manager for Retail, Food& Beverage
Job Description: • Explore new business opportunities and execute systematic prospecting in business development• Develop, coach and manage a professional team tasked with identifying new opportunities;• Initiate creative concepts and assist the Owner in making executive decisions on business development by reporting to the Owner and providing advice on a regular basis; • Connect and interact with existing and potential business partners on property development projects;• Develop accurate and aggressive long and short-range financial objectives and budget consistent with the Company's objective and mission;• Manage and executes marketing, sales, and operational strategies and activities, producing results that meet or exceed the company’s business plan;• Maintain product and service quality standards by conducting ongoing evaluations and investigating complaints and initiate corrective actions;• Prepare financial reports for management that clearly explain operational effectiveness, trends and variances;• Liaise with superior to make decisions for operational activities and set strategic goals for Property Management;• Evaluate regularly the efficiency of business procedures according to organizational objectives and apply improvements;• Provide the team, functional units, and management with a clear picture of current business performance and progress towards targets via preparation of relevant reports and dashboards;• Support the execution of the Company’s Business Plans and ensure initiatives, budget and KPIs are consistently met;• Support key cross-functional activities for the team, such as cross-border activities by working with team and cross department to ensure goal alignment and execution on all initiatives to achieve Company’s goals;• Monitor product budgets reporting associated with product platforms, ensuring budget is fully optimized while proper processes are followed and initiatives are delivered on time and within agreed budget;• Acquire new partnership relationships with strong and reputational corporates companies in the market;• Drive strategic sales initiatives including creating schemes for partners, sales team to deliver outstanding sales results performance and drive the right sales behaviors;• Accountable for achieving defined target objectives in respect of sales and business growth in alignment with the business direction;• Monitor and communicate sales results regularly to both internal and internal stakeholder to ensure alignment and decision making;• Oversee customer support processes and organize them to enhance customer satisfaction;• Review financial information and adjust operational budgets to promote profitability;• Revise and/or formulate operational policies, procedure, flows, etc. and promote their implementation;• Manage relationships/agreements with external partners/vendors;• Evaluate overall performance by gathering, analyzing and interpreting data and metrics;• Develop and implement programs to ensure risk prevention and fraud awareness is optimized and reduced;• Manage and engage regularly with partners to build strong relationship;• Constantly look out to develop new avenues of business with the partner to maximize the partnership potential;• Influence the decision with partners toward achieving strategic common and profitable goals;• Work closely with both internal and external stakeholders to enhance processes, efficiency and customers experiences;• Manage, leads, develops and coaches team to achieve team performance effectiveness, personal career development and future succession planning;• Enforce sales performance standards to promote business quality.
Job Requirement: • Master's degree in business administration, business development or equivalent qualification is a must;• At least 8 years of working experience in property development company, and at least 5 years of working experience in hospitality industry.• At least 3 years working experience in similar position or senior position• Strong knowledge in Cambodian market• Very good at business analyzing and critical thinking• In-depth knowledge of cash flow management, revenue and cost drivers, operational risk management and the cultivation of client relationships in real estate development projects• Familiarity with property development market and business environment in the industry and adaptability to changes from time to time• Leadership in driving sales and new business opportunities• Solid project management skills• Strong interpersonal skills to manage and inspire team members to outperform• Strong at time management and presentation skills• Strong hospitality spiritHow to apply!Submit your CVs to our Talent Acquisition Team (TAT), Via email to: hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh  Telegram: https://t.me/HRMJQETel: (855) 12 797 939, (855) 93 335 564 Due to high volume of applicants, only shortlisted candidates will be contacted for the interview.
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh Phnom Penh Building #223 & 227, Mao Tse Tong Blvd., Sangkat Toul Svay Prey I, Khan Boeng Keng Kang, Phnom Penh 012 797 939

job title: Senior Unit Manager, Corporate Loan Development - 01 post.
position: Senior Unit Manager, Corporate Loan Development - 01 post.
Job Description: The main purpose of the “Senior Unit Manager, Corporate Loan Development” position is responsible for develop and manage all credit products under corporate customer segment. This post required to have extensive experience candidates and capable to lead all activities regarding to new product development, existing product improvement and initiatives formulation for corporate banking diversification of Hattha Bank.Location: Head Office, Phnom PenhDuties and Responsibilities.Lead all new loan product development for SME & corporate segment such as term loan, overdraft, revolving credit, trade finance loan and other facilities as bank strategic initiatives..Lead enhancing existing loan products and ensure those products are well performed as plan and being the top tier in the market..Lead the system User Acceptance Testing (UAT), develop product procedure, guideline, application form and all materials and provide onsite or offsite training to end users for new product launch..Thoroughly evaluate and monitoring the new product pilot test and ensure the performance is satisfactory achieved as defined KPIs..Comprehensive product performance analysis and report to bank management as monthly basis..Friendly support cross functional team’s projects and responsible for developing business requirement and work process flow regarding to credit related requirements..Regularly market survey, competition observation, identify the potential business opportunity and formulate the strategic initiatives for the bank..Lead, coach, and support subordinates to achieve KPI/target to meet the bank’s strategic goals.Perform other task as assigned by management.
Job Requirement: .Bachelor degree in banking/finance or business management, or related fields..At least 03 years’ experience in corporate loan and facility development within the commercial banks..Acceptable experience for credit product development for SME and corporate customer is preferred..Extensive knowledge in financial products, analytical, problem solving, communication (written and verbal), presentation, relationship management skills..Be proficient in Khmer and English both speaking and writing..Skillful for using Ms. Word, excel, outlook and data visualization tool such as Power BI is preferred..Willingness to travel occasionally to provincial branch office..Be innovative, dynamic, time manner and confident.
Company Profile:
Hattha Bank is a leading bank in Cambodia, licensed by National Bank of Cambodia. Having been operating for more than 26 years with MDI status in the market, with its rapidly success, Hattha Bank has transformed its status from MDI to commercial bank in 2020, and continue providing diversified financial services to individual and SME businesses; and jump into retail consumer financial market and corporate customer in urbanities.

Hattha Bank is a subsidiary of Bank of Ayudhya (Krungsri), the fifth largest commercial bank in Thailand, and a member of MUFG Bank, the Japan’s largest banking group, and one of the largest and most diversified financial groups in the world.

Job Description: The main purpose of the “Supervisor, Enterprise Services and Middleware Administration” position is responsible to administrate, maintain, and support all webservices, gateway, and APIs, and all integration points. Manage and maintain all the integrated system, enterprise service bus, or third-party access to Core Banking System. To manages a team that designs, develops, tests, debugs and implements middleware components, tools, and utilities required for the operation, maintenance, and control of systems. To implement and manage the Disaster Recovery and Data Continuity Plan to prevent from critical and high risk of any failure. To implement and manage Webservice and API with high security and high availability. The main task is to responsible for ongoing middleware operations that provides 24/7 up and running with the minimum impact.Location: Head Office, Phnom PenhDuties and Responsibilities.Manage team to monitor performance and tuning on Enterprise Service Bus (ESB), API Management, API Gateway..Install and configure ESB & API software as per requirement..Manage team to implement tool to monitoring the service like log management, etc..Manage team to record the report of system issue, system change log, and system availability..Administrate and manage the existing Web Services, Gateway, and APIs and troubleshoot..Design standard services process flow to support with system integration or third-party system..Develop & deploy new webservice and API for new business requirement..Administrate on security of all webservices & APIs and perform regular securities monitoring to identify any possible intrusions, documented standard API and webservice specification..Implement the Disaster Recovery, Data Continuity Plan..Research on new technologies to support business requirement and keep system up to date..Working with support team to solve the system issue..To ensure services is running 24/7 without interruption..To ensure all services with high security and high availability..Perform other task as assigned by supervisor or management.
Job Requirement: .Bachelor degree of Computer Science or related fields..At least two years working experience in Enterprise Service Bus (ESB) technologies, API Management, API Gateway..Experience on Flexcube or T24 Webservice and Payment API is preferable..Experience on Integration development with partner..Good understanding on PLSQL, SQL, VB .Net, C#, Java, Spring boots, etc..Good knowledge of Database such as Oracle, SQL Server, PostgreSQL, NoSQL database, etc..Good knowledge of API Management, Service registry, Service Discovery an advantage..Good knowledge of API Security standard implementation OAuth2, JWT, etc..Good experience of Web Services and system integration..Good at spoken and written communication skills both English and Khmer..Able to work at night for solving critical issue or other tasks assigned by management.
Company Profile:
Hattha Bank is a leading bank in Cambodia, licensed by National Bank of Cambodia. Having been operating for more than 26 years with MDI status in the market, with its rapidly success, Hattha Bank has transformed its status from MDI to commercial bank in 2020, and continue providing diversified financial services to individual and SME businesses; and jump into retail consumer financial market and corporate customer in urbanities.

Hattha Bank is a subsidiary of Bank of Ayudhya (Krungsri), the fifth largest commercial bank in Thailand, and a member of MUFG Bank, the Japan’s largest banking group, and one of the largest and most diversified financial groups in the world.

Job Description: The main purpose of the ''Senior Officer, Database Administration'' position is to administrate, maintain, and support all databases of Core Banking System, ATM, Mobile Banking, LOS, Data Warehouse, AML, and Hattha Bank Internal application system. Manage and controlling the resources utilization of hardware in order to reduce the software operating expense. To implement and manage the Disaster Recovery and Data Continuity Plan to prevent from critical and high risk of software failure. To implement and manage database with high security and high availability. The main task is to maintain the database system up and running 24/7 with the minimum impact.Location: Head Office, Phnom PenhDuties and Responsibilities•Control and manage the existing database on Core Banking System, ATM, Mobile Banking System, and LOS, Data Warehouse, AML, and Internal database and troubleshoot.•Manage fixes and packages to apply on critical systems such as CBS, ATM, LOS, AML, and other systems.•Monitor and perform on database/container database backup and restoration.•Install and configure database software and create new database system.•Monitoring and configure Active Data Guard configuration, Real Application Cluster (RAC), and troubleshooting the issue.•Working with support team to solve the database issue, Monitor jobs performance on all databases.•Supporting other related units, branches or departments to resolve the issue on critical system.•Perform switchover Core Banking System, ATM, Mobile Banking, LOS, AML, Internal database to DR in case of critical issue or testing case and to ensure DR is functioned well.•To setup new UAT environment of critical systems for relating teams to try out new features or fixes.•To complete the tasks assigned by management and establish the activities plan.•To ensure all databases system with high security and high availability.•To ensure database system is running 24/7 without interruption.•Perform other task as assigned by supervisor or management.
Job Requirement: •Bachelor degree of Computer Science or related fields.•At least two years working experience in Database Administration / IT.•Working experience with Microfinance or Commercial Bank is a plus.•Good knowledge of database backup & recovery technology, database high availability technology, database security.•Good knowledge of Oracle Database, MS SQL Server, PostgreSQL and other.•Good at spoken and written communication skills both English and Khmer.•Able to work at night for solving critical issue or other tasks assigned by management.

Job Description: The main purpose of the “Officer, Field Collection” position is responsible for the overall management of the field collection, which includes solving and collecting bad debt of written off loan.Location: Head Office, Phnom PenhDuties and Responsibilities.Manage & lead field collection by building staff capacity with good performance result..Coordinate with bad debt collector or relevant staff at the branches or relevant department’s staff in solving and collecting loan in efficiency..Analyze data to determine the likelihood or signal of an account moving into the delinquent category before it actually does so..Responsible for reducing or protecting number of delinquent accounts, as well as overall debts and written off accounts..Resolve and reconcile discrepancies between parties of Hattha Bank and clients..Conduct a mission to visit branches to collect debt at least 4 times as yearly..Find out the effective solution and recommendation to the branch’s collectors and other related persons on how to solve or collect debt in efficiency..Work closely with outside legal counsel as well as collections firms to retrieve the past due balances..Manage, monitor, and follow up on the invitation and litigation cases for taken an action..Perform other task as assigned by management.
Job Requirement: •Experience for loan portfolio and loan recovery managements at least 3 years.•Experience in working with high targets and tight deadlines.•Knowledge of relevant requirements such as credit & finance.•Literacy in computer programs for Microsoft Office.•Strong networking, negotiation and reconciliation skills for positive results.•Able to build a communication and relationship in English.•Be able to travel and work in rural areas.

Job Description:
Position Objective: 
▪ Manage and grow a panel of healthcare providers (panel
hospitals/ clinics/ polyclinics...) that provides medical
services with cashless facility to covered members and
policyholders of AIA medical insurance policies.
▪ Build cordial business relationship with panel providers
and ensure medical claims costs are contained
effectively with regular performance dialogues and
monitoring of utilization with the use of analytics.
▪ Support claims functions for claim assessment and
claim investigation and act as intermediary for
operational matters between panel providers and AIA.

Roles and Responsibilities:
1. Network management
▪ Provide relevant access study to potential panel
healthcare providers based on criteria selection such as
location, facilities and services, number of beds, ...
▪ Support the process of deliberation including
documentation and site visits
▪ Expand AIA panel healthcare providers (hospitals,
clinics, polyclinics...) nationwide
▪ Manage new healthcare providers onboarding /
registration/ training and related activities
▪ Visit existing and new panel doctor to train and ensure
compliance with AIA laid down processes
2. Contracting:
▪ Ensure necessary contracts are renewed before expiry,
i.e. package pricing contracts and to continuously follow
up to ensure contracts are closed within a reasonable
time period.
▪ Update fees from healthcare providers, if any
▪ Develop discount rate agreements for specific
treatments with partner clinics/hospitals in the long term
3. Provide engagement:
▪ Provide and receive feedback from providers by
monitoring behavior and evaluating the performance of
panel provider based on claims utilization, market best practice, service level, adherence to fee schedule and
possible fraud for mutual improvement.
▪ Handle complaints / disputes between AIA and panel
hospitals/clinics.
▪ Develop an objective continuous evaluation criterion to
rate partner hospital/clinics based on customer feedback
▪ Assist team for claim assessment and investigation
4. Business Development
▪ Assist in development of AIA healthcare providers
network management system (provide inputs as an on-
ground expert)
▪ Build up and maintain a standardized comprehensive
the service- fee code system in AIA medical portal
▪ Build cordial win-win business relationships with
providers.
▪ Coordinate business events with providers including
meetings, official openings, launches, etc.
5. Health Analytics
▪ Perform quarterly bill reviews of top incurred
providers/diagnosis/procedures
▪ for identifying major cost contributors in the bill.
▪ Perform bill reviews as needed to support Performance
Dialogues, empanelment and daily operational needs.
Job Requirement:
Job Requirements: 
▪ Qualifications: Bachelor’s degree and Fluent in English
(Speaking, Reading, Writing, and Listening)
▪ Knowledge: Microsoft Office
▪ Skills: sound judgment, analytical and communicative
skills, customer service oriented and enjoy working
with people from all levels
▪ Experience: At least 2-year experience in similar field
▪ High commitment and able to work under pressure
▪ Good supporting team member
▪ Good attitude
▪ Medical background is preferable
Company Profile:
AIA Cambodia is part of the AIA Group, which is currently the largest independent publicly listed pan-Asian life insurance group and the largest life insurance company in the world by market capitalisation. With our various campaigns and programs so far, we have positively impacted the lives of many thousands more. 

The scale and reach of our business provide a springboard for you to build the right skills and to grow professionally and personally. Join our bold team of young, passionate and talented individuals who thrive to invent positive impacts that uphold our brand promise – help Cambodians live healthier, longer and better lives.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   070 949 111 kh.careers@aia.com  12th Floor, Exchange Square, Street 106-61  ,Sangkat Wat Phnom, Khan Daun Penh, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 070 949 111

Job Requirement: .Fresh graduate or Bachelor’s degree in computer science, IT and Engineering or equivalent..Experience or sound knowledge of Quality Assurance..Knowledge of quality assurance terminology, methods, and tools..Knowledge of testing best practices, version control practices and defect management practice..Knowledge of OWASP is a plus..Experience with Agile Development (Scrum) is a plus.Experience or sound knowledge of DevOps, tools such as Jira, Git Repository, .Deployment Pipeline, Jenkins, or SonarQube..Autonomous and proactive, quick learner, and effective communication..Decent English communication.

Job Description: The main purpose of the “Specialist, Data Science” position is utilize analytical, statistical, and programming skills to collect, analyze, and interpret large data sets. Use this information to develop data-driven solutions to difficult business challenges. Build future insights through prediction models and forecasting, risk management, compliance, Customer segmentation, Recommendation engines, Customer experience, Fraud detection, Customer Data Management, etc. by using data science strategy.Location: Head Office, Phnom PenhDuties and Responsibilities.Data mining or extracting usable data from valuable data sources into the data warehouse..Carrying out preprocessing of structured and unstructured data..Data mining to identify the trends and patterns..Using accurate data set and variables for analysis, using predictive models for decision-making..Using machine learning tools to select features, create and optimize classifiers..Developing prediction systems and machine learning algorithms..Develop processes and tools to monitor and analyze model performance and data accuracy..Present information using data visualization techniques..Propose solutions and strategies to tackle business challenges..Perform other tasks assigned by direct supervisor or management.
Job Requirement: .Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related fields..2 years working experience as a data analyst or in a related field..Knowledge of ETL tools such as Talend, Informatica, or Integrate.io..Knowledge of reporting & data visualization software like Tableau, Power BI, Oracle BI, or Qlik..Knowledge of programming languages like R, or Python, databases such as SQL Server, Oracle, and Postgres DB..Knowledge of distributed data/computing tools like Hadoop, Kafka, and Spark..Good applied statistical skills, knowledge of statistical tests, distributions, regression, maximum likelihood estimators, etc..Good knowledge of machine learning methods like k-Nearest Neighbors, Naive Bayes, SVM, Decision Forests..Knowledge of a variety of machine learning techniques like clustering, regression, simulation, scenario analysis, modeling, clustering, decision trees, neural networks, etc..Good mathematical skills to help collect, measure, organize and analyze data

Job Description:

Job Description: The main purpose of the “Specialist, Data Analytics” position is responsible for organizing data related to the operation, risk, compliance, planning, sales, market research, or other behaviors. Utilize technical expertise to ensure data is accurate and high-quality. job title: Officer, ATM Support for Onsite & Weekend  (Night Shift) - 01 post.
position: Officer, ATM Support for Onsite & Weekend  (Night Shift) - 01 post.
Job Description: The main purpose of the “Officer, ATM Support for Onsite & Weekend” position is responsible for performing operational support duties of ATM Unit in Channel Banking Department. The basic function of this position is to perform ATM status monitoring; assists in the installation process; and investigates ATM related customer disputes or fraudulent issues in accordance with policy and regulation. Performs a variety of routine daily tasks; prepares and reviews reports, prepares correspondence tasks and participates in related projects.Location: Head Office, Phnom PenhDuties and Responsibilities.Deploys implements and maintains ATM services of all located terminal onsite and weekend..Outgoing monitor the performance of ATM terminals..Ensures maximum “up-time” of ATMs and Security systems through efficient management of monitoring and support, hardware maintenance and cash management..Oversees timely and effective resolution of issues on a 24/7 basis..Tracks issues and makes recommendations to address them..Manages timely, effective support to Branch staff on operational issues, balancing, auditing, security maintenance..Oversees the daily administration of the ATM balancing function including deposits, withdrawals and out of balance conditions and the timely research, resolution of transaction issues within established performance goals..Ensures that proper security and cash handling procedures are followed to minimize risk and loss..Ensures that decisions on refunds of fees are made fairly and consistently within internal guidelines..Develop user guide and guideline regarding to ATM services..Ongoing monitoring ATM both operations and risk identification to minimize down-time and to identify suspicious cardholders /transactions including onsite inspection..Conduct onsite visits to find out any negative activities in operating ATM as well as non-compliance of policies, forms’ completion, or any other further mistakes in branches/merchantAssist control in all aspects of local ATM operations by providing support to assigned branch ATM personnel..Perform ATM treasury audits, ATM systems audits and ATM onsite audits..Assist in implementation and ongoing training. .Coordinate personnel transitions that may be needed to support the system and/or process..Perform other task as assigned by management.
Job Requirement: .Minimum Bachelor in Computer Science or related fields..Experience in a systems administration and support environment..Experience in problem solving skills..Understanding of various system architectures including hardware and software..Computer literacy in particular database, ATM Switch systems, ATM System and networking

job title: មន្ត្រីផ្នែកលក់ - ៣៩ នាក់
position: មន្ត្រីផ្នែកលក់ - ៣៩ នាក់
Job Description: កំណត់អំពីភារកិច្ច និងការទទួលខុសត្រូវក្នុងការចុះផ្សព្វផ្សាយពីផលិតផល សេវាកម្មរបស់ ធនាគារ ហត្ថា និងចុះជួបទំនាក់ទំនងអតិថិជនដោយផ្ទាល់ និងពន្យល់អំពីសេវាកម្ម-ផលិតផលប្រាក់បញ្ញើសន្សំជូនដល់អតិថិជន និងរៀបចំឯកសារបើកគណនីជូនអតិថិជនដែលមានបំណងដាក់ប្រាក់សន្សំជាមួយធនាគារ ហត្ថា និងចូលរូមដោះស្រាយនូវរាល់បញ្ហាដែលនឹងកើតមានឡើងចំពោះប្រតិបត្ដិការសេវាប្រាក់សន្សំ។Location: រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ - ២០នាក់ | ខេត្ដកណ្ដាល - ០៥នាក់ | ខេត្ដកែប - ០១នាក់ | ខេត្ដកំពង់ស្ពឺ - ០១នាក់ | ខេត្ដកំពត - ០១នាក់ | ខេត្ដពោធិ៍សាត់ - ០១នាក់ | ខេត្ដកំពង់ធំ - ០១នាក់  ខេត្ដកោះកុង - ០១នាក់ | ខេត្ដសៀមរាប - ០២នាក់  ខេត្ដតាកែវ - ០៤នាក់ | ខេត្ដបន្ទាយមានជ័យ - ០២នាក់Duties and Responsibilities.ចូលរួមក្នុងយុទ្ធនាការ ផ្សព្វផ្សាយផ្សេងៗទាក់ទងនឹងផលិតផល សេវាកម្ម របស់ធនាគារ ហត្ថា។.ចុះជួបទំនាក់ទំនងអតិថិជន និងសាធារណជនដោយផ្ទាល់នឹងពន្យល់អំពី ផលិតផល សេវាកម្ម របស់ធនាគារ ហត្ថា។.ធ្វើការដោះស្រាយនូវរាល់បញ្ហាដែលនឹងអាចកើតមានឡើងចំពោះ ប្រតិបត្តិការ។.រៀបចំ និងគ្រប់គ្រងរាល់ឯកសារព័ត៌មានដែលទាក់ទងជាមួយអតិថិជន។.រាយការណ៍ពីបាតុភាព និងផលប៉ះពាល់ដល់ ផលិតផល និងសេវាកម្ម ទាំងឡាយមកគណៈគ្រប់គ្រង ឱ្យបានទាន់ពេល និងត្រឹមត្រូវ។.រៀបចំរបាយការណ៍តាមការចាត់ចែងរបស់គណៈគ្រប់គ្រង។
Job Requirement: .កំពុងសិក្សា ឬបញ្ចប់ថ្នាក់បរិញ្ញាបត្រ ជំនាញទីផ្សារ ឬជំនាញដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ។.មានបទពិសោធន៍ផ្នែកលក់ ឬការផ្សព្វផ្សាយកាន់តែល្អប្រសើរ។.មានឆន្ទៈ ចុះបំពេញការងារនៅតាមមូលដ្ឋាន និងដែនគ្រប់គ្រងរបស់សាខា។.មានអត្តចរិតល្អ មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ សុភាពរាបសារ និងតស៊ូការធ្វើការងារ។.មានចំណេះដឹងផ្នែកភាសាអង់គ្លេស។.អាចប្រើប្រាស់កុំព្យូទ័រលើកម្មវិធី MS. Word និង MS. Excel ។.ត្រូវមានម៉ូតូផ្ទាល់ខ្លួន និងអាចបើកបរបាន។

job title: មន្រ្តីជ្រើសរើសបុគ្គលិក - ០១នាក់
position: មន្រ្តីជ្រើសរើសបុគ្គលិក - ០១នាក់
Job Description: តួនាទី "មន្រ្តីជ្រើសរើសបុគ្គលិក" បង្កើតឡើងក្នុងគោលបំណងដើម្បីគ្រប់គ្រង សម្របសម្រួល និងធ្វើឲ្យប្រាកដថា ដំណើរការនៃការជ្រើសរើសបុគ្គលិក ប្រព្រឹត្តទៅដោយរលួន និងស្របតាមផែនការធនធានមនុស្សរបស់ធនាគារ ហត្ថា។ លើសពីនេះទៀត មន្រ្តីជ្រើសរើសបុគ្គលិក ត្រូវធ្វើការគ្រប់គ្រងទិន្នន័យរបស់បេក្ខជនចាប់ពីតាំងដំណាក់កាលដាក់ពាក្យ រហូតក្លាយជាបុគ្គលិករបស់ធនាគារ ប្រកបដោយប្រសិទ្ធភាព។Location: ការិយាល័យកណ្ដាល-ភ្នំពេញDuties and Responsibilities.ត្រួតពិនិត្យផែនការជ្រើសរើសបុគ្គលិក និងរៀបចំផែនការសកម្មភាពក្នុងការជ្រើសរើសបុគ្គលិក។.រៀបចំ និងចូលរួមសកម្មភាពផ្សព្វផ្សាយដំណឹងជ្រើសរើសបុគ្គលិក និងប្រមូលពាក្យសុំបម្រើការរបស់បេក្ខជន។.ត្រួតពិនិត្យសំណុំឯកសារដាក់ពាក្យរបស់បេក្ខជន ស្របតាមគោនយោបាយរបស់ធនាគារ។.រៀបចំបញ្ជីលទ្ធផលសម្រាំង (Short-listed) និងទំនាក់ទំនងទៅកាន់បេក្ខជន។.សម្របសម្រួលលើដំណើរការ ប្រឡង និងសម្ភាសន៍ការងារ។.រៀបចំ និងដំណើរការឯកសារស្នើសុំទទួលយកបេក្ខជនជូនថ្នាក់គ្រប់គ្រងពិនិត្យ និងសម្រេច។.ធ្វើបច្ចុប្បន្នភាពព័ត៌មានរបស់បេក្ខជនទៅតាមដំណាក់កាលនីមួយៗក្នុងប្រព័ន្ធជ្រើសរើសបុគ្គលិកឲ្យបានត្រឹមត្រូវ និងទាន់ពេលវេលា។.បំពេញកិច្ចការងារផ្សេងៗតាមការចាត់តាំងរបស់ថ្នាក់គ្រប់គ្រង។
Job Requirement: .កំពុងសិក្សា ឬបញ្ចប់ការសិក្សាថ្នាក់បរិញ្ញាបត្រជំនាញគ្រប់ជំនាញ។.មានបទពិសោធន៍ការងារយ៉ាងតិចណាស់១ឆ្នាំ ផ្នែកធនធានមនុស្ស ឬរដ្ឋបាល។.អាចប្រើប្រាស់កម្មវិធីកុំព្យូទ័រលើកម្មវិធី MS. Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint)។.ភាសាអង់គ្លេស អាចប្រើប្រាស់បាន (ស្តាប់, សរសេរ និងនិយាយ)។.ជាមនុស្សឧស្សាហ៍ព្យាយាម ស្មោះត្រង់ មានការប្រាស្រ័យទាក់ទងល្អ។.ចូលចិត្តការធ្វើការងារជាក្រុម។
